NK085(ru)004:0: //sa ma ya ba dz+ra d+ai pra sh+tsi tram bri
NK085(ru)004:1: t+tam shu d+d+h+ai k+aa sh+aa da r+sham n+aa ma bi
NK085(ru)004:3: dam tshig rdo rje gsal bkra'i 'grel pa dag ldan gsal ba'i me long zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK085(ru)004:5: bla ma dang mgon po 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK085(ru)004:6: gnas lugs chos dbyings nam mkha' yangs pa la //
NK085(ru)004:7: mkhyen brtse ye shes 'od dkar d+r+wa ba can //
NK085(ru)004:8: mdzad pa'i 'phrin las bsil zer kun 'phro ba //
NK085(ru)004:9: kun mkhyen ku mud gnyen la mi phyed 'dud //
NK085(ru)004:10: rgya gar chu bzhi'i mkhas mchog rdor 'dzin des //
NK085(ru)004:11: gsang sngags rmad byung theg mchog khong chud don //
NK085(ru)004:12: ci bzhin ma nor bsrung bya'i don ston pa //
NK085(ru)004:13: sgeg pa'i rdo rje'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK085(ru)004:14: sgeg pa'i dgongs pa dngul dkar me long la //
NK085(ru)004:15: sum brgya drug cu'i gzugs brnyan gsal ba ni //
NK085(ru)004:16: gang zag log rtog g.ya' yis g.yogs pa la //
NK085(ru)004:17: bdag gis tshad ma gsum gyis gsal bar phye //
NK085(ru)004:18: de nyid kyis mdzad pa'i dam tshig rdo rje gsal bkra 'di la spyi don gsum ste /
NK085(ru)004:19: 'chad nyan ji ltar bya ba'i tshul dang /
NK085(ru)004:20: gang 'chad nyan byed pa dam chos kyi rnam bzhag /
NK085(ru)004:21: 'chad nyan mthar phyin pa'i rgyu mtshan dang gsum /
NK085(ru)004:23: 'chad pa po slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid dang /
NK085(ru)004:24: nyan pa po slob ma'i mtshan nyid do //
NK085(ru)004:25: dang po slob dpon de'i mtshan nyid /
NK085(ru)004:27: bshad pa'i phan yon dang gsum /
NK085(ru)004:28: gnyis pa nyan pa po slob ma'i mtshan nyid /
NK085(ru)004:30: chos nyan pa'i phan yon dang gsum /
NK085(ru)004:31: de rnams ni zhib par theg pa spyi'i bcing gi khog dbub nang du gzigs mdzod /
NK085(ru)004:32: gnyis pa gang 'chad nyan byed pa dam chos kyi rnam bzhag la gsum ste /
NK085(ru)004:33: gang zag 'jug ngor shes par bya ba'i phyir /
NK085(ru)004:34: dam pa'i chos ngos bzung ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:35: don ma nor bar shes par bya ba'i phyir /
NK085(ru)004:36: bshad pa'i thabs bstan pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:37: bshad bya gzhung don dngos kyi skabs dang gsum du gnas pa la /
NK085(ru)004:38: dang po dam pa'i chos ngos bzung ba la 'das chos dang /
NK085(ru)004:48: nang pa la yang gsum yod pa'i 'dir ma h+aa
NK085(ru)004:49: yo ga /de la bde bar gshegs pa'i zhal nas
NK085(ru)004:50: gsungs pa'i rgyud / de la brten pa'i man ngag
NK085(ru)004:51: gnyis las 'di man ngag /de la rgyud kyi don
NK085(ru)004:52: mngon par rtogs pa'i man ngag dang /
NK085(ru)004:53: bslab cing nyams su byang ba'i man ngag gnyis las
NK085(ru)004:54: 'di bslab cing nyams su blang ba'i man ngag /de
NK085(ru)004:55: la rgyud don dngos po bcu yod pa las /
NK085(ru)004:56: 'di ni bsrung bya dam tshig chos so //
NK085(ru)004:57: gnyis pa don ma nor bar shes par bya ba'i phyir bshad pa'i thabs bstan pa la /
NK085(ru)004:58: bka' thams cad phun sum tshogs pa lnga'i sgo nas 'chad /
NK085(ru)004:59: bstan bcos man ngag thams cad rtsis 'go lngas 'chad pa las /
NK085(ru)004:60: 'di man ngag yin pas rtsis 'go lngas 'chad par bya ste /
NK085(ru)004:62: thos chung gsar bu yid ches bskyed pa'i phyir //
NK085(ru)004:63: man ngag spyi don rtsis 'gos klad nas gzhom //
NK085(ru)004:65: khungs btsun zhing yid ches par bya ba'i phyir /
NK085(ru)004:66: slob dpon gang gis mdzad pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:67: bka' dang mi 'gal zhing theg pa'i gzhung tshugs par bya ba'i phyir /
NK085(ru)004:68: rgyud gang nas btus shing phyogs gar gtogs pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:69: bstan pa mtshan nges shing don gyi mdo tsam zhig
NK085(ru)004:70: rtogs par bya ba'i phyir mtshan ci la btags pa
NK085(ru)004:71: dang / brtsam pa la don yod par bya ba'i
NK085(ru)004:72: phyir dgos ched gang gi don du mdzad pa dang
NK085(ru)004:73: dang / / shes shing khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir /
NK085(ru)004:74: dbu zhabs su don du bstan pa dang lnga las /
NK085(ru)004:76: spyir bstan bcos brtsam pa'i tshad la /
NK085(ru)004:77: rab chos nyid kyi bden pa'i don mthong ba /
NK085(ru)004:78: 'bring yi dam lha'i zhal gzigs shing lung bstan thob pa /
NK085(ru)004:79: tha ma bka'i dgongs don khrol zhing theg pa'i shan
NK085(ru)004:80: 'byed cing la zlos pa tshig don la mkhas shing
NK085(ru)004:81: bye brag phyed pa zhig gis brtsam dgos te /
NK085(ru)004:83: chos nyid mngon sum rtogs pa rab //
NK085(ru)004:84: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi //
NK085(ru)004:85: lung bstan thob pa 'bring po yin //
NK085(ru)004:86: la shan bka' lung tshig la mkhas //
NK085(ru)004:87: bye brag phyed pa tha ma yin //
NK085(ru)004:89: gzhung 'di nyid rtsom pa'i slob dpon sgeg rdor ni /
NK085(ru)004:91: rgya gar sgeg rdor gnyis las /
NK085(ru)004:93: de yang thog mthar bar gsum yod pa la /
NK085(ru)004:94: 'di dang po'i sgeg rdor yin la /
NK085(ru)004:95: gong gi brtsam tshad rab 'bring tha ma gsum ka dang ldan pa yin no //
NK085(ru)004:101: sa ma bkod pas rgyas par bshad pa'i don rnams 'dir bstus shing phyogs ma h+aa yo gar gtogs /
NK085(ru)004:108: don la btags pa dang lnga las /
NK085(ru)004:109: 'dir ni dam tshig rdo rje gsal bkra zhes pas don rang gi ngo bo la 'dogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)004:110: mtshan don gyi bshad lugs mang yang /
NK085(ru)004:111: 'dir phyogs gcig nye bar mtshon na /
NK085(ru)004:112: mi 'da' bas dam tshig /gang las mi 'da' na /
NK085(ru)004:113: snang stong dbyer med mtshon pa'i rdo rje de nyid
NK085(ru)004:114: 'da' nyams med par srung ba'i thabs rnams rgyud kyi
NK085(ru)004:116: gzhung 'dir rtsa ba dang yan lag gi srung bya
NK085(ru)004:117: rnams phyogs gcig tu bsdebs nas gsal zhing bkra bar
NK085(ru)004:118: byed pa'o // bzhi pa ni 'di nyid las /
NK085(ru)004:119: lam gyi rnal 'byor rnams don phyir //
NK085(ru)004:121: gsang sngags ma h+aa yo ga'i lam la zhugs pa'i
NK085(ru)004:122: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi don bya ba'i mdzad pa'o
NK085(ru)004:126: zhabs don dang gsum du gnas pa la /
NK085(ru)004:128: ngo bo rnam grangs srung thabs dang //
NK085(ru)004:129: nyams rgyu snga rtags skyon yon gnyis //
NK085(ru)004:130: skong thabs dpe dang mdor bcur bshad //
NK085(ru)004:131: ces gsungs gzhung don rgyas par bshad do //
NK085(ru)004:132: des spyi don gyis khog dbub pa bsdus pa tsam zhing song nas /
NK085(ru)004:133: gzhung don sa bcad pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:134: tshig don gyi 'bru gnyer ba gnyis ni bshad bya gzhung don dang 'brel ba yin no //
NK085(ru)004:135: spyir bshad bya rang la yang /
NK085(ru)004:136: 'dul ba gleng bzhis bshad mdo sde dpe yis bshad /
NK085(ru)004:141: dam tshig rnam grangs kyis bshad /
NK085(ru)004:142: de la'ang dgos bsdus tshig gsum brgal lan mtshams sbyor lngas 'chad dgos te /
NK085(ru)004:143: dbyig gnyen gyi rnam bshad rig pa las /
NK085(ru)004:144: dgos pa bsdus pa'i don bcas dang //
NK085(ru)004:145: tshig don ba cas dang brgal lan bcas //
NK085(ru)004:146: mtshams sbyor bsnyad de bshad par bya //
NK085(ru)004:153: mtshams sbyor gyi don dang lnga'i sgo nas 'chad par bya'o //
NK085(ru)004:154: spyi don gsum pa bshad bya gzhung gi don dngos la gsum ste /
NK085(ru)004:157: zhabs dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba'o //
NK085(ru)004:158: dang po la gnyis yod pa'i dang po phyag 'tshal ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:160: zhes pa bshad pa'i gzhir drang /
NK085(ru)004:161: de'i khyad par gyi chos la lnga /
NK085(ru)004:162: gang gis na slob dpon sgeg pa'i rdo rjes /
NK085(ru)004:164: gang la na rdo rje 'dzin pa la /
NK085(ru)004:165: de yang dpe don rtags gsum gyis 'chad de /
NK085(ru)004:166: dper na rin po che rdo rje pha lam gyis
NK085(ru)004:167: phar la rin po che gzhan rnams 'joms tshur la
NK085(ru)004:169: don rdo rje chos nyid kyis kyang phar la dngos
NK085(ru)004:170: po mtshan ma thams cad 'joms shing tshur la mi
NK085(ru)004:171: tshugs pa de la lnga ste rdo rje sems dpa'
NK085(ru)004:172: rang bzhin chos nyid 'dus ma byas pa'i rdo rje
NK085(ru)004:173: / ngo bo dbyings ye shes dbyer mi phyed pa'i rdo rje /
NK085(ru)004:174: mtshan nyid ni rgyu rkyen dang bral zhing gnyen pos
NK085(ru)004:175: mi shigs pas skye 'jig dang bral ba'i rdo rje
NK085(ru)004:176: / yon tan ni sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin
NK085(ru)004:177: las lnga lhun gyis grub pas gzhan du btsal ba
NK085(ru)004:179: 'phrin las kyis rang las gzhan du 'dzin pa'i rtog pa thams cad 'joms pa'i rdo rje'o //
NK085(ru)004:180: de ltar chos nyid rang byung gi ye shes su
NK085(ru)004:181: 'dus pa'i brda rdo rje rtse gcig /de la ji
NK085(ru)004:182: lta ji snyed dbyer med kyi ye shes gsum dang
NK085(ru)004:183: ldan pa'i rtags su rdo rje rtse gsum /
NK085(ru)004:184: de'ang byed las kyi cha las ye shes lngar snang ba'i rtags su rdo rje rtse lnga /
NK085(ru)004:185: de ltar ye shes dgu po lhun gyis grub pa
NK085(ru)004:186: mtshon pa'i rtags su rdo rje rtse dgu bstan pa'i
NK085(ru)004:187: don de nyid rgyun du mi gtong bas na 'dzin
NK085(ru)004:190: sngon byung du slob dpon sgeg rdor gyis /
NK085(ru)004:191: bstan bcos 'di nyid brtsam pa'i thog mar 'tshal /
NK085(ru)004:192: rjes 'jug tu 'chad nyan pa rnams kyis nyan bshad byed pa'i thog mar 'tshal /
NK085(ru)004:196: spyod pa ya rabs dang gsum las /
NK085(ru)004:197: dang po ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dgongs pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:198: slob dpon sgeg rdor gyi dgongs pa gnyis shar nub
NK085(ru)004:199: kyi nam mkha' ltar dbyer med kyi ngang du rtogs
NK085(ru)004:200: pa ni mi phyed 'dres pa'i phyag ces bya'o //
NK085(ru)004:201: gzhung 'di nyid kyi don rnams bde blag tu rtogs
NK085(ru)004:202: shing nyams su len pa mthar phyin pa ni sgrub
NK085(ru)004:203: pa thabs so // spyod pa ya rabs kyi phyag ni /
NK085(ru)004:204: lus gus pa dang bcas nas smad lnga sa la gtugs /
NK085(ru)004:205: ngag dwang ba dad pas bstod pa dang dbyangs su bcas /
NK085(ru)004:206: yid ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo nas phyag 'tshal ba'o //
NK085(ru)004:208: sngon byung du sgeg rdor gyis bstan bcos brtsam pa'i
NK085(ru)004:209: thog mar ston pa khyad par can la mchod par
NK085(ru)004:212: bar chad rgyud nas dag ste /
NK085(ru)004:213: brtsam pa mthar phyin pa'i dgos pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:214: gzhung mdzes pa'i dgos pa rnams yod do //
NK085(ru)004:215: gnyis pa bshad par dam bca' ba la gnyis yod pa'i dang po dam bca' dngos ni /
NK085(ru)004:216: de ltar rgyal tshab rgyud kyi ston pa rdo rje
NK085(ru)004:217: sems dpa' la mchod brjod byas nas ci byed na
NK085(ru)004:221: gang gi don dang bshad na /
NK085(ru)004:222: lam gyi rnal 'byor rnams don phyir /
NK085(ru)004:223: 'o na rang bzo ma yin nam zhe na /
NK085(ru)004:224: rgyud gsum bldab par mi 'gyur ram zhe na /
NK085(ru)004:225: rgyud nas 'thor ba rnams mdor bsdus nas bshad par bya /
NK085(ru)004:226: 'o na lhag chad can du ma song ngam zhe na /
NK085(ru)004:227: nges par gsal byed ces pas ni khog bsdeb ste bshad pa'o //
NK085(ru)004:228: tshig don rgyas par bshad pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:229: gsang sngags ma h+aa yo ga'i sgor 'jug cing bgrod
NK085(ru)004:230: pas lam gyi rgyud la zhugs pa'i snang sems dbyer
NK085(ru)004:231: med rnal ma la blo 'byor pa'i gang zag du
NK085(ru)004:232: ma rnams kyi don bya ba'i phyir /
NK085(ru)004:234: gtor rgyud sa ma ya bkod pa'i rgyud dang gsum
NK085(ru)004:235: gyi don rnams lung rig man ngag gsum dang mi
NK085(ru)004:236: 'gal bar nges par gsal bar byed pa'i /
NK085(ru)004:237: mi 'da' bas dam tshig gsang sngags bla med kyi
NK085(ru)004:238: bsrung bya yin pas chen po rgyud nas tshig don
NK085(ru)004:239: 'thor ba rnams gzhung 'dir mdor bsdus te /
NK085(ru)004:240: slob dpon sgeg rdor gyi thugs kyis dgongs pa zhal
NK085(ru)004:241: du ma 'dres par sangs rgyas kyis phyung nas bshad
NK085(ru)004:242: par bya'o // gnyis pa dam tshig snod kyi bye
NK085(ru)004:243: brag dang sbyar ba'i dgos pa la gsum yod pa'i
NK085(ru)004:244: dang po gsang sngags kyi sgor 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor
NK085(ru)004:246: gsang sngags ma h+aa yo ga'i lam gyi rgyud la
NK085(ru)004:247: zhugsa pa'i rnal 'byor ba lam gyis bslab pa gsum
NK085(ru)004:248: la gnas par byas nas nyams su len dgos te
NK085(ru)004:249: / las dang po pas thun mong pa dang spyi'i bslab pa la 'jug dgos te /
NK085(ru)004:251: sa rnams khyad par bkod pa yang //
NK085(ru)004:252: gsang ba'i snying po 'gro ba'i lam //
NK085(ru)004:255: dang po gso sbyong sdom pa blang //
NK085(ru)004:256: de rjes kye yi rdo rje bstan //
NK085(ru)004:258: lhag pa tshul khrims kyi bslab pa 'dul ba /
NK085(ru)004:259: lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi bslab pa mdo sde /
NK085(ru)004:260: lhag pa shes rab kyi bslab pa mngon pa /
NK085(ru)004:261: lhag pa'i don ni 'jigs skyob kyi tshul khrims /
NK085(ru)004:263: nges 'byung gi tshul khrims dang gsum du yod pa las /
NK085(ru)004:264: 'dir sangs rgyas bstan pa'i rming gzhi yin pas /
NK085(ru)004:265: nges 'byung gi tshul khrims la bslab dgos /
NK085(ru)004:266: ting nge 'dzin la zhi gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
NK085(ru)004:267: lhag mthong gi ting nge 'dzin gnyis yod pa las /
NK085(ru)004:268: lhag mthong gi ting 'dzin lhag pa'i bslab pa yin no //
NK085(ru)004:269: shes rab la thos bsam sgom gsum yod pa la sgom pa'i shes rab la bslab dgos /
NK085(ru)004:270: yang theg pa'i sdom pa'i bslab pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:272: byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed kyi bslab bya /
NK085(ru)004:274: gsang sngags rang la'ang khyad par bla med rang gzhung
NK085(ru)004:275: gi lta spyod sgom gsum gyi bslab pa gsum la
NK085(ru)004:276: blo gnas par byas nas goms na /
NK085(ru)004:277: 'bras bu bdag don chos sku dang gzhan don gzugs
NK085(ru)004:278: sku gnyisa tshe 'di la mngon sum du byed pa
NK085(ru)004:279: yin yang / yang na don gnyis ni mchog thun mong gnyis sam /
NK085(ru)004:280: bdag gzhan gnyis kyi don la 'bru gnon pa yang
NK085(ru)004:281: 'dug /gnyis pa bye brag tu bstan pa'i dgos pa
NK085(ru)004:282: ni nang pa sangs rgyas pa'i ris nang tshan mi
NK085(ru)004:283: 'dra ba la la theg chung gi gang zag gis
NK085(ru)004:284: nyon mongs pa spang bya mun pa dang 'dra ba
NK085(ru)004:285: de / theg chen gyi gang zag gis spang bya snang ba dang 'dra ba'i phyir /
NK085(ru)004:286: gtan tshigs de bas na theg pa gcig gis gdul
NK085(ru)004:287: bya'i blo mtho dman kun 'dul bar 'thad pa ma
NK085(ru)004:288: yin la / gdul bya la la ste blo mthon
NK085(ru)004:289: dman rang rang gis cha dang mthun par theg pa
NK085(ru)004:290: che chung yang de ltar du spyod cing nyams su
NK085(ru)004:291: len bcug pas rang sa'i 'bras bu zin pas na
NK085(ru)004:293: gsum pa sngon byung sangs rgyas kyis kyang gdul bya'i
NK085(ru)004:294: don mdzad pa yang rang rang gi blo dang 'tshams
NK085(ru)004:295: par de ltar du bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:296: de ltar gdul blo bya'i che chung gi skabsa kyi
NK085(ru)004:297: rim pa mthon dman dang sbyar nas theg pa dgu
NK085(ru)004:298: la sogs la la spyod bcug pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:299: sngon byung du sangs rgyas kyis sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i dus su'ang de ltar du gsungsa so //
NK085(ru)004:300: gzhung la gnyis yod pa'i thog mar mdor bstan ni /
NK085(ru)004:301: gsang sngags bla med kyi sgor 'jug pa'i gang zag
NK085(ru)004:302: rnams kyis gnyer bya'i dam tshig rdo rje gsal bkra
NK085(ru)004:303: 'ad nyid gter rgyud kyi lung gis lus rnam par
NK085(ru)004:304: bzhag na bcu po 'di rnams yin no //
NK085(ru)004:305: dam tshig gi ngo bo dang /
NK085(ru)004:306: dam tshig gi rnam grangs dang /
NK085(ru)004:307: dam tshig gi srung thabs dang /
NK085(ru)004:308: dam tshig nyamas pa'i rgyu dang /
NK085(ru)004:309: dam tshig nyams pa'i snga rtagsa tshe 'di la 'byung ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:310: dam tshig nyams pa'i skyon tshe phyi ma la 'byung lugs dang /
NK085(ru)004:311: dam tshig ma nyams pa'i yon tan dang gnyis so //
NK085(ru)004:312: dam tshig nyams na skong ba'i thabsa rnams dang /
NK085(ru)004:313: legs nyes che ba'i dpe me long bcu gcig gis mtshon pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:314: mdo bzhi brjod bya'i don la bsdu ba dang bcur bshad pa ni 'di lta ste /
NK085(ru)004:315: de la ngo bo ma bstan na ngos mi zin /
NK085(ru)004:316: rnam grangs ma bstan na dbye mi shes /
NK085(ru)004:317: srung thabs ma bstan na srung bya nyams su mi lon /
NK085(ru)004:318: nyams rgyu ma bstan na bsrung mi thub /
NK085(ru)004:319: snga rtags ma bstan na yid mi ches /
NK085(ru)004:320: skyon ma bstan na bsrung bya la mi 'dzem /
NK085(ru)004:321: yon tan ma bstan na dge ba la brod pa mi skye /
NK085(ru)004:322: skong thabs ma bstan na gsang sngags thabs mang zhes bya ba dang 'gal /
NK085(ru)004:323: dpe ma bstan na legs nyes kyi don mi rig
NK085(ru)004:324: /mdo bzhi brjod bya'i don rnams gcig tu bsdu mi
NK085(ru)004:325: shes na pra yas su 'gro bas des na bcu
NK085(ru)004:326: bas nyung na mi chog /mang na lhag pa'o //
NK085(ru)004:327: gnyis pa gzhung rgyas par bshad pa la bcu yod pa'i thog mar ngo bo /
NK085(ru)004:328: de la gsum yod pa'i dang po rtsa ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:329: dam tshig gi ngo bo ngos bzung na rtsa ba'i dam tshig la byang chub sems dang /
NK085(ru)004:330: sku gsung thugs gsum dang bzhi ni rtsa ba'o //
NK085(ru)004:332: thun monga min pa la spyod pa lnga /
NK085(ru)004:337: thun mong la bdag don dang don gzhan te de ltar yan lag gi dam tshig gnyis so //
NK085(ru)004:338: gsum pa rtsa ba'i rtsa ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:339: rtsa ba bzhi'i nang nas chen po ni byang chub
NK085(ru)004:340: sems kyi dam tshig mdo bzhi dang 'brel ba 'di
NK085(ru)004:341: nyid bsrung na sum brgya drug cu'i bsrung bya lhag
NK085(ru)004:342: ma rnams mdor de nyid la 'dus shing sum brgya
NK085(ru)004:343: drug cur byung ba yang de nyid mi nyams pa'i
NK085(ru)004:345: gnyis pa rnam grangs la gnyis yod pa'i dang po mdor bstan ni /
NK085(ru)004:346: rtsa ba yan lag gi dam tshig rnam pa'i grangsa
NK085(ru)004:347: dag rgyas par bshad cing gsal bar bstan pa ni
NK085(ru)004:348: 'di lta ste / gnyis pa rgyas bshad la gnyis
NK085(ru)004:349: yod pa'i thog mar spyir dam tshig gi rnam grangs
NK085(ru)004:351: spyir rigs drug gi sems can gyi grangs la mtha' yas pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:352: sems can re re'i shes rgyud kyi log rtog gi
NK085(ru)004:353: rnams grangs la mtha' yas shing grangs med par 'phro
NK085(ru)004:354: ba ni / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas de
NK085(ru)004:355: nyid kyis kyang gangs can du bgrang bar mi mkhyen
NK085(ru)004:356: pa'i phyir gtan tshig de bas na /
NK085(ru)004:357: rnam rtog re re 'dul ba'i gnyen po dam tshig gi rnams grangs re re gsungs dgos pa la /
NK085(ru)004:358: rnam rtog la mtha' yas la de'i gnyen por dam
NK085(ru)004:359: tshig rnam grangs yang mtha' yas pa'i phyir rgyal ba
NK085(ru)004:360: sangs rgyas nyid kyis kyang brjod pa las 'das pa'o
NK085(ru)004:361: // gnyis pa bsdu na sum brgya drug cu la 'dus pa'o //
NK085(ru)004:362: de la gnyis yod pa'i thog mar grangs 'ong ba'i rgyu mtshan ni /
NK085(ru)004:363: 'on kyang sems can blo rmongas pa rnams kyi don
NK085(ru)004:364: la dgongs nas mdor bsdus tsam zhig ngos bzung na
NK085(ru)004:365: 'di lta ste / gnyis pa rnam grangs dngos la
NK085(ru)004:366: gsum yod pa'i thog mar rtsa ba'i rnam grangs ni
NK085(ru)004:367: 'di lta ste / / byang chub sems kyi dam
NK085(ru)004:368: tshig la don dam kun rdzob rnam pa gnyis dang
NK085(ru)004:369: 'di lta ste / / / sku'i dam tshig la /
NK085(ru)004:373: chag nyams bskong ba'i slob dpon /
NK085(ru)004:374: shes rgyud grol ba'i slob dpon /
NK085(ru)004:375: man ngag lung gi slob dpon dang drug /spyi'i mched /
NK085(ru)004:378: 'dres pa'i mched dang bzhi ste sdoms pas bcu'o //
NK085(ru)004:380: rgyu ma nor rtsa ba'i sngags /
NK085(ru)004:382: bskul pa las kyi sngagas te gsum dang /
NK085(ru)004:385: thugs dam tshig gi phyag rgya /
NK085(ru)004:386: 'phro 'du 'phrin las kyi phyag rgya ste bzhi dang bsdoms pas bdun no //
NK085(ru)004:390: gsang bar 'os pa gnyen gtad pa gnyis dang gasnga ba bcu'o //
NK085(ru)004:391: de ltar nyi shu rtsa dgu ni rtsa ba'i dam tshig rnam grangs yin par shes par bya'o //
NK085(ru)004:392: gnyis pa thun mong ma yin pa'i yan lag gi grangs ni /
NK085(ru)004:393: spyad pa lnga la nang tshan dbye na /
NK085(ru)004:396: ma byin pa len pa la bcu bdun /
NK085(ru)004:397: rdzun du smra ba la bcu bdun /
NK085(ru)004:398: ngag barlanga po la bco lnga dang /
NK085(ru)004:399: spyir brgyad cu rtsa gsum yod /
NK085(ru)004:401: yang dag pa'i dug lnga la lta spyod gnyis gnyis su phye bas bcu /
NK085(ru)004:402: log dus lnga dang bco lnga yod /
NK085(ru)004:403: dang du blanga ba la rtsa ba'i bdud rtsi lnga dang /
NK085(ru)004:406: ngo bos grub pa re re la lnga lnga /
NK085(ru)004:407: rang bzhin gyis grub pa la rig lnga ye shes lnga dang sum cu yod /
NK085(ru)004:408: bsgrub par bya ba la'ang de bzhin du lnga las dbye na bzhi cu zhe lnga yod /
NK085(ru)004:409: shes par bya ba lnga la bdun cu ste /
NK085(ru)004:410: de rnams ni yo ga man chad dang thun mong min par bshad de /
NK085(ru)004:411: rnama grangs kyi yan lag rgyas bshad ni 'og srung thabs kyi skabs su shes par bya'o //
NK085(ru)004:412: gsum pa thun mong yan lag gi rnams grangs ni /
NK085(ru)004:413: thun monga gi dam tshiga gi rnam grangs la mtha' yasa pa zhig yod kyang /
NK085(ru)004:414: mdora bsdus na bdag don dang gzhan don gnyis po la 'dus te /
NK085(ru)004:415: de la bdag don nyer gcig gzhan don zhe bzhi'i
NK085(ru)004:416: rnam grangsa rgyas bshad ni 'og srung thabs kyi skabsa
NK085(ru)004:418: gzhan yang nyams rgyu nyi shu /
NK085(ru)004:419: rang bzhin gzhi'i mdo min pa mdo gsum brtsis pas sum brgya drug cu yod do //
NK085(ru)004:420: gsum pa srung thabs la gsum yod pa'i dang po mdor bstan ni /
NK085(ru)004:421: dam tshig srung ba'i thabs rnams rgyas par bshad cing gsal bar bstan pa ni 'di lta ste /
NK085(ru)004:423: bsrung zhes pa'i don ni bran mo chu khur ba lta bu zhig dgos /
NK085(ru)004:424: de'i gtan rgyud ni dper na rgyal po gtum la
NK085(ru)004:425: mgu dka' ba zhig gi 'khor shin tu dman pa
NK085(ru)004:426: bran mo gcig gis 'bri mar gyi mar khu skyogs
NK085(ru)004:427: gang bzung nas 'dam pa'i khrod cig la 'gro ste
NK085(ru)004:428: / rgyab na ral gri rnon po can cig 'gro nas /
NK085(ru)004:429: gal te thigs pa gcig bo na mgo breg par byed la /
NK085(ru)004:430: gnas su skyol nas ni bya dga' chen po sbyin
NK085(ru)004:431: zhes pa'i phyi rol du glu gar dang rol mo
NK085(ru)004:432: la sogs pa'i ltas mo'i rnam pa ci yod kyang
NK085(ru)004:433: / de la dbang po mi yeng kho rang gis
NK085(ru)004:434: de la bsgrims pa ltar 'bang dang 'dra ba'i rnal
NK085(ru)004:436: rgyal po dang 'dra ba'i slob dpon gyis phong ba'i
NK085(ru)004:437: mar khu dang 'dra ba'i dam tshig shin tu bsrung
NK085(ru)004:438: dka' ba de / mgo breg pa dang 'dra bar
NK085(ru)004:439: gal te nyams na ngan song gsum du sdug bsngal
NK085(ru)004:440: dka' ba de / la / legs par bsrung thub na /
NK085(ru)004:441: bya dga' dang 'dra ba'i mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub rnams mngon du 'byin pas /
NK085(ru)004:442: ltas mo dang 'dra ba'i 'jig rten rnam g.yeng gi
NK085(ru)004:443: dbang du mi gtang bar rang gis dam tshig la
NK085(ru)004:445: gnyis pa srung thabs rgyas bshad la gnyis yod pa'i
NK085(ru)004:446: dang po rtsa ba'i dam tshig /de la lnga yod
NK085(ru)004:447: pa'i dang po byang chub sems kyi dam tshig /de
NK085(ru)004:448: la bzhi yod pa'i dang po kun rdzob byang chub
NK085(ru)004:450: rang gi lus kyi phung khams dang skye mched thams
NK085(ru)004:451: cad ye gdod ma nas rgyal ba'i dal bzhi bcu
NK085(ru)004:452: rtsa gnyis kyi sku phyag rgya chen po yin no
NK085(ru)004:453: // de yang phung po lnga rigs lnga /
NK085(ru)004:455: dbang shes bzhi ni nang gi sems dpa' bzhi /
NK085(ru)004:457: dbang po bzhi phyi'i sems dpa' bzhi'i /
NK085(ru)004:459: lus kyi dbang po rnam shes dbang yul gsum 'dus kyi reg pa dang bzhi ni khro bo bzhi /
NK085(ru)004:460: rtag chad bdag lta mtshan mar lta ba bzhi khro mo bzhi /
NK085(ru)004:461: nyon mongs drug thub pa drug /yid byed pa po kun tu bzang po /
NK085(ru)004:462: chos bya ba mo kun tu bzang mor bstan pa
NK085(ru)004:463: de bzhin du rigs drug gi semsa can thams cad
NK085(ru)004:464: kyi phung po khamsa dang skye mched thams cad kyang
NK085(ru)004:465: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du gnas pa de ltar du
NK085(ru)004:467: 'o na de ltar du snang ba rnams gdos bcas ma yin nam zhe na /
NK085(ru)004:468: ma yin te snang stong gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi sku phyag rgya chen po yin no //
NK085(ru)004:469: gnyis pa don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems ni /
NK085(ru)004:470: rang lus kyis byas pa mig gis gzugs mthong ba
NK085(ru)004:471: lces ro zos pa la sogs tshogs drug gi snang
NK085(ru)004:472: ba thamsa cad la shar dus semsa rang yin pa'i
NK085(ru)004:473: phyira sems dngos po ganga du yang ma grub pas
NK085(ru)004:474: na lus kyis bya ba byas pa /
NK085(ru)004:475: mig gis gzugs snang ba la sogs tshogs drug gi
NK085(ru)004:476: snang ba rang rgyud du grub pa med de stong
NK085(ru)004:477: / stong bzhin du shes bya sna tshogs la shar ba'o //
NK085(ru)004:478: de ltar bskyed rdzogs kyi don de nyid dran pa
NK085(ru)004:479: dang shes bzhin gyi bya ra ba sngon du btang
NK085(ru)004:480: la dus gsum rgyun chad med par rang gis rgyud
NK085(ru)004:482: gsum pa de dag dang mi ldan pa'i nyes dmigs ni /
NK085(ru)004:483: de ltar bskyed rdzogs kyi don de nyid dus gsum rgyun du ma dran na /
NK085(ru)004:484: theg pa mchog gsang sngagsa pa'i rnal 'byor par ci zhig tshud de mi tshud do //
NK085(ru)004:485: bzhi pa gang gi srung ba'i rnal 'byor pa'i mtshan nyid ni /
NK085(ru)004:486: lta ba bden gnyis dbyer med rtogs /
NK085(ru)004:487: spyod pa de dang ya mi 'bral bar khyer /
NK085(ru)004:488: dam tshig de dang 'da' nyams med cing ting nge 'dzin 'brel ba'i rnal 'byor pa zhig dgos so //
NK085(ru)004:489: gnyis pa sku'i dam tshig la srung ba'i thabs la
NK085(ru)004:490: gnyis yod pa'i dang po slob dpon gyi dam tshig
NK085(ru)004:491: /de la bzhi yod pa'i dang po sngon du bsrung
NK085(ru)004:493: thun mong gi skyabs sdom zhus pa yan chad ni spyi'i slob dpon dang /
NK085(ru)004:494: dbang zhu ba'i nub mo rdo rje slob dpon gyi mdun khrid mi ni 'dren pa'i slob dpon dang /
NK085(ru)004:495: dam tshig dbog cing dbang bskur mkhan ni dam tshig dbang gi slob dpon dang /
NK085(ru)004:496: gsang sngags kyi rgyud gzhung zhus pa ni rang gi
NK085(ru)004:497: shes rgyud grol bar byed pa'i slob dpon yin la
NK085(ru)004:498: / bskyed rdzogs kyi khrid rim kyi ngo sprod mkhan
NK085(ru)004:499: ni man ngaga lunga gi slob dpon yin pa de
NK085(ru)004:500: / rnams la / gnyis pa bsrung ba'i tshul mtshon pa dpe'i grangs ni /
NK085(ru)004:501: spyi'i slob dpon yul la dbang ba'i rgyal po'i bka'
NK085(ru)004:502: 'og na chud pa rnams kyis de nyid khrims dang
NK085(ru)004:503: mi 'gal bar byed dgos pas de tsam du bskur
NK085(ru)004:504: ba dang / 'dren pa'i slob dpon ni rgyal bu
NK085(ru)004:505: gdan sa pha khu bos bzhag dgos pas de tsam
NK085(ru)004:507: dam tshig dbang gis slob dpon ni mas rang gi lus bskyed pas de tsam du bskur ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:508: chag nyams skong ba'i slob dpon ni phas rang la
NK085(ru)004:509: nyes pa 'ong na bsal bas de tsam du bskur
NK085(ru)004:510: ba dang / shes rgyud grol ba'i slob dpon ni
NK085(ru)004:511: mig gis mthong bar byed pas de tsam du bskur
NK085(ru)004:512: ba dang / ba dang / man ngag lung gi
NK085(ru)004:513: slob dpon ni snying med na lus po gzhan yod
NK085(ru)004:514: pa don med pas de tsam du bskur dgos pa
NK085(ru)004:515: ba dang / ba dang / de bas / slob
NK085(ru)004:516: dpon ni rnam mkhyen gyi 'bras bu bskyed pa'i lam
NK085(ru)004:517: ston mkhan yin pas gong gi dpe de rnams pas
NK085(ru)004:518: lhag pa'i tshul du lta ste bskur bar bya'o //
NK085(ru)004:520: rang gi lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo gsum du zola te rdzun dang /
NK085(ru)004:521: rgyu ni nus pa la mi nus pa'i tshul du byed pa de rnams med par bsrung ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:522: dper na yi dam gyi lha rgyun du bsgom pa
NK085(ru)004:523: ltar slob dpon la dad mos rgyun du bsam zhing
NK085(ru)004:524: spyod lam thams cad du ci ltar mnyes pa ltar
NK085(ru)004:525: bya'o // bzhi pa lhag ma sku'i dam tshig spyir bstan pa la shes par bya ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:526: srung thabs kyi rim pa rgyas bshad ni 'og mched
NK085(ru)004:527: dang thun mong du 'chad pa bzhin du shes par
NK085(ru)004:528: bya'o // gnyis pa mched kyi dam tshig la gnyis
NK085(ru)004:529: yod pa'i dang po mched du 'brel ba'i bye brag
NK085(ru)004:530: /de dag la lnga yod pa'i dang po byams pa
NK085(ru)004:531: dang snying rje'i yul du gyur pa spyi'i mched ni
NK085(ru)004:532: bya'o // / theg pa chen po'i lugs kyi khams gsum thams cad spyi'i mched yin gsungs kyang /
NK085(ru)004:533: 'dir gzhung rang dang gsang sngags kyi lugs kyi gzhi
NK085(ru)004:534: lam 'bras gsum gyi sgo nas bsgrub na 'thad par
NK085(ru)004:535: mthong ngo // de la spyir nam mkha' la mtha' yas /
NK085(ru)004:536: des khyab pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams la mtha' yas /
NK085(ru)004:537: de la gnas pa'i semsa can mtha' yas pa rnams ni /
NK085(ru)004:538: rang rig pa'i ye shes kyi 'char sgo las snang ba'i phyir /
NK085(ru)004:540: snod bcud gang ltar snang yang /
NK085(ru)004:541: bskyed rim gyi sgo nas lha'i sku gsung thugs yin pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:542: rdzogs rim gyi sgo nas rig pa bdag nyid chen po //
NK085(ru)004:543: rang snang las ma gtogs pa'i yul gzhan rang rgyud
NK085(ru)004:544: du grub pa min pa'i phyir spun yin pa dang
NK085(ru)004:545: / gzhi'i dus su khams bder gshegas snying por gcig pa'i spun yin pa'i phyir dang /
NK085(ru)004:547: gang zag sgos btsan sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa'i phyir spun yin no //
NK085(ru)004:548: des na gtan tshigs gsum gyis khams gsum sems can thams cad mched yin no //
NK085(ru)004:549: spyi yi mchod sems can de rnams la pha tshan bzang po bzhin du bsrung bar bya'o //
NK085(ru)004:550: gnyis pa bstan pa la zhugs pa ring ba'i mched ni /
NK085(ru)004:551: nang pa sangs rgyas pa'i chos sgor zhugs pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:552: nye ba'i mched ltos na ring ba'i mched yin pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:553: gsum pa sngags su zhes pa nye ba'i mched ni /
NK085(ru)004:554: gsang sngags kyi sgor zhugs pa'i lta spyod mthun pa ni nye ba'i mched yin par bshad do //
NK085(ru)004:555: bzhi pa dal gcig tu zhugs pa 'dres pa'i mched ni /
NK085(ru)004:556: pha bla ma gcig la dkyil 'khor gcig la brten
NK085(ru)004:557: nas dbang thob dam tshig gi nang 'dres na 'dres
NK085(ru)004:559: lnga pa de dag la bsrung lugs mtshon tshul gyi dpe bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:560: ring ba'i mched la pha sde gcig gi nang tshan bzang po bzhin du bsrung /
NK085(ru)004:561: nye ba'i mched la pha spun bzang po bzhin du bsrung /
NK085(ru)004:562: 'dres pa'i mched la spun bzang po bzhin du bsrung dgos so //
NK085(ru)004:563: mched ni byang chub sgrub pa'i grogs yin pas de
NK085(ru)004:564: bas kyang lhag par lta ste bsrung ba'i tshul ni
NK085(ru)004:565: / gsum pa sku'i dam tshig bsrung thabs thun mong
NK085(ru)004:566: du bstan pa la bzhi yod pa'i dang po lus
NK085(ru)004:568: de la drug yod pa'i dang po mchod sbyin gyi sgo nas mnyes par bya ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:569: lus kyi sgo nas zas nor ci 'byor pa phul
NK085(ru)004:570: nas man ngag dang grogs gong ma mnyes par byas
NK085(ru)004:571: pa la / dper na sbur ma lta bur ser
NK085(ru)004:572: sna phangs pa med pa'i sgo nas mnyes par bya'o
NK085(ru)004:573: pa la / // gnyis pa zhabs 'bring bya ba'i tshul ni /
NK085(ru)004:574: bla ma dang grogs gong ma la gar bzhugs pa'i sar gdan gting ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:575: byon dus la 'dam rdzab dang chu la khur ba'am /
NK085(ru)004:576: khur po khur rogs byed pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:577: sogs kyi sgras gzim mal dang /
NK085(ru)004:579: na bza' bskon pa la sogs zhabs 'bring gi las bya ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:580: mi mos mi dad med par rang gnyer gyis brana bzhin du blang bar bya'o //
NK085(ru)004:581: gsum pa bla ma'i nye 'khor la yang grogs ltar bya ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:583: nye 'khor la yang mched la bsrung ba de bzhin du bsrung dgos pa yin no //
NK085(ru)004:584: bzhi pa gnang ba med pa'i nor rdzas blang ba spang ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:585: bla mas ma gnang ba'i nor dang zas la 'dod
NK085(ru)004:586: zhen gyi sgo nas blang ba ni rnama smin shin
NK085(ru)004:587: tu che bas ngan song kha brgyud pa'i phyir na
NK085(ru)004:588: / tha ma til 'bru tsam yanga mi 'bag cing bsrung bar bya'o //
NK085(ru)004:589: lnga pa bla ma'i gdan la sogs pa la bag med du spyod pa'i nyes pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:590: mal stan dang gos dang chas kyi bye brag gdugs la sogs pa rnams dang /
NK085(ru)004:591: sogs kyi sgras zhabs 'bring min pa sku'i grib ma dang /
NK085(ru)004:592: bzhon pa ma gnang bar zhon pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:594: chags lam pa yin na btsun mo dang de rnams bgom par mi bya'o //
NK085(ru)004:595: gal te bgom na mchod rten bshig pa ni nye
NK085(ru)004:596: ba lnga'i gcig yin pa de dang 'dra bar dgongs
NK085(ru)004:597: 'dus dang gsang ba spyi rgyud las gsungs so //
NK085(ru)004:598: drug pa dman pa'i spyod pa bzhi rtse mor yang spang ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:602: phrogsa pa de dag gi spyod pa rnams ni /
NK085(ru)004:603: dngos su bya ba lta ci smos kyi /
NK085(ru)004:604: rtse mo'i las su bya ba'ang min te mi bya'o //
NK085(ru)004:605: gnyis pa ngag gi sgo nas srung thabs ni /
NK085(ru)004:606: ngag gi sgo nas bla ma dang grogs kyi skyon
NK085(ru)004:607: rnams sba zhing yon tan thams cad bsgrag par bya'o
NK085(ru)004:608: // lkog tu 'dra tshul brjod pa ni dam tshig nyams par 'gyur bas spang la /
NK085(ru)004:609: skyon med pa la yod zer nas sgro btags pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:610: yon tan yod pa la med zer nas skur pa btab pa'i rdzun la sogsa phra ma /
NK085(ru)004:613: dpe phog /rta bgad ngan pa'i mtshan nyid de dag
NK085(ru)004:614: /ku re'am bre mo'i dal gtam du yang zur tsam
NK085(ru)004:616: bla ma dang grogs kyis zer na nyes pa med do //
NK085(ru)004:617: gsum pa yid kyi sgo nas srung thabs ni /
NK085(ru)004:618: yid kyi sgo nas bla ma dang grogs po la
NK085(ru)004:619: dngos su nyes pa khas mi len pas g.yo dang
NK085(ru)004:620: / rang la yon tan yod pa ltar byed pas sgyu dang /
NK085(ru)004:621: gzhan la yon tan yod pa la mi 'dod pa 'phrag dog dang /
NK085(ru)004:622: rang bas dma' ba'i thabs kyis rngan brdung ba'i semsa /
NK085(ru)004:623: bla ma dang grogs po'i spyod pa mi legs pa dpyad pa'i semsa dang /
NK085(ru)004:624: bla ma dang grogs po la nor rdzas snang ba
NK085(ru)004:625: la barkam chags 'dod sems kyis brnab pa rnams ni
NK085(ru)004:626: / se gol gcig gi yun du'ang bsam par mi bya ste /
NK085(ru)004:627: slob dpon dang grogs po la dang pa shin tu yid gdung zhing sems brtse bar bya'o //
NK085(ru)004:628: bzhi pa srungs ba'i yon tan ni /
NK085(ru)004:629: de ltar spyod lam 'gro nyal 'dug sdod la cis
NK085(ru)004:630: kyang slob dpon dang grogs po mnyes par byed cing
NK085(ru)004:631: / gsung gi bka' tshig zur tsam yang mi gcod
NK085(ru)004:632: pa'i rnal 'byor pa de ni 'khor ba la phyir
NK085(ru)004:633: ldog par rgyal ba kun bzang gis ma gsungsa te
NK085(ru)004:634: / / dam tshig bkod pa'i rgyud las /
NK085(ru)004:635: dam tshig ma nyams par bsrung na //
NK085(ru)004:636: kun tu bzang dang skal pa mnyam pa yin no //
NK085(ru)004:638: de yang gnang bkag gi bye brag gis bsrung ba yin pas /
NK085(ru)004:639: bka' bcag kyang mi sto ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:641: bdud dang bar chad slob dpon gyi cha byad du byung ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:643: chang dbang gdon dbang du song ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:646: sdig pa'i las la bskul ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:647: bka' bden pa mi ston zhing /
NK085(ru)004:648: mu stegs dang log pa'i phyogs ston par byed na bka' bcag par mi sto ste /
NK085(ru)004:650: grogs po yang dkar po la smad cing nag po la bstod pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:651: dad pa can gyi tshig bcag cing /
NK085(ru)004:652: dge ba can gyi thugs dkrugs pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:653: bka' dang dam tshig las 'gal zhing /
NK085(ru)004:654: mched la brtse gdung med cing 'khu ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:655: chos la mi dad cing dge ba la mi gus na /
NK085(ru)004:658: gnyis pa gsung gi dam tshig bsrung ba la bzhi yod pa'i dang po sngags gsum bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:659: zhi ba ltar na h'u ni rgyu ma nor rtsa ba'i sngags dang /
NK085(ru)004:660: badz+ra d+h+rika ni rdo rje sems dpa'i bskyed pa'i skyen sngags yin pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:661: rtsa sngags dang bskyed sngags dril ba ni bskul pa las sngags dang gsum mo //
NK085(ru)004:664: badz+ra ma h+aa sh+ri he ru ka bskyed sngags /
NK085(ru)004:665: ma h+aa tsan+da sarba dush+tana ta ka ha na da
NK085(ru)004:666: ha p+aa tsa h'u h'u h'u phata ni las sngags
NK085(ru)004:667: so // gnyis pa phyag rgya bzhi bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:668: thugs dam tshig gi phyag rgya la gung mo la
NK085(ru)004:669: sogs pa'i rtse mo dang thugs kar rdo rje la
NK085(ru)004:670: sogs pa rang rang gi phyag mtshan bsam pa ni
NK085(ru)004:671: / bsam pa dam tshig phyag rgya'o //
NK085(ru)004:672: 'bru bzhi sbas nas gung mo la sogs pa lnga
NK085(ru)004:673: rim pa ltar gyen du bgreng ba thugs kar bkan
NK085(ru)004:675: bca' ba dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
NK085(ru)004:677: yum la 'khyud par bsam pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:678: bsam pa las kyi phyag rgya'o //
NK085(ru)004:679: yum la 'khril ba'i tshul gyi barla g.yon pa chos
NK085(ru)004:680: kyi rig la brten pa'i phyag rgya dngos su bca'
NK085(ru)004:681: ba ni / bca' ba las rgya yin pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:682: gsung chos kyi phyag rgya la /
NK085(ru)004:683: sngags brjod pa ni bzlas pa chos kyi phyag dang /
NK085(ru)004:684: phyag rgya'i rtse mo dang thugs kar yig 'bru bsgom pa ni bsam pa chos kyi phyag rgya yin /
NK085(ru)004:685: sku nyid phyag rgya chen po ni lha'i sku dbu'i
NK085(ru)004:686: gtsug tor nas 'og gi gdan khri'i bar gsal bar
NK085(ru)004:688: gsum pa phyag rgya bzhi po de dag bsgom zhing sngags gsum bzlas pa'i yon tan ni /
NK085(ru)004:689: rnal 'byor pa rang gi lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo gsum ni /
NK085(ru)004:690: yi dama gyi lha'i sku gsunga thugs kyi phyag rgya
NK085(ru)004:691: bzhi yin pa la lta bas rtogs shing ting nge
NK085(ru)004:692: 'dzin gyis rab tu sbyor la sgom pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:693: sngags gsum dus rtag tu bzlas pa byed pa'i yon tan ni /
NK085(ru)004:695: chub pa snang ba dbyer med pa'i don gyis bzung
NK085(ru)004:696: bas na 'khor ba la mi ldog cing sangs rgyas
NK085(ru)004:697: kyi sa la zhugsa pa yin no //
NK085(ru)004:698: kun slong nyon mongs pa dug gsum gyis bslang ba'i sgo nas bzlas bsgom byed na /
NK085(ru)004:699: de ltar ma yin te phal cher ngan song du gzhol ces dgongs 'dus las gsungs so //
NK085(ru)004:700: bzhi pa yun gyi tshad bstan pa la gnyis yod
NK085(ru)004:701: pa'i dang po yun gyi tshad bstan cing de dag
NK085(ru)004:702: dang mi ldan pa'i nyes dmigs ni /
NK085(ru)004:703: rnal 'byor pa rab kyis rgyun chad med pa chu bo'i gzhung bzhin nam /
NK085(ru)004:704: rab kyi 'bring gis nyin thun gsum mtshan thun gsum ste thun drug gam /
NK085(ru)004:705: rab kyi tha mas nyin gcig la lha lan gcig
NK085(ru)004:706: tu sgom zhing sems ting nge 'dzin ma yengs pa
NK085(ru)004:707: tsam gyi ngang nas ngag gis sngags bzlas /
NK085(ru)004:708: rnal 'byor pa 'bring gis rab kyi zla ba gcig la dus drug tu phyes te /
NK085(ru)004:716: 'bring gi 'bring zla ba gcig la dus bzhi ste nya stong gsum nyi shu dgu dang bzhi /
NK085(ru)004:717: 'bring gi tha ma'i zla ba gcig la dus bzang
NK085(ru)004:718: gsum gyi bar bar du lha sgom zhing sngags rgyun
NK085(ru)004:720: tha ma brtson 'grus zhan cing gzhan gyis dpyad pa'i rnal 'byor pas kyang /
NK085(ru)004:721: zla re'i nang du lha lan re sgom pa'am /
NK085(ru)004:722: tha ma'i 'bring gis lo gcig la ra ba bzhi'i dus dag tu sgom bzlas byed dgos so //
NK085(ru)004:723: tha ma'i tha mar gyur pa des lo gcig la thang gcig gi dus su bsgom bzlas byed dgos /
NK085(ru)004:724: de ltar sgom bzlas la brtsona par 'bad de mi byed pa na /
NK085(ru)004:725: byang chub thob pa'i sa bon brlagsa pa yin pas sangs rgyas mi thob bo //
NK085(ru)004:726: gnyis pa tshogs gtor yang yun de dang 'dra ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:727: tshogsa dang gtor ma'i yun yang gang gi rab 'bring tha ma'i de bzhina du byed pa yin la /
NK085(ru)004:728: tha ma yang tshogsa lo mi bzla /
NK085(ru)004:730: dus 'di rnams ni las dang po mos pa lam
NK085(ru)004:731: khyer nas bzung ste mthar mngon du ma gyur par
NK085(ru)004:733: 'o na gsung gi dam tshig gi skabs su sgom pa ting nge 'dzin byung zhe na /
NK085(ru)004:734: sgom bzlas gnyis 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
NK085(ru)004:735: gsum pa thugs kyi dam tshig la gnyis yod pa'i dang po gsang bya'i ngo bo /
NK085(ru)004:736: de la bzhi yod pa'i dang po spyir sngags su zhugs nas gsang dgos pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:737: lta ba zab mo bden gnyis dbyer med mi rtogs /
NK085(ru)004:738: spyod pa sbyor sgrol la sogs barlanga mo rang khar byed pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:739: yi dam gyi lha ma gsang na dngos grub yal bas lta spyod sgom gsum gcig tu bartsi'o //
NK085(ru)004:740: dbang gi gsang mtshan gyi ming bshad na bar du gcod /
NK085(ru)004:741: dbang bsgrub dus kyi gzungsa ma bshad na gzhan mi dad pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:742: sgrub pa byed dus kyi grub rtagsa rnams bshad na mi grub pas /
NK085(ru)004:743: spyir dus kun tu gsang bya rnam pa bzhi yin
NK085(ru)004:744: par ston pa rdo rje 'chang gis rgyud thams cad
NK085(ru)004:745: du bshad do // gnyis pa khyad par sgrub pa'i dus kyi gsang ba bzhi ni /
NK085(ru)004:748: rdzas 'di dgos zhes sgrub pa ma tshar bar bu rab tu gsang la bsgrub par bya'o //
NK085(ru)004:749: gsum pa gsang bar 'os pa'i rnam grangs mdor bsdus pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:750: spyir gsang sngags su zhugs nas gsang bar 'os pa
NK085(ru)004:751: mang du yod kyang mdor bsdus na 'di lta ste
NK085(ru)004:753: nang mchod rnams lnga la mkho ba'i sha khrag gi phud dang /
NK085(ru)004:754: dam rdzas lnga la sogs pa'i gtor ma'i rgyu dang /
NK085(ru)004:755: tshogs dag gi yo byad sha chang rnams dang /
NK085(ru)004:756: sman bsgrub pa'i rten yon tan 'byung nus pa'i b+han+ha mtshan ldan dang /
NK085(ru)004:757: phur bu bsgrub pa'i rten rab gnas can gyi phur pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:758: yang dag bsgrub pa'i rten mar me'i snod zla gam bang rim gsum dang ldan pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:759: de yang mar me dgu pa la de 'dra dgu dang /
NK085(ru)004:760: gcig pa la de 'dra ba gcig dang /
NK085(ru)004:762: mchog phur bzhi'i phur bu dang /
NK085(ru)004:765: sgal tshigs gsar rnying la sogs pa'i bsgrub rdzas rnams dang /
NK085(ru)004:766: gsang sngags nang pa'i rdor dril /
NK085(ru)004:769: rkang gi dung dang gling bu la sogs pa'i lag cha dang /
NK085(ru)004:770: dkyil 'khor bri zhing rgyan dgod pa de rnams skye bo tha mal pas mthong bar mi bya'o //
NK085(ru)004:772: nang gi dril bu dang gsang ba'i rngil chung la sogsa pa lha cha'i sgra rnams ni /
NK085(ru)004:773: skye bo tha mal pas thos par yang mi brdung ngo //
NK085(ru)004:774: 'o na dril bu rngil chung gnyis thang gnyis byung zhe na /
NK085(ru)004:775: mthong thos kyi khyad par yin no //
NK085(ru)004:776: ngan pa'i spyod pa rnams gsang ba ni byang chub
NK085(ru)004:777: kyi rgyu yin pas rang gis grogsa po'i spyod pa
NK085(ru)004:779: gzhan yang ngan pa'i mtshang rnams dang /
NK085(ru)004:780: semsa cana kun gyi rku ba la sogs ngan pa'i spyod pa rnams dang /
NK085(ru)004:781: sems can kun la gnod pa'i thabs la dug sbyor /
NK085(ru)004:782: rgya snyi la sogs pa ngan pa'i spyod pa rnams
NK085(ru)004:783: rang gi shes pa de dag /gzhan la shin tu
NK085(ru)004:784: gsang ba ni byang chub thob pa'i thabs kyi rgyu
NK085(ru)004:785: yin no // bzhi pa gnyer gtad pa'i dam tshig ni /
NK085(ru)004:786: de ltar skyon mi che na yang gzhan gyis gsang zhes gnyer gtad pa ni dama pa yin te /
NK085(ru)004:787: gang gis gnyer gtad na sngar sku'i dam tshig gi
NK085(ru)004:788: skabs su bshad pa'i slob dpon dang mched rnams kyis
NK085(ru)004:789: gsang zer na gsang dgos so //
NK085(ru)004:790: gnyis pa gsang thabs gsum yod pa'i dang po gsang ba'i dgos ched ni /
NK085(ru)004:791: gsang sngagsa rang la skyon yod nas gsang dgos pa ma yin te /
NK085(ru)004:792: sems can gzhan gyi don bya ba'i phyir rab tu gsang dgos te /
NK085(ru)004:793: ma gsang na gsang sngags kyi lta ba zab mo
NK085(ru)004:794: mi rtogs spyod pa barlanga mo rang khar spyod pa'am
NK085(ru)004:795: / gang gi rdzas zab mo rnams mthong na mi
NK085(ru)004:796: dad pas gsang sngags la skur pa btab pas ngan
NK085(ru)004:797: / song du 'agro'o // rang don du gsang thub
NK085(ru)004:798: na bsgrub pa'i dngos grub mi yal na 'bras bu
NK085(ru)004:799: thob pas na gzhan la gsang ba'i phyir lus kyi
NK085(ru)004:800: brda dang ngag gi brda mi 'dra ba sna tshogsa
NK085(ru)004:801: shig rngam glog la sogs pa'i rgyud sde rnams su
NK085(ru)004:802: / song du 'agro'o // gsungsa so // brda 'di'i don ni /
NK085(ru)004:803: rgya gar na brda dang brda'i lan la ma mkhas na /
NK085(ru)004:804: gsang sngags kyi tshogs 'khor la 'dug ra med /
NK085(ru)004:805: rgya gar na rnal 'byor pa gcig gis gdan bzhi'i
NK085(ru)004:806: brda shes gcig gis dgyes rdor gyi brda shes pas
NK085(ru)004:807: khong gnyis brda ma mthun pas rdo rje spun du
NK085(ru)004:808: ma gyur / rnal 'byor pho mo gnyis kyis dgyes
NK085(ru)004:809: rdor gyi brda shes pa 'dra 'dra gnyis 'dzom pas
NK085(ru)004:810: rdo rje mched dang lcam bral du 'gyur ro //
NK085(ru)004:815: brda' byed pa la dgos ched ci yod ce na /
NK085(ru)004:816: bzlas bsgom gyi thun mtshams su nus pa mi yal ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:817: so so skye bo tha mal pa dang theg pa
NK085(ru)004:818: 'og ma rnams kyi sngon du gsang don brjod du
NK085(ru)004:820: gnyis pa gsang ba'i yul ni /
NK085(ru)004:821: gang la gsang na dang po dam tshig mnos kyang
NK085(ru)004:822: phyogs re nyams pas dam nyamsa kun nyams pas dam
NK085(ru)004:824: dam tshig ma mnos pa'i dam med dkyil 'khor ma
NK085(ru)004:825: mthong zhing dbang ma thob pa'i skye bo tha mal
NK085(ru)004:826: pa dang / de ltar rang dang 'dres pa'i mched yin kyang nyams pa can dang /
NK085(ru)004:827: rang dang ma 'dres pa'i nyams pa can thamsa cad la gsang ngo //
NK085(ru)004:829: rang dang 'dres pa'i mched dam tshig ma nyams pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:830: ma 'dres pa'i mched dam tshig ma nyams pa gang yin kyang /
NK085(ru)004:831: bsgrub rogs min na sgrub pa ma tshar bar du gsang bar bya'o //
NK085(ru)004:832: gsum pa sgo gsum gyis gsang ba'i thabs ni /
NK085(ru)004:833: de ltar gsang bya'i yul rnams la gsang dgos te /
NK085(ru)004:834: de dag la semsa kyis sgo nas bstan para mi bsam zhing /
NK085(ru)004:835: lus kyi sgo nas gsang dgos kyi rdzas rnams thamsa cada sbasa nas kyang /
NK085(ru)004:836: ngag gi sgo nas gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i
NK085(ru)004:837: don snang stong gnyis med rtogs nas smra nus pa'i
NK085(ru)004:838: lce yod kyang gsang dgos rnams brjod pa dag tu
NK085(ru)004:839: bya ba min te mi brjod do //
NK085(ru)004:840: lnga pa zhabs bsdu ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:841: dper na shing rtsa ba chad na yan lag don
NK085(ru)004:842: med pa bzhin byang chub sems sku gsung thugs kyi
NK085(ru)004:843: dam tshig ma bsrungs na bsrung bya gzhan rnams don
NK085(ru)004:844: med pas na / de dag rtsa ba'i dam tshig bzhi yin par kun bzang gis bshad do //
NK085(ru)004:845: gnyis pa yan lag gi dam tshig la gnyis yod
NK085(ru)004:846: pa'i dang po khyad par gyi yan lag /de la
NK085(ru)004:847: gnyis yod pa'i dang po dam bca' ba'i ngos nas
NK085(ru)004:849: yo ga man chad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i
NK085(ru)004:850: yan lag bshad par bya ba ni 'di lta ste
NK085(ru)004:851: / gnyis pa rgyas bshad la lnga yod pa'i dang
NK085(ru)004:852: po spyad par bya ba'i dam tshig /de la gnyis
NK085(ru)004:853: yod pa'i dang po mdor bstan ni /
NK085(ru)004:856: ma byin pa len pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:858: ngag barlanga po ste spyad pa lnga'o //
NK085(ru)004:859: gnyis pa rgyas bshad la bzhi yod pa'i dang po sbyor sgrol thun mong du bstan pa /
NK085(ru)004:860: de la gnyis yod pa'i dang po sbyor sgrol dbye ba spyir bstan pa /
NK085(ru)004:861: de la bdun yod pa'i dang po rang bzhin lta ba'i sbyor sgrol ni /
NK085(ru)004:862: don dam pa rang bzhin ma bcos pa'i sems kyi
NK085(ru)004:863: gnas lugs skye med mngon sum du rtogs pa ni
NK085(ru)004:864: lta ba / de la blo sbyor bas gzung 'dzin gyi dri ma dag pas sgrol ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:865: gnyis pa ting nge 'dzin goms pa'i sbyor sgrol ni /
NK085(ru)004:866: ting nge 'dzin snang stong dbyer med kyi don la
NK085(ru)004:867: blo sbyor bas rjes shes kyi mtshan ma las sgrol
NK085(ru)004:868: ba dang / gsum pa dbang yul thabs shes rab kyi sbyor sgrol ni /
NK085(ru)004:869: kun rdzob tu dbang po yul dus phung po khams
NK085(ru)004:870: skye mched thams cad rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi ngang
NK085(ru)004:871: du shar ba la sbyor bas /
NK085(ru)004:872: rtog tshogs rang kha mar 'dzin pa las sgrol ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:873: bzhi pa sngon byung du spyod pa thabs kyis sbyor sgrol byed lugs ni /
NK085(ru)004:874: sngon dpal chen pos ru tra 'khor bcas kyi lam ma bgrod pa thabs chen po'i sgo nas /
NK085(ru)004:875: mo thams cad sbyor bas sbyor lam la bkod /
NK085(ru)004:876: pho thams cad sgrol nas mthong lam la bkod pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:877: lnga pa rjes 'jug tu mngon phyung 'phrin las kyi sbyor sgrol ni /
NK085(ru)004:878: de dang rjes su mthun pa'i da lta'i rnal 'byor
NK085(ru)004:879: pa rnams kyi dbang po'i mngon sum du phyung ba'i
NK085(ru)004:880: / rig ma mtshan nyid dang ldan pa la sbyor zhing bsgral ba'i zhing bcu sgrol lo //
NK085(ru)004:881: drug pa rgyud dang man ngag gi lta ba gnyis
NK085(ru)004:882: shes bya yin pa'i phyir thun mong du bstan pa
NK085(ru)004:883: ni / rang bzhin gyi sbyor sgrol dang dbang po
NK085(ru)004:884: yul gyi sbyor sgrol gnyis ni shes bya lta ba
NK085(ru)004:885: yin pas bla med kyi lam la 'jug go lcog
NK085(ru)004:886: kun gyi thun mong du nyams su len rgyu yin
NK085(ru)004:888: bdun pa ni ting nge 'dzin goms pa bskyed rdzogs kun gyi thun mong du bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:889: ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya ba'i bslab pa ni
NK085(ru)004:890: bla med kyi lam pa kun gyi thun mong yin
NK085(ru)004:891: par kun bzang gis gsungsa so //
NK085(ru)004:892: gnyis pa mngon phyung bye brag tu bshad pa la gnyis yod pa'i dang po mdor bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:893: da lta rnal 'byor pas dbang po'i mngona sum du
NK085(ru)004:894: phyung ba'i sbyor sgrol las mi 'da' bas dam tshig
NK085(ru)004:895: /gsang sngags bla med kyi drod thob pa min pa
NK085(ru)004:896: theg pa 'og ma'i spyod yul min pas chen po
NK085(ru)004:897: de la sbyor sgrol byed pa'i thabs la gtan tshigsa
NK085(ru)004:899: gang gis sbyor sgrol byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i mtshan nyid /
NK085(ru)004:900: gang sbyor sgrol bya ba'i yul gyi mtshan nyid /
NK085(ru)004:903: theg 'og gi rtsod pa spang ba'o //
NK085(ru)004:904: gnyis pa rgyas bshad la gnyis yod pa'i dang po
NK085(ru)004:905: sgrol ba'i dam tshig /de la lnga yod pa'i dang
NK085(ru)004:906: po gang gis sgrol ba'i rnal 'byor pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:907: sgrol mkhan gyi rnal 'byor pa rang gis lta ba
NK085(ru)004:908: bden pa dbyer med rtogs shing spyod pa de dang
NK085(ru)004:910: ting nge 'dzin dang mgo 'brel zhing gomsa pas na /
NK085(ru)004:912: de nas thugs rjes gzhan bsgral ba la /
NK085(ru)004:913: gnyis pa bsgral ba'i zhing la gnyis yod pa'i dang pa'i rgyu las bsgral bya bdun ni /
NK085(ru)004:914: sangs rgyas chos dge 'dun te dkon mchog gsum la
NK085(ru)004:915: gnod byed dang gcig /rdo rje slob dpon gyi sku
NK085(ru)004:916: dgra dang gnyis / slob ma la dam tshig mnos kyang dam las log pa dang gsum /
NK085(ru)004:917: bla ma grogs po la tshur la gnod pa byed pas na 'khus zhes pa dang bzhi /
NK085(ru)004:918: spyir chos nyan bshad kyi sar 'dus par 'ong ba rnams la gnod pa byed pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:919: khyad par du sngags kyi dbang dang sgrub pa byed
NK085(ru)004:920: par 'dus par 'ong ba rnams gnod pa byed pa
NK085(ru)004:921: dang lnga / spyir bdag gzhan sems can yongs la
NK085(ru)004:922: gnod pa'i gang zag dang drug /khyad par du chos
NK085(ru)004:923: byed pa'i dam tshig can la dgra byed pas ngan
NK085(ru)004:924: pa'i ngang tshul bzung ba can dang bdun no //
NK085(ru)004:925: ngang tshul can 'di ni zhi rgyas gang gis kyang mi 'dul ba sngon gyi mchims bya rog dang /
NK085(ru)004:926: rdog dge la ston pa lta bu'o //
NK085(ru)004:927: gnyis pa spyir 'bras bu la bsgral bya gsum dang spyir grangs dang bcas pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:928: nyams pa'i 'bras bu dmyal ba yi dwags byol song ste ngan song gsum du skyes pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:929: de ltar bsgral zhing bcu po ni /
NK085(ru)004:930: bla med ma h+aa'i tshogs lam chen po dang sbyor
NK085(ru)004:931: lam pa'i rnal 'byor pa kun gyis dang du blang
NK085(ru)004:932: ngo // spyir bsgral ba'i rnam grangs ni /
NK085(ru)004:933: rtsa ba byed pa'i tshig lnga la /
NK085(ru)004:938: theg 'og gi rtsod pa spang ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:939: bzhi ste de ltar bcu bzhi'o //
NK085(ru)004:940: yang na lha rje yang khengs bla ma'i bzhed kyi /
NK085(ru)004:942: slob dpon dang mched kyi sku dgra gnyis dang lnga /
NK085(ru)004:943: dam las log pa dang drug /
NK085(ru)004:945: 'dus par 'ong pa la gnod pa dang brgyad /
NK085(ru)004:946: yongs la gnod pa dang dgu /
NK085(ru)004:948: ngan pa'i ngang tshul can dang bcu gcig /ngan song gsum dang bcu bzhi'o //
NK085(ru)004:949: yang na he ru ka galpo las ni /
NK085(ru)004:950: mkha' la rlung ltar 'phyo ba dang //
NK085(ru)004:951: bcu drug tshang la 'khyil ba dang //
NK085(ru)004:952: u ma tshang la nyal ba dang //
NK085(ru)004:953: rngam pa'i drag shul spyod pa dang //
NK085(ru)004:954: bdag dang spun phyir gnod pa dang //
NK085(ru)004:955: skye bo yongs la gnod pa dang //
NK085(ru)004:956: snying rje lam nas log pa dang //
NK085(ru)004:957: thig le'i spyod pa nyams pa dang //
NK085(ru)004:958: dmyal ba'i rdo rje byed pa dang //
NK085(ru)004:959: gzhan gyi srog gcod rngam pa dang //
NK085(ru)004:960: 'di bcu bsgral ba'i zhing bcu ste //
NK085(ru)004:962: gsum pa bsgral ba'i thabs la gnyis yod pa'i dang
NK085(ru)004:963: po bsgral thabs yon tan dang bcas pa spyir bstan
NK085(ru)004:964: pa ni / ting nge 'dzin dang sngags dang phyag
NK085(ru)004:965: rgya rnams la shin tu gomsa pa'i rnal 'byor pa
NK085(ru)004:966: pa ni / des / bsgral zhing de'i sgrib pa sbyangs dbang bskur te /
NK085(ru)004:967: sems zag med byang chub kyi zhing du dgod pa bya dgos pa la /
NK085(ru)004:968: gnyis pa bye brag rgyas bshad ni /
NK085(ru)004:969: rnal 'byor pa rang gi yid ting nge 'dzin /
NK085(ru)004:970: ngag sngags lus lha'i phyag rgya dpal chen po'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas /
NK085(ru)004:971: sgrol mkhan gi t+aa ki r+aa dza bsgom /
NK085(ru)004:972: lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo la dpa' bo 'bru lnga /
NK085(ru)004:974: bsgral zhing ru trar bsam la brang de shags se bkas /
NK085(ru)004:976: lag pa'i dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i 'od zer gyis bsgral
NK085(ru)004:977: zhing gi snying nang du rigs drug du skye ba'ii
NK085(ru)004:978: bag chagsa kyi sa bon a r+n+ri su tri pre
NK085(ru)004:979: du yod pa de sbyangsa nas /
NK085(ru)004:980: rnam shes de h'u du gyur nas yum gyi mkha'
NK085(ru)004:981: gsang nyi zla'i steng du bzhag /h'u 'od du zhu
NK085(ru)004:982: ba las rdo rje rtse lnga pa /
NK085(ru)004:983: de las thugs kyi lha rdo rje sems dpar bskyed la /
NK085(ru)004:984: gtsug tu rnam par rgyal ba ste kun bzang bsgoms nas dbang bskur la /
NK085(ru)004:985: yam s+pha ra na phata kyis 'og min rnam snang gis thugs kar 'phang bas /
NK085(ru)004:986: 'bras bu ye shes kyi tshogsa kyang rdzogsa pa ni chos sku'i rgyur 'gyura ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:987: bsgral ba'i phung po sha khrag rus gsum byin gyis
NK085(ru)004:988: brlabs nas dkyil 'khor lha tshogs rnams la mchod par
NK085(ru)004:989: bsngosa pas rgyu bsod namsa kyi tshogsa rdzogs par gyur
NK085(ru)004:990: pa 'di gzugs sku gnyis kyi rgyur 'gyura ro //
NK085(ru)004:991: 'bras bu'i bsgral bya ngan song gsum tshul ji ltar du bsgral na /
NK085(ru)004:992: rnal 'byor pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo nas las
NK085(ru)004:993: kyi ltar gsal ba'i thugs ka nas ram spros pas
NK085(ru)004:994: ye shes kyi mes ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal
NK085(ru)004:995: rnams bsregs / rnam shes ar gyur nas 'og min du 'phang ngo //
NK085(ru)004:997: de ltar bsgral ba'i dgos ched ni /
NK085(ru)004:998: slob dpon mched la sogs rang gzhan rnams kyis dam
NK085(ru)004:999: chos byed pa la bar chad byed mi med pas
NK085(ru)004:1000: byang chub bsgrub pa'i spyod pa 'phel zhing semsa can
NK085(ru)004:1001: yongs la gnod pa dang bral bas bde ba dang
NK085(ru)004:1002: / phung po mchod par bsngosa pas lha mnyes pas
NK085(ru)004:1003: rnal 'byor pa bdag gi dam tshig chag nyams skong
NK085(ru)004:1004: / zhing / rnal 'byor pa rab kyis zag med la bkod par byed /
NK085(ru)004:1005: 'bring gis las ngan pa'i bar chad cing ngan song gsum gyi sgo 'gag par byed /
NK085(ru)004:1006: tha mas ngan song du song yang sdug bsngal yun thung bar byed do //
NK085(ru)004:1007: zhing rang gis dge ba'i las bsagsa pa med pa la /
NK085(ru)004:1008: de lta bu ngan song las thar zhing zag med
NK085(ru)004:1009: bde ba'i lam la bkod pa la bsgral ba 'di
NK085(ru)004:1010: byed pa las ma gtogs pa gzhan thabs med do
NK085(ru)004:1011: // lnga pa theg pa 'og ma dang rtsod pa
NK085(ru)004:1012: spang ba la gsum yod pa'i dang po thabs kyi
NK085(ru)004:1013: spyod pas mi 'ching ba'i gtan tshigs byang chub sems
NK085(ru)004:1014: dpa'i spyod pa dang mgo bsgre ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:1015: gsang sngags kyi rnal 'byor pas dang po rtogs pas bdag bsgral zhing /
NK085(ru)004:1016: de nas thugs rjes gzhan bsgral ba'i thabsa kyi spyod pas 'ching bar 'gyur na /
NK085(ru)004:1017: thub pa'i dbang pos 'di nyid sngar byang chub semsa
NK085(ru)004:1018: dpa'i lam la zhugs pa'i dus su sems bskyed snying
NK085(ru)004:1019: rje bsgoms nas gdul bya 'dul thabsa kyi dbang gis
NK085(ru)004:1020: / rngon pas 'dul ba'i ched du rngon pa bya dkar po snang nas sems can sgrol ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:1021: smad 'tshong mas 'dul ba'i ched du sbyor bas ston
NK085(ru)004:1022: pa thub pa'i dbang po'ang ngan song du ltung dgos
NK085(ru)004:1023: kyang mi lhung nas sangs rgyas pa'o //
NK085(ru)004:1024: theg pa chen po'i lugs la mi dge ba bcu
NK085(ru)004:1025: 'di yid kyi gsum ni dus dang rnam pa thams
NK085(ru)004:1026: cad du dgag /don 'gyur snang na lus ngag gi
NK085(ru)004:1027: bdun po 'di lta ba ma rtogs kyang spyod pa'i
NK085(ru)004:1029: de yang srog gcod pa la ded dpon snying rje cher sems lta bu zhig dgos /
NK085(ru)004:1030: mi tshangs par spyod pa la khye'u skar ma lta bu zhig dgos /
NK085(ru)004:1031: ma byin pa len pa rgyal po gser mdog lta bu zhig dgos /
NK085(ru)004:1032: rdzun du smra ba la bram ze kun rgyal lta bu zhig dgos /
NK085(ru)004:1033: gnyis pa dman spyod kyi dbang du mi gtong ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:1034: 'jig rten gyi khe dang grags pa'i spyod pa kun
NK085(ru)004:1035: nas nyon mongs pas bslangs pa'i sbyor sgrol byas na
NK085(ru)004:1036: de ltar phyin te ngan song du ltung ba'i phyir
NK085(ru)004:1038: gsum pa thabs mkhas pa'i lta bas zin pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:1039: nyon mongs ma spangs ye shes su shar bas thabs
NK085(ru)004:1040: chen gsang sngags bla med kyi lam la gnas pa
NK085(ru)004:1041: yi / skye bo tshogs sbyor ba kun gyis sbyor
NK085(ru)004:1042: sgrol bya bar bla med kyi rgyud sde kun nas
NK085(ru)004:1043: yi / 'byung ngo // gnyis pa sbyor ba'i dam tshig la gnyis yod pa'i /
NK085(ru)004:1045: g+ha na ni sbyor ba de'i don la mi 'da'
NK085(ru)004:1046: ba dam tshig yo ga man chad kyi thun mong
NK085(ru)004:1047: min pas chen po de'i don rnams rgyas par bshad
NK085(ru)004:1048: cing gsal bar bstan pa ni 'di lta ste /
NK085(ru)004:1049: gnyis pa rgyas bshad la bzhi /
NK085(ru)004:1050: dang po gang gis sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pa'i mtshan nyid ni /
NK085(ru)004:1051: log par 'dod sred kyi chagsa pa'i yid shin tu
NK085(ru)004:1052: g.yos pa'i nyon mongs pa rang kha ma de spangs
NK085(ru)004:1053: pa'i rnal 'byor pa bde stong gi ye shes nyams
NK085(ru)004:1054: su myong ba'am / 'bras bu bdag don chos sku dang /
NK085(ru)004:1055: gzhan don la gzugs sku gnyis tshe gcig lus gcig la mngona du byed 'dod pa'i mi des sbyor /
NK085(ru)004:1056: gnyis pa gang la sbyor ba'i gzungs ma'i mtshan nyid la gnyis /
NK085(ru)004:1057: dang po rigs bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:1058: pad+ma can ni dbang gi yum ste /
NK085(ru)004:1060: dbyibs sogs kha mig dkyus ring so tshags dam la so zho chags pa /
NK085(ru)004:1061: rked pa phra la lus la dri zhim 'byung ba'o //
NK085(ru)004:1063: bzhin mdog dmar po sog kha ma //
NK085(ru)004:1064: pad+ma can gyi bud med de //
NK085(ru)004:1065: dbang gi dus su shes par bya //
NK085(ru)004:1067: dung can ma ni zhi ba'i yum ste /
NK085(ru)004:1068: bong ke chung la lus mdzes pa bzhin dkar la
NK085(ru)004:1069: zla ba'i mdog 'dra zhing spu gtsug g.yas su 'khyil
NK085(ru)004:1070: ba / ngo dang ri mo'i dbyibs zlum po yod pa /
NK085(ru)004:1071: skad gsal sngags zlos la yid mi skyo ba ni zhi ba'i rigs te /
NK085(ru)004:1072: bong chung lus mdzes zla ba'i mdog /g.yas 'khyil skad snyan khro spang ba //
NK085(ru)004:1073: zhi ba'i dus su shes par bya //
NK085(ru)004:1075: ri mo can ni drag po'i yum te /
NK085(ru)004:1076: bzhin mdog nag la dbyibs gru gsum pa /
NK085(ru)004:1077: ngo la khro gnyer yod pa /
NK085(ru)004:1079: rtsid mgo ri mo can du bshad do //
NK085(ru)004:1080: bzhin mdog nag ma gru gsum pa //
NK085(ru)004:1081: drag po'i dus su shes par bya //
NK085(ru)004:1083: ba glang can ni rgyas pa'i yum ste /
NK085(ru)004:1084: bzhin mdog ser po dbyibs gru bzhi pa /
NK085(ru)004:1091: skra mtshams dma' ba ni ba glang can yin pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:1092: ba glang ser po gru bzhi pa /
NK085(ru)004:1093: rgyas pa'i dus su shes par bya /
NK085(ru)004:1094: lcug phran can ni zhi ba'i yum ste /
NK085(ru)004:1095: spun zla mang zhing rigs rgyud 'phel ba'o //
NK085(ru)004:1096: sdong rtsig ni dbang gi yum ste bu mo gcig skyes so //
NK085(ru)004:1097: me tog ni drag po'i yum ste /
NK085(ru)004:1098: zla bral mya ngan gyis gdung ba'o //
NK085(ru)004:1099: phyal ba ni rgyas pa'i yum ste rang bzhin mi sdom pa ste /
NK085(ru)004:1100: de ltar rigs brtag pa brgyad do //
NK085(ru)004:1101: gnyis pa mtshan bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:1102: lus kyi mtshan nyid mnyen zhing drang ba dang gcig
NK085(ru)004:1103: /dpyi dang rtsib thung bar sor bzhi yod pas rked
NK085(ru)004:1105: gzhu'i chang zur ltar du stod smada phyed pa dang gnyis /
NK085(ru)004:1106: yan lag 'phra la 'jam zhing tshigs mig zlum pa ste mi 'bur ba dang gsum /
NK085(ru)004:1107: dpral ba'i dbyes che ba dang bzhi /
NK085(ru)004:1108: mig gi dkyus lha'i spyan ltar du ring ba dang lnga /
NK085(ru)004:1109: mig thog gi smin ma dpral ba'i dkyil na 'brel
NK085(ru)004:1110: zhing khogs nag ut+pal mdog lta bu dang drug /lus
NK085(ru)004:1111: kyang yar mar gyi chu ring thung /
NK085(ru)004:1112: phar tshur gyi zheng sbom phra gnyis ka gzhan gyi
NK085(ru)004:1113: snang ngo la ran te 'bring tsam du bshad pa
NK085(ru)004:1114: dang bdun / lusa la dri ma mi chags pas na chu klong ltar du dag cing /
NK085(ru)004:1115: dbugs la sman ga bur gyi dri bro ba dang brgyad do //
NK085(ru)004:1116: gsang bya'i dam tshig rnams gsang thub cing yang dag pa'i donala shes rab che ba /
NK085(ru)004:1117: gshis bzang la spyod pa dal la yid du 'ong ba /
NK085(ru)004:1118: bla ma dang mched grogs la dang po dad pa
NK085(ru)004:1119: dang ldan zhing 'grogsa shing mi yal nas dad pa
NK085(ru)004:1121: de ltar spyod lam gyi mtshan nyid bzhi dang nyi shu'o //
NK085(ru)004:1122: de lta bu'i rig ma mtshan nyid dang ldan pa
NK085(ru)004:1123: de nyid gsang ba bla med kyi don rnams nyams
NK085(ru)004:1124: su len pa dbang dang bsgrub pa'i gnas su spyad
NK085(ru)004:1125: par bya'o // gsum pa byin gyis brlabs pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:1126: de yang dang po rgyud ma smin pa smin par
NK085(ru)004:1127: byed pa'i dabnga bskur zhing rtsa ba dang yan lag
NK085(ru)004:1129: de nas lus sbyor thabs ngag brda byed thabs /
NK085(ru)004:1130: sems ting nge 'dzin sgom thabs kyi chos gsuma bshad do //
NK085(ru)004:1131: yang na phyi 'dod pa'i bstan bcos /
NK085(ru)004:1133: gsang ba bde stong gi ye shes kyi chos gsum bshad la /
NK085(ru)004:1134: lus kyi yan lag lnga la rigsa kyi yum lnga'i sku la sogs pa rnams bsgom pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:1135: phung po nyid lhar snang bas rdul tshon 'gyed pa ste /
NK085(ru)004:1136: gsang sngags thabsa la mkhas pa'i lta bas zin pa'i rnal 'byor pa rang don du bsgrub pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:1137: gzhan don du dbang bskur ba'i skabsa kyi dus su sbyor bar bya'o //
NK085(ru)004:1138: bzhi pa rnam grangs kyi ngos nas sbyor ba'i phan yon bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:1139: sbyor ba'i dam tshig gi rnam grangsa la rigs brtags pa la brgyad /
NK085(ru)004:1141: spyod lam gyi chos bzhi dang bcu gnyis te nyi
NK085(ru)004:1142: shu'i don de rnams rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis nyams
NK085(ru)004:1143: su blangs na / rang don du mchog gi dngos
NK085(ru)004:1144: grub tshe rnams thob pa la sogs yon tan bsam
NK085(ru)004:1146: gzhan don du zab mo'i dbang don gyis slob bu'i
NK085(ru)004:1147: rgyud smin cing thun mong las bzhi gang bsgrub pa
NK085(ru)004:1149: khams gsum 'khor ba'i skye gnas las grol thar zhing /
NK085(ru)004:1150: sangs rgyas pa'i rigs su ngesa te rig 'dzin thob pas /
NK085(ru)004:1151: de bas gsang sngags thabs kyi theg pa zhes bya
NK085(ru)004:1152: ba'i don ni 'dir bshad pa sbyor bas sangs rgyas
NK085(ru)004:1154: gnyis pa rdzun du smra ba'i dam tshig la bzhi /
NK085(ru)004:1155: dang po lta ba'i rdzun gsum ni /
NK085(ru)004:1156: yul snang 'di rnams rang rgyud du ma grub ste
NK085(ru)004:1157: mtshan nyid rgya chad nas ming 'dogs sna tshogs 'byung
NK085(ru)004:1158: ba yang sems kyis kun brtags pas mtshan nyid rgya
NK085(ru)004:1159: chad pa rang ma grub pa ni ri bong gi
NK085(ru)004:1161: rnam grangsa mi 'dra ba du ma snang yang sems
NK085(ru)004:1162: kyis kun brtags pa'i bsam gzugs yin te chu la
NK085(ru)004:1163: rigs drug gi mthong snang drug tu shar ba dang
NK085(ru)004:1164: / ring po la ltos pa'i thung ngur snang ba
NK085(ru)004:1165: la sogs pa yang sems kyis kun brtags pa yin
NK085(ru)004:1166: pa dang rnam pa gsum gyi sgo nas gtan la
NK085(ru)004:1167: / phab pas / kun rdzob dngos po de nyid
NK085(ru)004:1168: snang ba la rang rgyud du ma grub pas rdzun
NK085(ru)004:1169: / phab pas / zhes bya ste / de la
NK085(ru)004:1170: shes bya ji ltar snang ba thams cad rang rig
NK085(ru)004:1173: kun rdzob bden pa 'di nyid ye gdod ma nas
NK085(ru)004:1174: lha'i dkyil 'khor du shes nas gzhan kun la de
NK085(ru)004:1175: ltar du smra ba la nyes pa med de skyes
NK085(ru)004:1176: bu rtogs zin de'i spyod yul du gyur pas na
NK085(ru)004:1177: lta ba'i rdzun gsum la spyod ces bya'o //
NK085(ru)004:1178: yang na lta ba'i rdzun gsum gyi skabs 'di ltar du la 'dod pa yang snang /
NK085(ru)004:1180: mo gsham gyi bu nam mkha'i me tog la sogs
NK085(ru)004:1181: pa'i mtshan ni tshig tu grub la don la ma
NK085(ru)004:1182: grub pas mtshan nyid chad pa'i kun brtags dang /
NK085(ru)004:1183: chu la rigs drug gi mthong snang drug la sogs pa rnam grangs kyi kun brtags dang /
NK085(ru)004:1184: tshur ka la ltos pa'i phar ka la sogs pa'i
NK085(ru)004:1185: kun brtags dang rnam pa gsum gyi dngos po de
NK085(ru)004:1186: nyid la bden pa med cing rdzun par zhes dam
NK085(ru)004:1187: bca' / 'o na gang bden zhe na /
NK085(ru)004:1188: snang srid thams cad rang rig pa nyid rang snang
NK085(ru)004:1189: ba'i gtan tshigs de'i phyir thamsa cad rang rig pa
NK085(ru)004:1191: de gang gi spyod yul yin na /
NK085(ru)004:1193: bsam pas gzhal nas tshogs drug gi snang ba kun
NK085(ru)004:1194: smra bsam gzhal bya'i yul las 'das par gang gis
NK085(ru)004:1195: rtogs pa'i skyes bu des don nyams su len cing
NK085(ru)004:1196: spyod pa'i yul yin par bshad do //
NK085(ru)004:1197: ma rtogs par smras na dgongs 'dus las /
NK085(ru)004:1198: khams gsums sems can srog gcod pas //
NK085(ru)004:1199: ma nges chos bshad de bas lci //
NK085(ru)004:1203: rtogs nas smra ba gang byed pa //
NK085(ru)004:1204: de nyid nga yin dbang yang rdzogs //
NK085(ru)004:1206: gnyis pa spyod pa'i rdzun bzhi ni /
NK085(ru)004:1207: sangs rgyas chos dge 'dun te dkon mchog gsum dang /
NK085(ru)004:1210: sems can yongs la gnod par byed 'ong ba la /
NK085(ru)004:1211: gnod pa mi 'ong ba'i thabs rdzun du smra ba'i don de la mi 'da' bas dam tshig bya'o //
NK085(ru)004:1212: gsum pa gsang ba'i rdzun bcu ni /
NK085(ru)004:1213: gsang bya'i yul gang la gang gsang bar bya ba'i don rnams /
NK085(ru)004:1214: gsang tshul gsang ba bcu gang la 'dris pa la mi rig pa'i thabs kyi rdzun bcu smra ba'o //
NK085(ru)004:1215: bzhi pa rnam grangs kyi sgo nas zhabs bsdu ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:1216: rdzun gyi dam tshig gsung ba lta ba'i rdzun gsum
NK085(ru)004:1217: spyod pa'i rdzun bzhi gsang ba'i rdzun bcu dang bcu
NK085(ru)004:1218: bdun nyamsa su blang bar bya'o //
NK085(ru)004:1219: de yang dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)004:1220: gsang ba'i don drang por smra ba ma yin cing /
NK085(ru)004:1221: phan pa'i chos su 'gyur bas rdzun smra ba ni dam tshig go //
NK085(ru)004:1222: gsang gab med par rang rgyal bya ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:1223: gzhan la gnod par smra ba rnam pa rnams ni nyams so //
NK085(ru)004:1225: gsum pa ma byin par len pa'i dam tshig la gsum /
NK085(ru)004:1226: dang po tshar gcod pa'i sgo nas blang ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:1227: bsgral ba'i zhing bcur gyur pa'i nor bcu blang ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:1228: 'o na ngan song gsum gyi nor ji ltar blang
NK085(ru)004:1229: na ngan song gi nor de sdug bsngal yin pa
NK085(ru)004:1230: de ting nge 'dzin gyi 'phro 'du yis de dang
NK085(ru)004:1232: gnyis pa dngos grub kyi sgo nas blang ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:1233: gong du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i gzungs ma gzhan la snang ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:1234: bkra shis pa'i rdzas sam skye ba bdun pa lta bu dang /
NK085(ru)004:1235: sa na sbas pa'i chos zab mo dang /
NK085(ru)004:1236: skye bo phal pas 'chang ba'i byin rlabs chen po
NK085(ru)004:1237: yod pa'i rdzas b+ha n+d+ha mtshan nyid dang ldan pa
NK085(ru)004:1238: / slob dpon pad+ma'i dung grag chen grag chung dang /
NK085(ru)004:1240: rngul chung rdor dril la sogs pa rnams dang /
NK085(ru)004:1241: lha 'dres bsrung ba yod pa'i gter dang /
NK085(ru)004:1242: bsrung ba med pa'i gter dang /
NK085(ru)004:1243: log lta can gyi phyug po ser snas bcingsa pa'i nor rnams chos phyir gtong mi nus pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:1244: gong du song ba'i blang bya'i ming gi rnam grangs
NK085(ru)004:1245: de rnams thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas blangsa la
NK085(ru)004:1246: dkon mchog gsum gyi phyogs la tshogs su 'bula bar
NK085(ru)004:1247: bya'o // gsum pa rnam grangs bstan pa'i sgo nas zhabs bsdu ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:1248: ma byin pa len pa la mi 'da' bas dam tshig la zhing bcu'i nor bcu /
NK085(ru)004:1255: phyug po ser snas bcings pa'i nor dang bcu bdun la spyad par bya'o //
NK085(ru)004:1257: ser snas bcings pa'i spyad pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:1258: dngos grub kyi rdzas tha mal pas 'chang ba rnams
NK085(ru)004:1259: blangs nas byin rlabs kyi rten du bya ba ni
NK085(ru)004:1260: dam tshig go // rang rgyal du gzhan gyi spyad phrog pa rnams nyams pa'o //
NK085(ru)004:1262: bzhi pa ngag barlanga po'i dam tshig la gsum /
NK085(ru)004:1263: dang po zhing bcu tshar gcod pa'i dam tshig ni /
NK085(ru)004:1264: bsgral ba'i zhing bcur gyur pa'i sems can rnams la /
NK085(ru)004:1265: khong nas skrag cing tshar bcad pa'i ngag barlanga po'i
NK085(ru)004:1266: tshig bcu yis kho'i zhe gcod cing spyos pas kho
NK085(ru)004:1267: yis las ngan rang gis byas pa dran nas las
NK085(ru)004:1269: gnyis pa gsang sngags spyod pa'i barlanga tshig ni /
NK085(ru)004:1270: sngon dpal chen po badz+ra he ru ka'i phrin las
NK085(ru)004:1271: drag po'i sgo nas ru tra 'khor bcas bsgral ba'i
NK085(ru)004:1272: shul du rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis spyod pa de
NK085(ru)004:1273: dang tshul mthun par drag po'i phyag rgya la brten
NK085(ru)004:1274: pa thob cing sngags brjod pas dgra bgegs kyi gdug
NK085(ru)004:1275: rtsub dag cing mi gnas par byed pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:1276: theg pa 'og ma'i spang bya gzungs ma la barlanga por sbyor ba'i dus su sa ma ya ho /
NK085(ru)004:1278: zhes rgyud nas gsungs pa bzhin brjod pa'i dus su
NK085(ru)004:1279: 'dod pa'i bstan bcos bshad pas bde ba rgyas pa
NK085(ru)004:1280: dang / slob bu snod bcos pa'i phyir zhe gcoda
NK085(ru)004:1281: pa'i tshig sna tshogs byas pas chos kyi snod du
NK085(ru)004:1282: rung ba dang 'byung po'i gdug rtsub bzlog pa'i phyir
NK085(ru)004:1283: du zhe gcod pa'i thabs drag po'i phrin las kyi
NK085(ru)004:1284: gdangs che la rngam pa'i sgra dang bcas pa'i gyer
NK085(ru)004:1285: mo byed pas bgegs rnams byer ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:1286: bcos mi dgos pa'i snod kyis mtshan nyid dang ldan
NK085(ru)004:1287: pa'i bu la barlanga po sbyor sgrol la sogs pa'i
NK085(ru)004:1288: chos bshad pas gsang sngags gnyis med kyi don khong
NK085(ru)004:1289: du chud pa'o // gsum pa rnam grangs kyi sgo nas zhabs bsdu ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:1290: ngag barlanga po dag gi don la mi 'da' bas dam tshig /zhing bcu la barlanga tshig bcu /
NK085(ru)004:1292: gzungs la barlanga por sbyor ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:1295: snod lngan bu la barlanga chos bshad pa ste /
NK085(ru)004:1296: lnga dang bco lnga bsrung ba'o //
NK085(ru)004:1297: gnyis pa mi spang ba'i dam tshig la gsum /
NK085(ru)004:1298: dang po mdor bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:1299: theg 'og gi spang bya 'dir mi spang lam du
NK085(ru)004:1300: khyer bar byed pa'i dam tshig bshad par bya ba
NK085(ru)004:1301: la yang dag pa'i dug lnga dang /
NK085(ru)004:1302: log pa'i dug lnga 'dir mdor bstan pa yin no //
NK085(ru)004:1303: gnyis pa rgyas bshad la gnyis /
NK085(ru)004:1304: dang po la lnga yod pa'i dang po thabs kyis zin pa'i 'dod chags ni /
NK085(ru)004:1305: gong du g+ha na'i dam tshig gi skabs su zhib
NK085(ru)004:1306: par bshad pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i sgo nas sbyor ba
NK085(ru)004:1308: de ltar 'dod chags la spyod dus bde ba rang
NK085(ru)004:1309: ye shes su shar bas sems nyid kyi rgyan du
NK085(ru)004:1311: shin tu zhen pa'i 'dod chags ni yang dag pa'i lam du 'gyur zhes kun bzang gis gsungs so //
NK085(ru)004:1312: 'dod chags chos nyid la ting nge 'dzin chags pa dam pa'o //
NK085(ru)004:1313: 'dod pa dngos po la chags pa nyams pa'o //
NK085(ru)004:1315: gnyis pa snying rje dang shes rab kyis zin pa'i zhe sdang ni /
NK085(ru)004:1316: bsgral ba'i zhing bcu brlag nas thar pa'i zhing la
NK085(ru)004:1317: bkod par byed pa ni zhe sdang gi spyod pa
NK085(ru)004:1318: rang ka ma las dpag pas na mchog yin pa
NK085(ru)004:1319: dang / zhing bcu bsgral ba la brten nas nang
NK085(ru)004:1320: du snying rje'i rtsal rdzogs pas phyi rol gyi yul
NK085(ru)004:1321: snang sems zung 'jug tu rtogs pas 'og ma'i phyogs
NK085(ru)004:1322: 'dzin gyi lta ba ngan pa 'joms pa de bzhin
NK085(ru)004:1323: du zhe sdang gi lta ba yin te /
NK085(ru)004:1324: de bas bsgral ba la brten nas snying rje'i rtsal
NK085(ru)004:1325: rdzogs nas snang sems zung 'jug rtogs pas na thabs
NK085(ru)004:1326: mkhas pa'i zhe sdang gi spyod pa yin no //
NK085(ru)004:1327: gsum pa yang dag pa'i lta ba la bzod pa thob pa'i nga rgyal ni /
NK085(ru)004:1328: theg pa 'og ma las mngon par mthol ba'i lta
NK085(ru)004:1329: ba bden gnyis dbyer med ma 'dres yongs rdzogs rtogs
NK085(ru)004:1330: pa dang / de'i don spyod pas ting nge 'dzin
NK085(ru)004:1331: la gnas pa'i tshe rnam rtog gis mi g.yo bas
NK085(ru)004:1332: nges par sran tshugs pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:1333: de gnyis po ni shin tu nga rgyal ba'i lta
NK085(ru)004:1334: spyod kyi mchog tu gyur ces kun bzang gis gsungsa
NK085(ru)004:1335: so // nga rgyal bdud kyis bslu bas mi tshugs shing /
NK085(ru)004:1336: rdo rje theg pa la sran tshugs pas dam pa'o //
NK085(ru)004:1337: bden pa med par log pa'i phyogs la 'chal zhing che ba nyams pa'o //
NK085(ru)004:1339: bzhi pa phyogs 'dzin dang bral ba'i gti mug ni /
NK085(ru)004:1340: gsang sngags bla med kyi lta ba rtogs pa'i ngo
NK085(ru)004:1341: bo la 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad ma 'dres
NK085(ru)004:1342: par chos nyid rang du gsal bas phyogsa dang ris
NK085(ru)004:1344: lta ba de ltar du rtogs pa la spyod pasa
NK085(ru)004:1345: na blang dor med de mi byed pa ni theg
NK085(ru)004:1346: pa chen po gsang sngags pa'i gti mug gi lta
NK085(ru)004:1347: spyod go // gti mug phyogs ris med cing ci yang mi rtogs pa dam pa'o //
NK085(ru)004:1348: bstan pa nyan mi shes dge sdig la 'dzems bag med pa nyams pa'o //
NK085(ru)004:1350: lnga pa snod dang mi ldan pa spang ba'i phrag dog ni /
NK085(ru)004:1351: theg pa 'og ma'i phyogs re ba'i lta spyod dman
NK085(ru)004:1352: pa rnams la ni 'dir gsang sngags bla med kyi
NK085(ru)004:1353: lta ba bden pa dbyer med kyi phrag tu mi
NK085(ru)004:1354: shong bas dog cing dama tshig ma 'dres pa'i nyamsa
NK085(ru)004:1355: pa can spong bar byed pa'i spyod pa ni phrag
NK085(ru)004:1356: dog de las mi 'da' bas dam tshig bsrung ba
NK085(ru)004:1357: yin no // phrag dog chos nyid la gal mi 'jug cing /
NK085(ru)004:1358: yang dag pa la 'dzin rtog ming yang med par gnas pa ni dam pa'o //
NK085(ru)004:1359: gzhan nyams pa med par grogs mched la phrag dog pa ni nyams pa'o //
NK085(ru)004:1361: gnyis pa log pa'i dus lnga mi spang ba la lnga /
NK085(ru)004:1362: dang po log pa'i dug lnga gang nas ldan pa ngos bzung ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:1363: log pa'i dug lnga ni khams gsum gyi sems can
NK085(ru)004:1364: kun la rang chas su ldan pa 'di nyid yin
NK085(ru)004:1365: te / gnyis pa dug lnga sems yin pa la
NK085(ru)004:1366: sems rang gzugs 'dzin dang bral bas dug lnga spang
NK085(ru)004:1367: mi dgos par ye shes yin par bstan pa ni
NK085(ru)004:1368: te / / dug lnga de nyid rang rig rang snang yin pa'i phyir /
NK085(ru)004:1370: dang po dran pa'i yul bzang ngan bar gsum thamsa cad shes pa la /
NK085(ru)004:1371: shes pa'i yul bzang ngan bar gsum thams cad la bzang po la 'dod chags /
NK085(ru)004:1373: bar pa la gti mug /bdag tu nga rgyal /
NK085(ru)004:1374: zhing gzhan du phrag dog pa'i rtsol ba byung ba ni dug lnga yin te /
NK085(ru)004:1375: rtsol ba byung dus semsa rang gis btsal ba'i phyir /
NK085(ru)004:1376: sems ni dngos po med 'od gsal ba'i dug lnga
NK085(ru)004:1377: spang du med pa'i thabsa mkhas pas thabsa makhasa de
NK085(ru)004:1378: nyid rang rig pa'i ye shes yin te /
NK085(ru)004:1379: dug lnga rang rig rang snang 'di la /
NK085(ru)004:1380: kun gzhi nas phar ngo sprad lugs dang /
NK085(ru)004:1381: sgo lnga nas tshur la ngo sprod lugs gnyis /
NK085(ru)004:1387: kun gzhi rang stong du song bas rnal ma don gyi kun gzhi /
NK085(ru)004:1388: tshogs dgu dri ma med pa la ngo sprad /
NK085(ru)004:1389: de'i dus su phyi nang gi chos thams cad rang
NK085(ru)004:1390: rig pa'i ye shes su shar bas thabs mkhas zhes
NK085(ru)004:1391: bya'o // gsang sngags kyi lugs kyis spro bsdu dang
NK085(ru)004:1392: dgag bsgrub med par rtsol ba byung dus rang rig
NK085(ru)004:1393: pa'i ye shes su shar dgos /
NK085(ru)004:1394: de'i don gyis snga ma ltar 'thad par mngon no //
NK085(ru)004:1395: gsum pa de yang gsar du ma yin zhing ye
NK085(ru)004:1396: gdod ma nas dug lnga ye shes yin pa'i dpe
NK085(ru)004:1398: dper na nyi ma'i dkyil na mun pa gtan nas
NK085(ru)004:1399: med pa ltar ye'am thog med dus nas sems nyid
NK085(ru)004:1400: ngo bo la ye shes rang snang ma gtogs pa
NK085(ru)004:1401: rgyu nyon mongas dug lnga byung dus ngos bzung med
NK085(ru)004:1402: pas na 'bras bu 'khor ba'i sems can byung dus
NK085(ru)004:1403: rang rgyud du grub pa ngang gis med pa'o //
NK085(ru)004:1404: bzhi pa de lta ba'i don rig na ye shes
NK085(ru)004:1405: nyid ma gtogs pa spang bya med de mi spang
NK085(ru)004:1407: gang gi don de rnams shes shing rtogs pa'i ngo
NK085(ru)004:1408: bo la rang rig ye shes su shar ba las
NK085(ru)004:1409: ma gtogs pa spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongsa pa'ang
NK085(ru)004:1410: rang rgyud du ma grub pas dmigsa mi 'gyur ba'i
NK085(ru)004:1411: rin po che'i gling du phyin pas sa rdo med
NK085(ru)004:1412: pa bzhin no // lnga pa rnam grangs kyi sgo
NK085(ru)004:1413: nas 'bras bu thob tshul gyi zhabs bsdu ba ni
NK085(ru)004:1414: pa bzhin no // / de ltar mi spang ba'i
NK085(ru)004:1415: dam tshig la yang dag pa'i dug lnga la lta
NK085(ru)004:1416: spyod gnyis su phye bas bcu /
NK085(ru)004:1417: log dug lnga dang bco lnga la gnas pa'i gang
NK085(ru)004:1418: zag gi snang ngo'i spyod yul thams cad ye shes
NK085(ru)004:1420: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po yin pa'i mthar thug gi 'bras bu don gnyis rdzogs pa'o //
NK085(ru)004:1421: 'o na log pa'i dug lnga mi spang bar bshad pa 'di gsang ba yin nam /
NK085(ru)004:1425: mi spang ba'i rgyu mtshan nam gtan tshigs gang yin mi spang ba la dgos ched ci yod /
NK085(ru)004:1426: lam du byed na tshul ji ltar byed /
NK085(ru)004:1428: dri ba dang po'i lan ni /
NK085(ru)004:1429: blo chung gsang sngags sgra ci bzhin par spyod pa la gsang zhing /
NK085(ru)004:1430: blo ldan yang dag pa'i lam la zhugs pa la bsgrags pa yin no //
NK085(ru)004:1431: dri ba gnyis pa'i lan ni /
NK085(ru)004:1432: nyon mongs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes gnyis /
NK085(ru)004:1433: spang gnyen gyi lta ba drang don yin la /
NK085(ru)004:1434: gnyis med kyi lta ba nges don te /
