NK085(ru)004:1436: rnam rtog nyid na rang byung ye shes te //
NK085(ru)004:1437: rnam rtog mi skye ye shes brjod du med //
NK085(ru)004:1438: ces pa la sogs pa gsungs pas mngon no //
NK085(ru)004:1439: dri ba gsum pa'i lan ni /
NK085(ru)004:1440: log pa'i dug lnga mi spang ba'i gtan tshigs la lnga ste /
NK085(ru)004:1441: spang bar bya ba'i gzhi ma grub pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:1442: rnam par byang ba'i lam yin pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:1443: sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil grub yin pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:1444: thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin yin pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:1445: rigs lnga ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid yin pas na mi spang ngo //
NK085(ru)004:1447: log pa'i dug lnga chos can /
NK085(ru)004:1448: spang bar bya ba'i gzhi ma grub ste /
NK085(ru)004:1449: shes bya'i gshis la nyon mongs pa rang kha ma med pa'i phyir /
NK085(ru)004:1450: dper na thag khra sbrul du snang yang gshis la sbrul med pa bzhin no //
NK085(ru)004:1452: ma rig pa nyid spang du med //
NK085(ru)004:1453: rig pa ye shes bsgrub tu med //
NK085(ru)004:1456: log pa'i dug lnga chos can /
NK085(ru)004:1457: thabs kyis zin na rnam par byang ba'i lam yin te /
NK085(ru)004:1458: dug lnga spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs pa
NK085(ru)004:1459: las gzhan pa'i 'bras bu bsgrub bya med pa'i phyir
NK085(ru)004:1460: / dper na dug gi sman mar gyis dug nad
NK085(ru)004:1461: 'joms shing bdud rtsi'i mchog tu 'gyur ba bzhin no
NK085(ru)004:1463: nyon mongs rang dang spyir bstan pa //
NK085(ru)004:1464: mtshan nyid ma nor don rtogs na //
NK085(ru)004:1465: rnam par byang ba'i lam du 'gyur //
NK085(ru)004:1468: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug kyang //
NK085(ru)004:1469: byang chub chen po'i lam las byung //
NK085(ru)004:1470: kun spyod yon tan lnga rnams kyang //
NK085(ru)004:1471: chos nyid dbyings kyi rgyan zhes bya //
NK085(ru)004:1473: gsum pa ni log pa'i dug lnga chos can /
NK085(ru)004:1474: sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur te /
NK085(ru)004:1475: dug lnga yi ge gyis mtshon nas sku /
NK085(ru)004:1477: h'u gis mtshon nas thugs su brda sprod pas /
NK085(ru)004:1478: sgo gsum lha'i sku gsung thugs las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro //
NK085(ru)004:1479: dper na dug la sngags kyis btab pa bzhin no //
NK085(ru)004:1481: nyon mongs dug lngar snang ba'i rang bzhin rnams //
NK085(ru)004:1482: rnam grol ye shes lnga yi ngang du snang //
NK085(ru)004:1485: log pa'i dug lnga chos can /
NK085(ru)004:1486: thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin yin te /
NK085(ru)004:1487: dug lngar snang ba thabs dang /
NK085(ru)004:1488: de las rang bzhin med pa shes rab yin /
NK085(ru)004:1489: de gnyis ye nas dbyer mi phyed pa'i phyir ro //
NK085(ru)004:1490: dper na tsha nad can dang rlung nad can la ga bur sman dang dug tu snang yang /
NK085(ru)004:1491: ga bur sman dug dbyer med pa bzhin no //
NK085(ru)004:1493: ma 'gags snang ba thabs yin te //
NK085(ru)004:1494: rang bzhin med pa shes rab yin //
NK085(ru)004:1496: lnga pa ni log pa'i dug lnga chos can rigs lnga ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid yin te /
NK085(ru)004:1497: zhe sdang mi bskyod pa rdo rje'i rigs dang /
NK085(ru)004:1498: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes /
NK085(ru)004:1499: de bzhin tu gti mug de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang /
NK085(ru)004:1501: nga rgyal rin chen rigs dang /
NK085(ru)004:1504: so sor rtog /phrag dog las kyi rigs dang /
NK085(ru)004:1505: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK085(ru)004:1506: dper na 'khyag pa'i bdag nyid chu yin pa bzhin no //
NK085(ru)004:1508: zhe sdang rang byung ye shes chen po dang //
NK085(ru)004:1509: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
NK085(ru)004:1510: dri ba bzhi pa'i lan ni /
NK085(ru)004:1511: log pa'i dug lnga ma spangs pa'i dgos ched la don gnyer dang /
NK085(ru)004:1514: dang po blo zhen pa ldog pa'i /
NK085(ru)004:1515: spros pa'i bag chags nye bar zhi ba'i /
NK085(ru)004:1516: chos nyid kyi don la blo myur ba'i bka' zab mo la gus pa skye ba'i /
NK085(ru)004:1517: spyod lam tshogs su 'gyur ba'i dgos ched yod do //
NK085(ru)004:1518: de la dgos pa dang po ni /
NK085(ru)004:1519: pha mes thams cad mes tshig nas shi ba'i mi zhig gis bsam pa la /
NK085(ru)004:1520: me ni tsha zhing sreg pa kho na'o snyams du mngon par zhen pa /
NK085(ru)004:1521: dus nam zhig gi tshe 'brog dgon pa gcig tu
NK085(ru)004:1522: phyin pas de nas drang srong me'i gtsang sbra can
NK085(ru)004:1523: dang / ri dwags me byi dkar po bya ba /
NK085(ru)004:1524: me la gnas bcas nas zas su me za ba
NK085(ru)004:1525: skom du me 'thung ba zhig mthong nas 'o na
NK085(ru)004:1526: me 'di tsha zhing sreg pa kho nar 'dug snyam
NK085(ru)004:1527: pa'i mngon par zhen pa log go //
NK085(ru)004:1528: dpe de bzhin du theg pa 'og ma pas /
NK085(ru)004:1529: nyon mongs pa 'khor ba'i chos kho nar bzung ste /
NK085(ru)004:1530: spong 'gegs sbyang bsgyur byed pa la /
NK085(ru)004:1531: gsang sngags pas nyon mongs pa nyid rang rig pa byung chub sems yin pas /
NK085(ru)004:1532: ma spangs par lam du byas na sangs rgyas kyi
NK085(ru)004:1533: 'bras bu tshe gcig lus gcig la thob bo zhes
NK085(ru)004:1534: brjod pas / theg pa 'og ma pas dug lnga
NK085(ru)004:1535: 'khor ba'i chos kho na yin snyam pa'i mngon par
NK085(ru)004:1538: spang blang la sogs pa gnyis byung phan chad spros pa ste /
NK085(ru)004:1539: gnyis su zhen pa las log tsa na /
NK085(ru)004:1540: spros pa'i bag chags zhi ba'o //
NK085(ru)004:1542: nyon mongs pa nyid chos nyid yin pas de ltar
NK085(ru)004:1543: rtogs na lam dang 'bras bu gzhan na tshol mi
NK085(ru)004:1545: chos nyid la blo myur ba'o //
NK085(ru)004:1547: nyon mongs pa ma spangs bar byang chub thob pa'i
NK085(ru)004:1548: thabs khyad par can dang ldan pa sngags kyi bka'
NK085(ru)004:1549: rgyud 'di ni / theg pa gzhan las khyad par
NK085(ru)004:1550: 'phags pas shin tu zab pa'o snyam pa'i gus pa
NK085(ru)004:1551: rgyud 'di ni / skye'o // lnga pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:1552: lus ngag yid gsum gyi bya spyod thams cad la
NK085(ru)004:1553: ma 'gags par shes pas rgyu bsod nams kyi tshogs
NK085(ru)004:1554: rdzogs te / de'i gnad kyis nyon mongs pa dang rnam rtog ye shes su shar ba'o //
NK085(ru)004:1555: gnyis pa gzhan sel gyi dgos ched ni /
NK085(ru)004:1557: rang byung gi ye shes skye mi thub /
NK085(ru)004:1558: 'dod chags med na bde ba'i ye shes rgyud la
NK085(ru)004:1559: mi skye gti mug med na rnam par mi rtog
NK085(ru)004:1560: pa'i ngang la blo mi gnas /
NK085(ru)004:1561: nga rgyal med na chos nyid du la mi bzlos /
NK085(ru)004:1562: phrag dog med na mnyam pa nyid du khod ma snyoms pa'o //
NK085(ru)004:1563: dri ba lnga pa'i lan ni /
NK085(ru)004:1564: dug lnga lam du byed tshul la brtag pa bzhi ste /
NK085(ru)004:1565: de'ang chos can zhe sdang lta bu gcig la sbyar na /
NK085(ru)004:1566: rgyud la zhe sdang drag po kam gyis skyes pa'i rang ldog de ka lam du byed dam /
NK085(ru)004:1567: de gtan tshigs kyis gzhig pas rang bzhin ma grub pa de lam du byed dam /
NK085(ru)004:1568: zhe sdang la brten nas gnyen po byams pa bsgoms pa de lam du byed dam /
NK085(ru)004:1569: zhe stang 'gags pa'i rjes thob gyi shes pa gsal la rtog med lam du byed dam /
NK085(ru)004:1571: pha bsad kyi bu mtshams med kyi las kyis mi gos par rnam grol thob par thal /
NK085(ru)004:1573: rgyu mtshan nyid kyi theg pa dang khyad med par thal /
NK085(ru)004:1575: 'dod nyon mongs lam byed du 'dod kyang /
NK085(ru)004:1576: gnyen po lam byed du thal /
NK085(ru)004:1578: ma rig pa ye shes tha dad du thal /
NK085(ru)004:1579: de thams cad rtags khas blangs khyab pa tshad mas grub 'dod par nus pa ma yin te /
NK085(ru)004:1580: lung rigs kyis gsal lo zhe na /
NK085(ru)004:1582: rje gong bu skyo ston sh+aakya ye shes kyis zhal nas /
NK085(ru)004:1583: skad gcig ma dang po la nyon mongs pa tul gyis skyes pa la /
NK085(ru)004:1584: skad cig gnyis par chos nyid du shes pa lam du byed gsungs te /
NK085(ru)004:1585: des kyang brtag pa tha ma'i skyon mi spang do //
NK085(ru)004:1586: rje sgrol phug pa'i bzhed kyis nyon mongs pa kam gyis skye ba lam du byed de /
NK085(ru)004:1587: de yang dag pa'i lta bas rtsis zin pa /
NK085(ru)004:1588: rang rgyud du ma nor ba nyon mongs pa rang
NK085(ru)004:1589: gi mtha' la ma zhen pa dang chos sum ldan
NK085(ru)004:1590: gcig la lam du byed gsung yod kyang /
NK085(ru)004:1592: chos gsum ldan dang kam gyis skyes pa la khyad yod dam med /
NK085(ru)004:1593: yod na lam du byed rgyu de nyon mongs pa kam skyes ma yin par thal /
NK085(ru)004:1594: chos gsum ldan yin pa'i phyir /
NK085(ru)004:1597: tha dad pa'i dam bca' bud /
NK085(ru)004:1599: brtag pa dang po'i skyon gyiis gnod /
NK085(ru)004:1600: des na kho bos ni 'di ltar bsam te /
NK085(ru)004:1601: nyon mongs pa kam skyes la lam du byed la /
NK085(ru)004:1602: 'o na pha bsad kyi bu rang grol bar thal zhe na /
NK085(ru)004:1604: ma h+aa yo ga'i lam tshang la ma nor ba
NK085(ru)004:1605: lam du byed pa'i pha bsad kyi bu la zer
NK085(ru)004:1606: ram / de las gzhan pa'i pha bsad kyi bu la zer /
NK085(ru)004:1607: snga ma ltar na 'dod thog /phyi ma ltar na khyab pa med de /
NK085(ru)004:1608: pha bsad kyi bu de la /
NK085(ru)004:1609: zhe sdang kam skyes yod kyang ma h+aa yo ga'i lam pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK085(ru)004:1610: 'o na ma h+aa yo ga'i lam tshang la ma nor ba gang yin snyam na /
NK085(ru)004:1611: rgyu shes pa'i mtshan nyid lta ba'i gding dang ldan pas /
NK085(ru)004:1612: rkyen 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid ting nge 'dzin sgom pa'i
NK085(ru)004:1613: thabs kyis nyon mongs pa spyod kyang mi 'ching ba
NK085(ru)004:1614: / rma bya dug gis 'tsho ba lta bu'i rnal 'byor pas /
NK085(ru)004:1615: nyon mongs pa kam gyis skyes pa'i dus na /
NK085(ru)004:1616: skye bo tha mal pa ltar nyon mongs pa'i rjes su mi gtong /
NK085(ru)004:1619: byang chub sems dpa' ltar mi sbyong /
NK085(ru)004:1620: sngags phyi rgyud ltar mi sgyur bar dper na nya lam du chu bde ba lta bu ni /
NK085(ru)004:1621: ma h+aa yo ga'i lam pa mtshan nyid ldan pa yin no //
NK085(ru)004:1622: de ltar ma yin pa'i gsang sngags par khas 'ches pas /
NK085(ru)004:1623: gab ba'i gsang ba chos nyid ji bzhin pa'i don ma rtogs shing /
NK085(ru)004:1624: sbas pa'i gsang ba ta na dang g+ha na la sogs pa la /
NK085(ru)004:1626: gsang sngags sgra ji bzhin pa ltar spyod pa rnams ni /
NK085(ru)004:1627: mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skye
NK085(ru)004:1628: ba gsang sngags gsar rnying gi rgyud sde du mar
NK085(ru)004:1629: gsungs so // gsum pa dang du blang ba'i dam tshig la gsum /
NK085(ru)004:1631: gsang sngags bla med kyi sgor 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor
NK085(ru)004:1632: pa kun gyis mos pa dang nus pa'i sgo nas
NK085(ru)004:1633: dang du blang ba'i dam tshig la lnga ste /
NK085(ru)004:1634: gnyis pa rgyas bshad la gsum /
NK085(ru)004:1635: dang po rdzas kyi ngo bo ni /
NK085(ru)004:1638: ma sa ste sha chen dang /
NK085(ru)004:1639: zil pa ste pad+ma rak+ta dang /
NK085(ru)004:1640: lhag pa'i byang sems dang rnam pa lnga la /
NK085(ru)004:1641: gnyis pa yon tan 'byung bas dang du blang ba'i gtan tshigs ni /
NK085(ru)004:1645: byin rlabs kyis grub pa dang bzhi yis brgyan pa'i phyir dang du blang ste /
NK085(ru)004:1646: sems dngos po med bzhin lus su snang ba la
NK085(ru)004:1647: dam rdzas lnga gnas pa yang snang bzhin ngo bo
NK085(ru)004:1648: ma grub pa ni chos nyid rang gi rang bzhin
NK085(ru)004:1649: gyis grub pa / dam rdzas lnga ngo bo ma
NK085(ru)004:1650: grub bde ba'i ye shes bskyed pa ni chos can
NK085(ru)004:1651: rang gi ngo bos grub pa /
NK085(ru)004:1652: de lta sgom gyis nyams su len pas mchog dang
NK085(ru)004:1653: thun mong gi dngos grub 'byung ba ni mthus grub
NK085(ru)004:1654: pa / dam rdzas dang du blangs pa'i rnal 'byor
NK085(ru)004:1655: pa la sangs rgyas byang sems ma dang mkha' 'gro
NK085(ru)004:1656: thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ni byin rlabs
NK085(ru)004:1657: pa / kyis grub pa'o // de yang thal ba'i rgyud las /
NK085(ru)004:1658: dngos po ma lus sems nyid phyir //
NK085(ru)004:1659: mtshan nyid bral ba chos kyi dbyings //
NK085(ru)004:1660: rang bzhin ye shes bde ba lnga //
NK085(ru)004:1661: byed pa med par snang ba'o //
NK085(ru)004:1662: shes rab ting 'dzin thabs dag gis //
NK085(ru)004:1664: 'di lta'i lam la gang gnas pa //
NK085(ru)004:1665: phyogs dus kun nas byin gyis rlob //
NK085(ru)004:1668: nad lnga bsal phyir blang ba dang //
NK085(ru)004:1669: gtsang sme sdig sbyang phyir blang dang //
NK085(ru)004:1670: thun mong dgos pa lnga phyir dang //
NK085(ru)004:1671: rigs lngar grub pa'i yon tan no //
NK085(ru)004:1672: sdug bsngal las dgrol dngos grub thob pa'i phyir dang du blang ba'o //
NK085(ru)004:1673: yang na sngar gyi bshad srol ltar na /
NK085(ru)004:1674: dang po mthus grub pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:1675: nad lnga bsal ba'i phyir dang du blang ste /
NK085(ru)004:1676: dri chen gyi dug nad sel /
NK085(ru)004:1680: byang sems kyi tsha nad sel ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:1681: byin rlabs kyis sgrub pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:1682: gtsang ba dang sme ba ste btsog pa gnyis 'dzin
NK085(ru)004:1683: gyi sdig sgrib sbyang ba'i phyir lnga po dang du
NK085(ru)004:1684: blanga bas chos nyid mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa
NK085(ru)004:1685: dang / ngo bos grub pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:1686: kun dang thun mong gi dgos pa lnga yod pa'i
NK085(ru)004:1687: phyir dang du blang ste dri chen bsten pas tshe
NK085(ru)004:1691: byang sems kyis mi brjed pa'i gzungs thob pas gzhan zil gyis gnon pas brjid che ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:1692: rang bzhin gyis grub pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:1693: rgya che ba'i ngos nas rigsa lnga dang /
NK085(ru)004:1694: zab pa'i ngos nas ye shes lngar grub pa'i yon tan yod de /
NK085(ru)004:1695: pha'i byang sems kyis zhe sdang skye bas de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' /
NK085(ru)004:1696: dri chen gyi rtsa kha 'gags pas gti mug bskyed pa de nyid rnam snang /
NK085(ru)004:1697: lus kyis sha yis stobs rdzogs pas nga rgyal bskyed pas de nyid ri chen 'byung ldan /
NK085(ru)004:1698: ma'i rak+tasa 'dod chags bskyed pas de nyid snang ba mtha' yas /
NK085(ru)004:1700: rlung gis 'du byed kyi las byed pas phrag dog
NK085(ru)004:1701: byung bas de nyid don grub gti mug gi rmug
NK085(ru)004:1702: pa dag nas mi 'byed pa rang chos dbyings ye
NK085(ru)004:1703: shes / zhe sdang gi rtsub zer dag nas gsang ba rang me long ye shes /
NK085(ru)004:1704: nga rgyal gyi mi nyams pa dag nas rang mnyam nyid ye shes /
NK085(ru)004:1705: 'dod chags kyis zhen pa dag nas so sor 'byed pa rang sor rtog ye shes /
NK085(ru)004:1706: phrag dog gi gzhan gyi yon tan rang gi phrag
NK085(ru)004:1707: la mi shong ba dag nas rang bya ba grub
NK085(ru)004:1709: yang na kha dog lnga'i sgo nas rigs lnga ngo sprad pa yin te bdud rtsi bam brgyad las /
NK085(ru)004:1710: byang sems rdo rje sems dpa' dkar //
NK085(ru)004:1711: dri chen gser mdog rnam snang mdzad //
NK085(ru)004:1712: m+aam sa rin chen 'byung ldan sngo //
NK085(ru)004:1713: rak+ta snang ba mtha' yas dmar //
NK085(ru)004:1714: dri chu don yod grub pa ljang //
NK085(ru)004:1716: de'i don gyis khams gsum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las
NK085(ru)004:1717: grol nas mchog thun mong bsgrub pa'i dngos grub rnams
NK085(ru)004:1718: thob pa'o // gsum pa lta spyod kyi rtsi yis
NK085(ru)004:1719: zin nas spyad na lam gyi mchog gi yon tan
NK085(ru)004:1720: dpag med yod pa ni lte ba'i rtsa ni sha
NK085(ru)004:1721: thob pa'o // chen gyi bcud / long rtsa na rin chen /
NK085(ru)004:1723: rkyang ma na rak+ta kun 'dar ma ni byang sems
NK085(ru)004:1724: kyi bcud dang lnga po btung ba ste nyams su
NK085(ru)004:1725: blang ba la dbang thob na gnyis 'dzin las grol
NK085(ru)004:1726: nas mnyam pa nyid kyi don rtogs pa na lam
NK085(ru)004:1728: 'o na bdud rtsi lnga la gang spyod grol lam zhe na /
NK085(ru)004:1729: gsang sngags thabsa mkhas pa'i lta spyod kyi rtsi yis
NK085(ru)004:1730: zin cing lung bam brgyad la bshad pa ltar bsten
NK085(ru)004:1731: shes na / gong du grub pa bzhi'i skabs su bshad pa la sogs /
NK085(ru)004:1732: yon tan brjod pa las 'das par kun bzang gis gsungs so //
NK085(ru)004:1733: thabs kyis ma zin na mi grol te khyi phag bzhin no //
NK085(ru)004:1734: gsum pa rnam grangs kyi ngos nas zhabs bsdu ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:1735: grangs su phye bas don la /
NK085(ru)004:1736: mi 'da' bas dam tshig /de la rtsa ba'i bdud rtsi lnga /
NK085(ru)004:1737: rang bzhin gyis grub pa la rigs lnga ye shes lnga ste bco lnga /
NK085(ru)004:1738: grub pa gsum po la lnga lnga ste bco lnga dang sum cu de nyid /
NK085(ru)004:1739: lam zag bcas kyi ting nge 'dzin mthon dman gyi
NK085(ru)004:1740: skabsa kyi phye bas dang po mos pa lam du
NK085(ru)004:1741: byed / de nas tshogs lam chen po dang sbyor
NK085(ru)004:1742: lam la dngos su dang du blang barkun bzang gis
NK085(ru)004:1743: byed / gsungsa so // yang na dbang dang sgrub
NK085(ru)004:1744: pa'i skabs su dang du blang bar bya gsungs zhes
NK085(ru)004:1745: byed / gsungsa so // zer ro // dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)004:1746: dang du blang ba la lnga ste /
NK085(ru)004:1748: chos thams cad la rtag pa med pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:1749: rang bzhin grub pa'i mthu yod pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:1750: ye nas bdud rtsi yin pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:1751: skyon yon gyis dug dang bdud rtsi yin pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:1752: de nyid dngos grub chen po'i rgyu dang rkyen yin pas /
NK085(ru)004:1753: gsang sngags bsgrub pa'i thabs dam par spyod pa'i dam tshig go //
NK085(ru)004:1754: rtogs pa dang ting nge 'dzin mi ldan zhing /
NK085(ru)004:1755: gsang med par byol song bzhin du bab col du spyod pa ni nyams pa'o //
NK085(ru)004:1757: bzhi pa bsgrub par bya ba'i dam tshig la gsum /
NK085(ru)004:1759: gsang sngags nang pa'i rnal 'byor rnams kyi lam gyi
NK085(ru)004:1760: rtsol bas 'bras bu bsgrub par bya ba la lnga
NK085(ru)004:1762: gnyis pa rgyas par dbye ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:1763: thugs skye 'jig dang bral ba rdo rje'i rigs //
NK085(ru)004:1764: sku dri ma dang bral ba de pa'i rigs //
NK085(ru)004:1765: yon tan dgos 'dod 'byung ba rin chen rigs //
NK085(ru)004:1766: gsung nyes skyon gyis ma gos pa pad+ma'i rigs /
NK085(ru)004:1767: phrin las lhun gyis grub pa las kyi rigs dang lnga'o //
NK085(ru)004:1768: stong pa ni chos dbyings ye shes /
NK085(ru)004:1770: gsal stong dbyer med ni mnyam nyid /
NK085(ru)004:1771: de nyid shes bya ma 'dres par so sor gsal
NK085(ru)004:1772: ba ni sor rtog /ma 'dres par snang dus rig
NK085(ru)004:1773: pa rang snang du don gnyis lhun gyis grub pa
NK085(ru)004:1774: ni bya grub ye shes dang lnga /
NK085(ru)004:1775: chos dbyings snang stong mtha' gang du yang ma bskyod pas mi bskyod pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:1776: de nyid rang gsal ba las cir yang gsal bas rnam par snang mdzad /
NK085(ru)004:1777: gsal stong dbyer med pa las sangs rgyas kyi yon tan kun 'byung bas rin chen 'byung ldan /
NK085(ru)004:1778: dbyer med de nyid shes bya so sor ma 'dres
NK085(ru)004:1779: par zhing khams mthar thug pa med par gsal bas
NK085(ru)004:1781: chos nyid gsal ba las ma g.yos pa bzhin du
NK085(ru)004:1782: 'khor ba ma stongs bar du gzhan don gyi phrin
NK085(ru)004:1783: las rgyun mi 'chad cing lam bar ma dor chud
NK085(ru)004:1784: mi za bar 'bras bu la sbyor bas na don
NK085(ru)004:1785: yod grub pa ste snang ba'i cha 'dzin pas yab
NK085(ru)004:1786: lnga / stong pas rnam shes bskyed cing chos nyid
NK085(ru)004:1787: kyi 'byung gzhir gyur pas na nam mkha' dbyings phyug
NK085(ru)004:1788: lnga / ma / sa yis gzugs snang bskyod cing
NK085(ru)004:1789: rang la bzang ngan gyi rtogs pa dang bral zhing
NK085(ru)004:1790: snang dus stong pas sangs rgyas spyan ma /
NK085(ru)004:1791: chus tshor ba bskyed cing tshor bas chos thams cad bskyed pas na ma m+aa k+ai /
NK085(ru)004:1792: me gsal bas 'du shes bskyed cing rtogs na gzung 'dzin gyi lhag pa las skyob pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:1793: srid pa'i ljen ljin skam par byed pas na gos dkar mo /
NK085(ru)004:1794: rlung gis 'du byed kyi las bskyed cing phrin las
NK085(ru)004:1795: kyis sems can sangs rgyas kyi sar sgrol ba las
NK085(ru)004:1796: mi 'da' bas dam tshig sgrol ma ste /
NK085(ru)004:1797: stong pa'i cha 'dzin pas na yum lnga dang /
NK085(ru)004:1798: de ltar ye shes yab yum la /
NK085(ru)004:1799: gcig la 'ang lnga lnga shes par bya'o //
NK085(ru)004:1800: sku lnga ni 'khor 'das kyi chos kun snang la rang bzhin med par shar ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:1801: rnam kun mchog ldan gyi stong pa chos sku'o //
NK085(ru)004:1802: thams cad du rigs pa rang snang ba ni mngon par byang chub pa'i sku'o //
NK085(ru)004:1803: snang stong dbyer med pas 'khor 'das la longs spyod pas longs sku'o //
NK085(ru)004:1804: rig rtsal 'gag med du shar ba'i ngo bo la
NK085(ru)004:1805: thams cad lhun gyis grub pas dgongs pa la 'gro
NK085(ru)004:1806: 'ong med kyang sprul pa sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba'i
NK085(ru)004:1807: don byed pa ni sprul sku'o //
NK085(ru)004:1808: dgongs pa skye 'jig dang bral ba ni rdo rje'i sku dang lnga /
NK085(ru)004:1810: chos sku skye med donagyi gsung ni /
NK085(ru)004:1811: chos nyid rgya chad phyogs lhung dang bral ba lam pas brda mjal nas grol ba la bya'o //
NK085(ru)004:1812: mngon byang rig pa byin rlabs kyi gsung ni ye shes lnga rang la gnas pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:1813: rtogs byed kyi blo'i shes rab gnyis 'brel ba'i byin
NK085(ru)004:1814: rlabs kyi dpe nyi ma shar ba dang thams cad
NK085(ru)004:1816: 'khor 'das thams cad rig pa rang gsal ba la lam pas brda mjal ba'o //
NK085(ru)004:1817: longs sku dgongs pa brda'i gsung ni /
NK085(ru)004:1818: dpe me long la bltas na byad la dri ma gang yod gsal nas rig pa bzhin du /
NK085(ru)004:1819: longs sku la bltas pas shes bya'i dri ma rig
NK085(ru)004:1820: cing snang stong dbyer med lam pas brda' mjal ba'o
NK085(ru)004:1821: // sprul sku tshig gi gsung ni /
NK085(ru)004:1822: tshangs pa'i gsung gcig gis rigs drug so sor go ba ltar /
NK085(ru)004:1823: sprul sku'i gsung gcig la yan lag drug cu dang ldan zhing /
NK085(ru)004:1824: so sor rang rang dang mthun par go ba'o //
NK085(ru)004:1825: rdo rje'i gsung grag stong dbyer med ni /
NK085(ru)004:1827: thugsa lnga ni ye shes lnga ste /
NK085(ru)004:1828: cir yang mi dmigs pa bde ba chen po chos sku'i thugs /
NK085(ru)004:1829: cir yang ma 'gags pa me long lta bu mngon byang gi thugs /
NK085(ru)004:1830: dbyer med mnyam pa nyid longs sku'i thugs /
NK085(ru)004:1831: rig pa rang snang du rang gzhan gyi bya ba
NK085(ru)004:1832: lhun gyis grub pas 'gro ba sgrol ba sprul sku'i
NK085(ru)004:1833: thugs / cir yang snang ba so sor rtogs pa rdo rje'i sku'i thugs so //
NK085(ru)004:1835: spyir gzugs yul gnas su dag cing /
NK085(ru)004:1837: sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams su shar ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:1839: snang ba gnas su dag nas 'bras bu'i chos nyid
NK085(ru)004:1840: lhun grub tu rdzogs par rig pa rang snang ba
NK085(ru)004:1842: 'dod yon lnga la sogs ma spangs par longs spyod
NK085(ru)004:1843: cing rang rig pa'i ye shes su lhun gyis rdzogs
NK085(ru)004:1844: pa'i phyir / dbu rgyan la sogs rgyan du mas brgyan cha /
NK085(ru)004:1845: snying rjes mthar phyin nas chos nyid ma bsgrib par ye shes rang gsal ba'i phyir /
NK085(ru)004:1846: 'od zer kha dog drug ldan sna tshogs su 'phro
NK085(ru)004:1847: bas rigs drug gi don byed pa ni 'od zer
NK085(ru)004:1853: re ba bskang ba rin po che'i khri /
NK085(ru)004:1855: thabs shes nyi zla'i gdan ni /
NK085(ru)004:1856: gdan khri yon tan can no //
NK085(ru)004:1858: nad gdon sdig sgrib gzung 'dzin gyis mtshan ma zhi ba /
NK085(ru)004:1859: tshe dang bsod nams sku dang ye shes rgyas pa /
NK085(ru)004:1860: lha 'dre mi gsum mtha' gnyis dbang du bsdu ba /
NK085(ru)004:1861: dgra bgegs nyon mongs 'joms pa'i drag las bya ba /
NK085(ru)004:1862: de bzhi lhun gyis grub pa dang lnga'o //
NK085(ru)004:1863: de ltar sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las gcig kyang lnga lngar phye bas na /
NK085(ru)004:1864: gsum pa rnam grangs kyi ngos nas gdams pa dang bcas pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:1865: de ltar gong gi lnga rnams brtsis pas bzhi bcu
NK085(ru)004:1866: rtsa lnga yi bye brag rnams kyi mtshan nyid thos
NK085(ru)004:1867: bsam gyis shes shing rtogs nas sgom pa ting nge
NK085(ru)004:1868: 'dzin gyis bsgrub cing nyams su blang bar bya'o //
NK085(ru)004:1869: lnga pa shes par bya ba'i dam tshig la gsum gyi dang po mdor bstan /
NK085(ru)004:1870: rnam par shes pa la tshogs brgyad /
NK085(ru)004:1871: gzugs la gzugs chen bco lnga /
NK085(ru)004:1872: tshor ba la drug gsum bco brgyad /
NK085(ru)004:1873: 'du shes la zab pa rgya che chung gsum /
NK085(ru)004:1874: 'du byed la tshor ba 'du shes gnyis gong du
NK085(ru)004:1875: song nas bzhi bcu rtsa dgu spung bas phung po
NK085(ru)004:1876: lnga dang / sa chu me rlung nam mkha' ste
NK085(ru)004:1877: thams cad kyi 'byung gzhir gyur pas 'byung ba lnga
NK085(ru)004:1878: lnga dang / dang / mig gi dbang po zar ma'i me tog lta bu dang /
NK085(ru)004:1879: rna ba'i dbang po gro ga bcus pa lta bu /
NK085(ru)004:1880: sna'i dbang po zangs khab gshib pa lta bu /
NK085(ru)004:1881: lce'i dbang po zla ba bkas pa lta bu /
NK085(ru)004:1882: lus kyi dbang po bya reg 'jam gyi pags pa
NK085(ru)004:1883: lta bu ste tshor ba bskyed nus pas dbang po
NK085(ru)004:1884: lnga dang / mig gi yul gzugs la kha dog dang dbyibs gnyis /
NK085(ru)004:1885: rna ba'i yul sgra la zin ma zin gnyis /
NK085(ru)004:1886: sna'i yul dri la bzang ngan gnyis /
NK085(ru)004:1887: lce'i yul ro la drug /lus kyi yul reg bya
NK085(ru)004:1888: la 'jam rtsub gnyis te dbang shes sku'i skye nus
NK085(ru)004:1890: rkang lag bzhi mgo dang lnga ni lus las gyes pa'i yan lag lnga dang /
NK085(ru)004:1891: yan lag las gyes pa'i nying lag sor mo lnga dang /
NK085(ru)004:1894: bar pa la gti mug /bdag tu nga rgyal /
NK085(ru)004:1895: gzhan la phrag dog ste lus sems sdug par byed pa'i nyon mongsa lnga dang /
NK085(ru)004:1900: byang sems te dam rdzas lnga dang /
NK085(ru)004:1902: glang chen gti mug /rta nga rgyal /
NK085(ru)004:1904: khyi phrag dog ste sha lnga dang mi /
NK085(ru)004:1905: shar lho nub byang dbus dang phyogsa lnga dang /
NK085(ru)004:1906: mthing dkar ser dmar ljang ste kha dog lnga dang /
NK085(ru)004:1907: rigs drug la lha ma yin lhar brtsis pas 'gro ba lnga dang /
NK085(ru)004:1908: dus kyi snyigs ma dus ngan rtsod pa'i dus /
NK085(ru)004:1909: tshe'i snyigs ma tshe lo brgya pa man chad /
NK085(ru)004:1910: las kyi snyigs ma mi dge ba bcu la spyod pa /
NK085(ru)004:1911: sems can gyi snyigs ma dus der skye ba'i sems can /
NK085(ru)004:1912: nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma skye sla la 'jig dka' ba ste snyigsa ma lnga dang /
NK085(ru)004:1913: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid la dri ma can gyi 'khor bzhi ste /
NK085(ru)004:1917: bdag tu nga rgyal ba ste /
NK085(ru)004:1918: de yang rdzas can gser lta bu gcig la /
NK085(ru)004:1919: dang po gser phyi 'khor la yod na gser 'di
NK085(ru)004:1920: bye brag tu nga yis i lon bsam pa ni
NK085(ru)004:1922: lon nas gser 'di nga'i gser zhes bdag tu 'dzin pa /
NK085(ru)004:1923: gser 'di gces pa'i cha nas bdag tu chags pa /
NK085(ru)004:1924: gser 'di nga la yod gzhan la med bsam pas
NK085(ru)004:1925: bdag tu nga rgyal ba dang bzhis bskor bas bag
NK085(ru)004:1926: chags lnga dang / yang na bdag tu 'dzin pa /
NK085(ru)004:1929: bdag tu nga rgyal ba ste /
NK085(ru)004:1930: de yang rdzas can gser lta bu gcig la /
NK085(ru)004:1933: de nas ngas lon par byed bsam nas rlom /
NK085(ru)004:1934: lon pa la 'di yod bsam pa'i nga rgyal du 'dod pa yang snang /
NK085(ru)004:1935: de rnams re re la lnga lnga po dag tu phyes pas /
NK085(ru)004:1936: grangs bdun cu yod pa la sogsa 'khor ba'i chos thams cad ni /
NK085(ru)004:1937: gnyis pa 'khor ba'i chos thams cad ye nas rig
NK085(ru)004:1938: sku ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du
NK085(ru)004:1939: ka nas dag pa yin pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:1945: la sogs rtog tshogs rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang
NK085(ru)004:1946: bzhin du ngang gis ka nas dag pa yin te
NK085(ru)004:1952: g.yas kyi sor mo lnga rigs lnga /
NK085(ru)004:1953: g.yon gyi sor mo lnga yum lnga /
NK085(ru)004:1954: nyon mongs pa lnga ye shes lnga /
NK085(ru)004:1958: kha dog lnga ni ye shes lnga'i rang 'od rig lnga'i kha dog /
NK085(ru)004:1960: dug lnga yin pa ni ye shes lnga /
NK085(ru)004:1961: snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ba dang ldan pas na /
NK085(ru)004:1962: sku lnga ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid /
NK085(ru)004:1963: bag chags lnga ni nyon mongs pa ste ye shes so //
NK085(ru)004:1964: gsum pa de'i don rtogs pa ni lta ba'i gding dang ldan pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:1965: don de rnams rang gis thos shing bsam pas blo
NK085(ru)004:1966: la nyamsa su blangsa pas don rtogs pa'i ngo bo
NK085(ru)004:1967: ni / bsam pa'i blo'i spyod yul dang bral zhing
NK085(ru)004:1968: yang dag pa'i snang stong dbyer med kyi don rnal
NK085(ru)004:1970: gnyis thun mong gi yan lag la gnyis kyi dang po mdor bstan ni /
NK085(ru)004:1971: theg pa rim pa dgu'i thun mong gi bsrung bya'i dam tshig la mtha' yas kyang mdor bsdus nas /
NK085(ru)004:1972: bdag don nyi shu rtsa gcig /gzhan don du bzhi bcu zhe bzhir shes par bya /
NK085(ru)004:1973: gnyis pa rgyas bshad de la gnyis yod pa'i dang po /
NK085(ru)004:1974: bdag don du bsrung ba la gnyis kyi thog mar /
NK085(ru)004:1975: spang bya'i skyon rnams bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:1977: sho dang mig mang la sogs rgyan 'gyed par byed pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:1978: chos dang mi mthun pa'i lus mdzes par byed pa'i
NK085(ru)004:1979: thabs kyi sgeg chos rnams dang gcig /dmag dang ston
NK085(ru)004:1980: mo tshong dus la sogs pa'i mi mang po 'dus
NK085(ru)004:1982: dgra sdang sdig 'phel mi basngagasa 'chi nyes can //
NK085(ru)004:1983: de phyir mkhas pas 'khrugs pa'i ltad mo spang //
NK085(ru)004:1985: chang dad che ba dang gsum /
NK085(ru)004:1986: de la skyon ci yod na /
NK085(ru)004:1987: yo ga rdo rje rtse mo las /
NK085(ru)004:1988: phung khrol kun gyi rtsa ba yi //
NK085(ru)004:1989: chang ni rnam par spang bar bya //
NK085(ru)004:1992: nyes pa thams cad bskyed byed pa'i //
NK085(ru)004:1993: chang ni sngags pas spang bar bya //
NK085(ru)004:1995: dpal yang dag gi sgrub pa las /
NK085(ru)004:1996: sgrub pa po rnams ting nge 'dzin gyi 'gal rkyen chang spang bar bya'o //
NK085(ru)004:1999: thug thub ra chod nga rgyal ris //
NK085(ru)004:2000: drag byed dbang po nyams pa'i bcud //
NK085(ru)004:2001: snyom las le lo'i gzhir gyur pa //
NK085(ru)004:2002: dpa' byed rkyen yang rnam par bsdom //
NK085(ru)004:2006: der ni chang ni btung bar bya //
NK085(ru)004:2008: tshogs kyi skabs su gnang la /
NK085(ru)004:2009: byin gyis ma brlabs pa'i chang btung bar mi bya ste /
NK085(ru)004:2011: byin gyis ma brlabs chang btung na //
NK085(ru)004:2012: dmyal ba ngu 'bod gnas su skye //
NK085(ru)004:2014: nga rgyal gyi dreg pas lus kyi sgo nas mchong
NK085(ru)004:2015: rgyug gyad 'degs la sogs pa ma zhi ba'i spyod
NK085(ru)004:2016: pas gzhan zil gyis gnon par byed pa rnams dang
NK085(ru)004:2017: / ngag gi sgo nas tshig rtsub kyis gzhan gyi
NK085(ru)004:2018: zhe gcod cing rang mtho ba'i tshig 'don pa dang
NK085(ru)004:2019: / bzhi / sems kyi sgo nas kheng semsa kyis
NK085(ru)004:2020: bla ma dang mched la mi gus shing sems can
NK085(ru)004:2021: gzhan la snying rje dang mi ldan pa dang lnga
NK085(ru)004:2022: / bzhi / / rang gi lus ngag yid gsum
NK085(ru)004:2023: lha'i sku gsung thugs rdo rje gsum por byin gyis
NK085(ru)004:2024: / bzhi / / brlabs nas / rang bas yul
NK085(ru)004:2025: dma' ba rnams la phyag mi byed pa dang drug
NK085(ru)004:2026: /zhar la sngags la dgongs pa mtho dman /
NK085(ru)004:2028: dbang zab mi zab nyan thos la sdom pa tshang mi tshang /
NK085(ru)004:2029: byang chub sems dpa' la sems bskyed yod med rnams shes par bya'o //
NK085(ru)004:2030: rang de tsam min yang gong ma chen po rnams
NK085(ru)004:2031: kyi gsungs tshul gyi ngag ltar byed pa dang bdun
NK085(ru)004:2032: / gzhan gyis dge ba'i bye brag gang byed la
NK085(ru)004:2033: khe brag che la 'chos yin byas pas smod pa
NK085(ru)004:2034: / dang brgyad / gzhan gyis sdig las byed pa
NK085(ru)004:2035: la dpa' bo pho rgod zer nas bstod pa dang
NK085(ru)004:2036: / dang brgyad / dgu / chos bsgrub pa la
NK085(ru)004:2037: brtson 'grus mi byed nas le lo byed pa dang
NK085(ru)004:2038: / dang brgyad / dgu / bcu / dkon mchog
NK085(ru)004:2039: gsum dang bla ma dang grogs po chos bsgrub pa'i
NK085(ru)004:2040: phyogs su nor gtong mi nus pa'i ser sna che
NK085(ru)004:2041: ba dang bcu gcig /dge sbyor byed dus gti mug
NK085(ru)004:2042: dbang du btang nas gnyid la dga' ba dang bcu
NK085(ru)004:2043: gnyis 'jig rten gyi bya bas g.yeng nas dge ba
NK085(ru)004:2044: mi byed pa dang bcu gsum /
NK085(ru)004:2045: sems khro shing lus ngag gtum pa'i spyod pas zhe sdang gi sdig las byed pa dang bcu bzhi /
NK085(ru)004:2046: las gang byed la legs nyes yi skyon yon shes
NK085(ru)004:2047: pa'i bsam pa sngon du mi gtong zhing gzhan gyis
NK085(ru)004:2048: bcos kyang mi nyan pa dang bco lnga /
NK085(ru)004:2049: bla ma dang grogs po'i bka' gcog pa dang bcu
NK085(ru)004:2050: drug /chos don du mi gnyer zhing tshe 'dir don
NK085(ru)004:2051: du gnyer ba la nya pa rngon pa la sogs
NK085(ru)004:2052: mi dge ba sdig pa'i grogsa po brten pa dang
NK085(ru)004:2053: bcu bdun / gong ma rnams kyi thugs dkrugs /
NK085(ru)004:2054: bar ma rnams kyi zhe gcod /
NK085(ru)004:2055: dman pa rnams la dngos su gnod pa'i bag med pa'i spyod pa dang bco brgyad /
NK085(ru)004:2056: dge ba bsgrub par dam bcas pa mi byed nas dor ba dang bcu dgu /
NK085(ru)004:2057: longs spyod rang la phun sum tshogs kyang chog mi
NK085(ru)004:2058: shes te snon pa btsal ba'i bsam pas srid pa
NK085(ru)004:2059: phyir phyir che ba dang nyi shu /
NK085(ru)004:2060: 'jig rten khe drag gi sgo nas chos kyi don
NK085(ru)004:2061: dang spyod lam gyis don gang yang gzhan la ngom
NK085(ru)004:2062: pa la dga' ba dang nyer gcig go //
NK085(ru)004:2063: gnyis pa de las bzlog pa'i yon tan bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:2064: gong du bstan pa'i spang bya nyi shu rtsa gcig po de las bzlog ste spangs pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:2065: rnal 'byor pa bdag gi don mchog tu 'gyur ba yin te /
NK085(ru)004:2066: mkha' 'gro chos skyong la sogs 'jig rten lha mi
NK085(ru)004:2067: kun gyis bdag nyid gtsug tu khur zhing bskur bar
NK085(ru)004:2068: 'gyur / gnyis pa gzhan don la gnyis kyi dang
NK085(ru)004:2069: po thugs rjes spyod pa'i ngos nas gzhan don nyams
NK085(ru)004:2071: srid zhi'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs kyi spyod pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:2075: bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag /shes rab bskyed pa ste drug dang /
NK085(ru)004:2078: sems can la sbyin pa gtong ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:2083: rang gis kha thon byed pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:2084: de'i don la sems nas bsam pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:2085: bsgom pa ste dge 'dun gyi chos spyod bcu la spyod pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:2086: 'o na phar phyin drug chos spyod bcu po 'di
NK085(ru)004:2087: rnams rang gzhan gnyis ka'i don du spyad dgos zer
NK085(ru)004:2088: na / sems bskyed kyis zin na rang don yang gzhan don yin la /
NK085(ru)004:2089: sems bskyed kyis ma zin na gzhan don byed pa ltar du snang yang rang don yin no //
NK085(ru)004:2090: zang zing sbyin pas chos la 'dzud /
NK085(ru)004:2091: snyan par smra bas chos legs par ston /
NK085(ru)004:2092: don spyod pas chos nyams su len bcug /don dang
NK085(ru)004:2093: mthun pas rang gzhan gnyis ka'i chos dang mthun par
NK085(ru)004:2094: byas te / bsdu ba'i dngosa po rnam pa bzhi'i 'phrin las kyi spyod pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:2095: yang na 'phrin las rnam pa bzhi yang zer /
NK085(ru)004:2096: gdul bya rang rang dang don mthun par 'jug pa'i thabsa kyi spyod pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:2097: theg pa dgu yis 'dul ba la /
NK085(ru)004:2098: dbang po rab 'bring rang rang gi blo dang mthun par nyan thos rang rgyal byang sems gsum /
NK085(ru)004:2099: bya ba spyod pa rnal 'byor gsum /
NK085(ru)004:2100: bskyed dang rdzogs dang rdzogs chen gsum dang dgu ston pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:2101: mu stegs 'dul ba la bye brag pa dang tha
NK085(ru)004:2102: snyad pa gnyis ni nyan thos kyi mu stegs pa
NK085(ru)004:2103: ste gcig /rang snang phyogs gcig pa ni rang sangs
NK085(ru)004:2104: rgyas kyi mu stegs pa dang gnyis /
NK085(ru)004:2107: rgya cher yangs pa dbu ma dang gsum byang chub sems dpa'i mu stegs pa dang gsum /
NK085(ru)004:2110: rig sbyor ba gsum ni sngags phyi rgyud gsum gyi
NK085(ru)004:2111: mu stegs pa gsum dang drug /brtul zhugs cher spyod
NK085(ru)004:2113: rgyal dpog pa dang gsum ste nang pa rnam gsum
NK085(ru)004:2114: kyi mu stegs pa dgu po rang rang gi tshul
NK085(ru)004:2115: dang bstun cing mthar nang pa la btsud pa dang
NK085(ru)004:2116: / 'gro ba rigs drug gi don byed pa la
NK085(ru)004:2117: rang rang gi spyod pa rnams dang mthun pa'i sgo
NK085(ru)004:2118: nas don byed dgos pa la /
NK085(ru)004:2119: spyod pa de rnams rang rgyud du 'dzin pa dang
NK085(ru)004:2120: der ltung dgos kyi rnam grangs med par spyad cing
NK085(ru)004:2121: don 'gyur ci ltar snang ba de yang nyamsa su
NK085(ru)004:2122: blang ste / rngon pa 'dul ba la rngon pa /
NK085(ru)004:2123: smad 'tshong ma 'dul ba la smad 'tshong ma la sogs gang la gang 'dul gyi don bya ba'o //
NK085(ru)004:2124: gnyis pa rnam grangs kyi ngos nas gdul bya mi spang bar gdams pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:2125: phar phyin drug chos spyod bcu bsdu dngos bzhi theg
NK085(ru)004:2126: pa dgu mu stegs dgu 'gro ba rigs drug ste
NK085(ru)004:2127: gzhan don bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi la sogsa pa yi
NK085(ru)004:2128: / gdul bya gang yang gang la gang 'dul gyi don bya zhing /
NK085(ru)004:2130: gnyis pa bsrung ba'i man ngag phan yon dang bcas pa'i sgo nas zhabs bsdu ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:2131: gong gi rtsa ba dang yan lag gi bsrung bar bya ba de dag bsrung tshul ni /
NK085(ru)004:2132: dper na byang ba'i lug rdzi yis lug skyong ba
NK085(ru)004:2133: la tshang ba skyong zhing ma tshang ba rnams gzhug
NK085(ru)004:2134: pa bzhin du / rnam grangsa sum brgya drug cu
NK085(ru)004:2135: btab nas nyin mtshan dus drug tu dran pa dang
NK085(ru)004:2136: shes bzhin gyis bya ra ba btang nas las dang
NK085(ru)004:2137: po pas rde'u dkar nag bgrang ste /
NK085(ru)004:2138: sum brgya drug bcu'i rnam grangs tshang ba bsrung /
NK085(ru)004:2139: ma tshang na bshags sdom byas nas gzhugs cing /
NK085(ru)004:2140: dang po thun mong gi yan lag nus ldan du bsrungs la /
NK085(ru)004:2141: khyad par gyi yan lag mos bsrung byed cing /
NK085(ru)004:2142: mthar thun mong gi dam tshig gzhan don du bsrungs la /
NK085(ru)004:2143: khyad par gyi dam tshig nus ldan du bsrung ba la spyod pa'i yon tan ni /
NK085(ru)004:2144: snang stong dbyer med kyi don rnal ma la rang
NK085(ru)004:2145: rig pa'i blo 'byor zhing spyod yul thams cad ye
NK085(ru)004:2146: shes su shar ba'i dbang phyug chen por 'gyur zhes
NK085(ru)004:2147: rgyal ba kun bzang gis gsungsa so //
NK085(ru)004:2148: spyi don bzhi pa dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu bstan pa la gsum gyi dang po mdor bstan ni /
NK085(ru)004:2149: gong du song ba'i dam tshig de rnams nyamsa par
NK085(ru)004:2150: gyur pa'i rgyu dag rgyas par bshad cing gsal bar
NK085(ru)004:2152: gnyis pa nyams rgyu'i rnam grangs rgyas bshad ni /
NK085(ru)004:2153: lha chos dang 'dra ba'i mi chos rgyal po'i blon
NK085(ru)004:2154: po lta bu'i las gzhan phyogs pham zhing rang phyogs
NK085(ru)004:2155: rgyal bar byed pa'i thabs la 'bad pa la yengs
NK085(ru)004:2156: pas kun nyams kyang khyad par du sku'i dam tshig
NK085(ru)004:2157: nyams pa'i rgyu dang gcig /bdag gi skyon rnams sba
NK085(ru)004:2158: zhing yon tan gang yod tshig gis brgyan nas bstod
NK085(ru)004:2159: pa dang gnyis / gzhan gyi yon tan thams cad
NK085(ru)004:2160: bskung zhing skyon gang yod tshig gis brgyan nas smad
NK085(ru)004:2161: pa dang gnyis / pa dang gsum / gtam ci
NK085(ru)004:2162: smras na yang gzhan la phrag dog pa'i ngos nas
NK085(ru)004:2163: zur za nas thabs mkhas pa'i sgo nas bstod tshul
NK085(ru)004:2165: de rnams sku'i dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyur 'agro'o //
NK085(ru)004:2166: zas nor gyi khe 'dod pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:2167: 'jig rten gyi grag pa nyid 'dod pa'i phyir 'khor
NK085(ru)004:2168: dang zas nor 'du ba'i thabs 'dzin zhen gyis rta
NK085(ru)004:2169: rgyug cing 'bul 'gyed la sogs pa du ma bstan
NK085(ru)004:2170: pa dang lnga / de na kun nyams pa'i rgyu yin no //
NK085(ru)004:2171: nor rdzas kyi dngos po rnams la chagsa semsa che
NK085(ru)004:2172: bas ngag gis g.yam pa ltar byed nas sems kyis
NK085(ru)004:2173: byi la'i spar mo ltar bsdam pa dang drug /bya
NK085(ru)004:2174: ba ci la yang rang phyogs che nas gzhan blos
NK085(ru)004:2176: de gnyis ni sku'i dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu yin
NK085(ru)004:2177: la gzhan rnams cha phra mo tsam yod chang dad
NK085(ru)004:2178: che ba ni kun nyams pa'i rgyu yin pa dang
NK085(ru)004:2179: brgyad / rang rigs mtho sgo bzang /
NK085(ru)004:2180: yon tan che bar rloms nas rang mthong che ba
NK085(ru)004:2181: ni sku'i dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyur 'gro ba dang
NK085(ru)004:2182: dgu / lta sgom spyod gsum sdom las su btang
NK085(ru)004:2183: nas yal ba ni byang sems sku gsung thugs khyad
NK085(ru)004:2184: par gyi yan lag nyams pa'i rgyur 'gro ba dang
NK085(ru)004:2185: dgu / bcu / chos la phyogs ris byed nas
NK085(ru)004:2186: chags sdang che ba ni byang chub sems kyi dam
NK085(ru)004:2187: tshig nyams pa'i rgyu yin pa dang bcu gcig /chos
NK085(ru)004:2188: dang 'jig rten gyi bya ba'i yon tan gnyis ka
NK085(ru)004:2189: gzhan la ngom skyen pa ni thugs kyi dam tshig
NK085(ru)004:2190: nyams pa'i rgyur 'gro ba dang bcu gnyis /
NK085(ru)004:2191: gsang bar gdam pa la sogs pa skyon yon gang
NK085(ru)004:2192: yang gsang chung ba ni thugs kyi dam tshig nyams
NK085(ru)004:2193: pa'i rgyur 'gro ba dang bcu gsum /
NK085(ru)004:2194: brtson 'grus chung zhing le lo che ba ni gsung
NK085(ru)004:2195: sku byang sems nyams pa'i rgyur nye ba dang bcu
NK085(ru)004:2196: bzhi / gtsang sme che ba ni dang blang nyams pa'i rgyur 'gro ba dang bco lnga /
NK085(ru)004:2197: bla ma dang mched la sogs pa rnams la skyon
NK085(ru)004:2198: med pa la skyon yod zer nas sgro btags pa
NK085(ru)004:2199: dang / yon tan yod pa la med ces skur pas btab pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:2200: sku'i dam tshig nyams nye ba dang bcu drug /thabs
NK085(ru)004:2201: kyis grogsa po rnams kyi kha tshod nyul nas ci
NK085(ru)004:2202: 'dra nyams len byed cing skyon gang yod gzhan la
NK085(ru)004:2203: sgrogs pa ni sku nyam pa'i rgyu yin pa dang
NK085(ru)004:2204: bcu bdun / 'khor ba'i rang gi rigs rgyud bu
NK085(ru)004:2205: dang tsha bo nor rnams 'phel bar 'dod cing de
NK085(ru)004:2206: la brtson pa ni kun nyams pa'i rgyur 'gro ba
NK085(ru)004:2207: bcu bdun / dang bco brgyad / rang gcig pur
NK085(ru)004:2208: dgon par mi gnas pa ni kun nyams pa'i rgyu
NK085(ru)004:2210: 'dus tshogs gar che sa la dga' ba ni kun nyams pa'i rgyur 'gro ba dang nyi shu'o //
NK085(ru)004:2211: gsum pa ma spangs na nyams par 'gyur ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:2212: de ltar grangs nyi shu ma spangs na rtsa ba
NK085(ru)004:2213: dang yan lag gi dam tshig kun nyamsa pa'i rgyur
NK085(ru)004:2214: 'gyur ro // spyi don lnga pa nyams pa'i snga rtags la gnyis kyi dang po mdor bstan ni /
NK085(ru)004:2215: dam tshig nyams pa'i snga rtagsa tshe 'dir sngon du 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste /
NK085(ru)004:2216: rgyas bshad la gsum gyi dang po nyams pa'i skyon
NK085(ru)004:2217: tshe 'di la 'byung bas phyi mar ngan song du
NK085(ru)004:2219: sku nyams pa'i snga rtags ni lus la gzhan nyamsa
NK085(ru)004:2220: nga ba'i nad mdze dang phol mig 'brum bu la
NK085(ru)004:2222: gsung nyams pa'i snga rtags la ngag gis dgra bgegs
NK085(ru)004:2223: gnyis la bden pa bdar bas don mi 'jug ste
NK085(ru)004:2225: bgegs la byin rlabs med cing 'khor dang longs spyod yid du 'ong ba rnams dang bral zhing /
NK085(ru)004:2226: gzhan gyi ya khas rang ma nyes kyang gtam ngan pa'i kha g.yogsa 'byung la /
NK085(ru)004:2227: thugs nyams pa'i snga rtags la brtsam pa'i las la
NK085(ru)004:2228: 'bras bu med cing mi grub pa'i steng du yid
NK085(ru)004:2229: du mi 'ong pa'i las sna tshogs 'byung ba'o //
NK085(ru)004:2230: gnyis pa nyams kyang rtags med na phyi mar ltung
NK085(ru)004:2231: tshab che bas sdug bsngal yun ring bar bstan pa
NK085(ru)004:2232: ni / gal te dam tshig nyamsa pa can la
NK085(ru)004:2233: nyams pa'i snga rtagsa rnams tshe 'di la med par
NK085(ru)004:2234: legsa pa ltar snang ba ni mi rung ba yin
NK085(ru)004:2235: ni / te / sngar gyi bde ba'i las 'bras
NK085(ru)004:2236: kyi rting la tshe 'dir zad par byas nas phyi
NK085(ru)004:2237: ma la gtan du sdug bsngal ba'i ngan song las
NK085(ru)004:2238: ni / te / thon daka'o // gsum pa ma
NK085(ru)004:2239: nyams par rtags byung na tshe snga ma'i las ngan
NK085(ru)004:2240: gyi rting pa 'di dge sbyor byed pa'i stobs kyis
NK085(ru)004:2241: slong bas bskang gso la brtson na phyi ma ngan
NK085(ru)004:2242: song du mi myong ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:2243: gal te dam tshig ma nyamsa pa la nyams pa'i rtagsa gong ltar du byung na /
NK085(ru)004:2244: tshe rabs sngon gyi dam tshig nyams pa'i rnam smin
NK085(ru)004:2245: gyi las rting yod pa de 'dir dam tshig la
NK085(ru)004:2246: nan tan du bsrungs ba'i stobs kyis las ngan zad
NK085(ru)004:2247: par 'gyur ba'i ltas yin pas nyams pa bskang ba
NK085(ru)004:2248: dang / dam tshig gso ba'i las la brtson par byas na /
NK085(ru)004:2249: phyi mar ngan song gsum gyis sdug bsngal rnams myong bar mi 'gyur ro //
NK085(ru)004:2250: spyi don drug pa nyams pa'i skyon bstan pa la gnyis kyi dang po mdor bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:2251: dam tshig nyamsa par gyur pa'i skyon rnams rgyas par bshad pa ni 'di lta ste /
NK085(ru)004:2252: gnyis pa rgyas bshad la gnyis kyi dang po rtsa
NK085(ru)004:2253: ba nyams pa'i skyon la gnyis kyi dang po bye
NK085(ru)004:2255: dang po byang sems dam tshig nyams pa'i skyon ni /
NK085(ru)004:2256: byang chub semsa kyi dam tshig bskyed rdzogs kyi don nyamsa par 'gyur na /
NK085(ru)004:2257: bskal par 'dus byas kyi dge ba bcu ci bsags
NK085(ru)004:2258: kyang lha mi'i bde 'bras thob pa ma gtogs pa
NK085(ru)004:2259: / bskyed rdzogs kyi don nyams su mi blang zhing /
NK085(ru)004:2260: skur pas btab na rnam mkhyen sangs rgyas thob pa'i gzhi rten med par 'gyur ba yin pas na /
NK085(ru)004:2261: phyi ma khams gsum 'khor ba'i khamsa su zag par 'gyur zhing 'bras bu sangs rgyas mi thob bo //
NK085(ru)004:2263: gtan nas ma log cing bshags sems dang ldan na nyams kyang slar 'tsho ba la /
NK085(ru)004:2264: gting nas bshags sems med pa ni bskang ba'i tshad las 'das pa'o //
NK085(ru)004:2266: gnyis pa sku'i dam tshig ni /
NK085(ru)004:2267: sku'i dam tshig slob dpon dang mched la nyamsa par gyur na /
NK085(ru)004:2268: phyi mar gzhan ya nga ba'i nad mdze dang phol mig 'brum bu la sogs sdug bsngal che zhing /
NK085(ru)004:2269: 'chi ba'i dus min par tshe zad na 'chi ba
NK085(ru)004:2270: la sogs glo bur gyi bar chad mang ba dang
NK085(ru)004:2271: / ltung tshab che na bskal par rdo rje dmyal
NK085(ru)004:2272: bar lhung bas bde ba skad cig kyang mi myong
NK085(ru)004:2273: bas rab tu bral bar 'gyur ro //
NK085(ru)004:2274: rdo rje dmyal ba ni mnar med dmyal ba dang grong dang dgon du 'dod do //
NK085(ru)004:2276: gsung gi dam tshig sngags gsum dang phyag rgya bzhi nyamsa par gyur na /
NK085(ru)004:2277: phyi mar bgegsa rnams thogsa pa med par 'ong bas bar chad sna tshogs byed pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:2278: glo bur du dgra dang nad kyi rkyen mang ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:2279: yul zhugs bud dang shi chad kyi ye 'grogsa mang ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:2280: gang bsgrub pa'i chos la byin rlabs med par 'gyur
NK085(ru)004:2281: zhing ltung tshab che na bskal pa gnyis su rdo
NK085(ru)004:2283: 'o na mtshan nyid sde gsum gyis sngags gsum dang
NK085(ru)004:2284: phyag rgya bzhi mi bsgom pas nyams pa de rnams
NK085(ru)004:2285: 'byung zhe na / gsung gi dam tshig nyams pa'i
NK085(ru)004:2286: steng nas las mi dge ba sna tshogs byas na
NK085(ru)004:2287: tshe 'di phyi'i sdug bsngal myong la /
NK085(ru)004:2288: gsung gi dam tshig nyams pa tsam gyis mchog thun mong gi sgrub pa'i thabsa gang bsgrub pa las /
NK085(ru)004:2289: 'bras bu dus tshod la mi 'byung bas 'gyang bar rgyal ba kun bzang gis gsungsa so //
NK085(ru)004:2290: bzhi pa thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pa'i skyon ni /
NK085(ru)004:2291: thugsa kyi dam tshig gsang ba bcu las nyamsa par
NK085(ru)004:2292: gyur na phyi ma sems kyi dran pa med pas
NK085(ru)004:2293: smyo ba dang / ngag 'di yin 'di min med pa'i 'bags 'bogs gtam pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:2294: dbang po'i sgo lnga nyams pas yul la 'jug mi nus pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:2295: gzhan yang lus ngag gi spyod pa 'achala ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:2297: ngag sgra mi shes nas lkugsa pa'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur zhing /
NK085(ru)004:2298: gal te mir skyes nas mchog thun mong gi dngos
NK085(ru)004:2299: grub gang yin yang gsang bar smra ba'i skyon gyis
NK085(ru)004:2300: bsgrub pa la rtags med cing phyi ma ltung tshab
NK085(ru)004:2301: che na khyad par du lce dpag tshad lnga brgya
NK085(ru)004:2302: par gyur pa la lcags kyi thong gshol me 'bar
NK085(ru)004:2303: ba lnga brgyas zhing rmo ba la sogsa pa'i rdo
NK085(ru)004:2304: rje dmyal bar bskal pa chen po gsum du gnas
NK085(ru)004:2305: par bshad do // gnyis pa spyir rtsa ba kun
NK085(ru)004:2306: nyams pa la rdo rje dmyal bar ltung ba'i skyon
NK085(ru)004:2307: la lnga yi dang po skyon dngos ni /
NK085(ru)004:2308: spyir rtsa ba'i dam tshig kun nyams te sna gcig
NK085(ru)004:2309: tsam yang bsrung rgyu med pa'i phyal ba de dag
NK085(ru)004:2310: /tshur gso ba'i thabs la nye bar mi brtson na
NK085(ru)004:2311: / phyi mar rdo rje dmyal bar dam nyams de ltung ngo //
NK085(ru)004:2312: gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa las log pa rnams
NK085(ru)004:2313: der skye bas na rdo rje dmyal ba zhes bya'o
NK085(ru)004:2315: bla ma rdo rje slob dpon /
NK085(ru)004:2316: gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa /
NK085(ru)004:2317: de'i don la gol zhing log pa ni rdo rje dmyal ba zhes gsungs so //
NK085(ru)004:2318: chos rjes dam tshig rgya mtsho las /
NK085(ru)004:2319: gsum ldan rtsa ba'i bla ma la /
NK085(ru)004:2320: sbyor ba gnyis ldan gyi sgo nas dam tshig nyams /
NK085(ru)004:2321: rdo rje dmyal bar ltung ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:2322: de la bla ma dang slob ma'i 'brel ba thob
NK085(ru)004:2323: nas bsam pa dang sbyor ba'i dbang gis nyams pa
NK085(ru)004:2325: gcig gnyis gsum dang ldan pas nyi shu rtsa bdun no //
NK085(ru)004:2326: de yang rdo rje theg dgu 'byung ba'i rgyud las /
NK085(ru)004:2327: bla ma la ni dgur shes bya //
NK085(ru)004:2328: ltung ba'i mtshan nyid shes bya ste //
NK085(ru)004:2329: lus kyis ma spyad chung ba ste //
NK085(ru)004:2330: zin kyang ma shes 'bring du bshad //
NK085(ru)004:2331: zin kyang ma bshags chen po yin //
NK085(ru)004:2332: ngag gis sbyor ba'i rnam pa yang //
NK085(ru)004:2333: ma rtags 'khrul na chung ba ste //
NK085(ru)004:2334: brtags byed nyes pa 'bring du bshad //
NK085(ru)004:2336: rnal 'byor sems kyi mtshan nyid ni //
NK085(ru)004:2337: shin tu lci ba'i rim pa yin //
NK085(ru)004:2338: sems kyi las gsum brtag par bya //
NK085(ru)004:2339: zhes pas lus dang ngag dang yid kyi dbye ba dang gsum po la /
NK085(ru)004:2340: sbyor ba dngos gzhi rjes rdzogs ma rdzogs las dbye ba du mar 'gyur ro //
NK085(ru)004:2341: de bzhin du dbang gis dbye bas kyang lci yang du gsungs te /
NK085(ru)004:2342: bum pa gsang ba shes rab dang //
NK085(ru)004:2343: bzhi pa'i rim pa shes par bya //
NK085(ru)004:2344: zhes rgyud las byung zhing rgyud thos pa dang man
NK085(ru)004:2345: ngag kyang rim pa de nyid du 'gyur bas mang
NK085(ru)004:2346: du 'gyur ro // de na lci yang gi dbye ba brjod de /
NK085(ru)004:2350: nyes byas dang nyes med snang ba de lnga'o //
NK085(ru)004:2351: dang po gnyis kyi dbye ba dang bcas te de'i mtshan nyid brjod pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:2353: gsum gcig la ldan pa sbyor ba bdun dang ldan nas ltung ba ste /
NK085(ru)004:2354: nyon mongs pas kun nas bslangs pa'i bsam pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:2355: de la der shes pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:2356: lus ngag gi sbyor ba ma bsdoms pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:2358: shes shing 'gyod pa med pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:2359: de la yid rangs pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:2361: de ltar bdun pos dngos kyi 'tsho ba dang bral
NK085(ru)004:2362: nas dus 'das shing ma bshags pa ni pham pa
NK085(ru)004:2364: 'og nas byung ba'i bshags pa ma byas na ltung ba'o //
NK085(ru)004:2365: 'tsho ba ma bral ba'i bsam sbyor dang po gsum dang ldan na sbom po'o //
NK085(ru)004:2366: yan lag gzhan drug med pa'i lus sems ngag gis sbyor ba brtsam pa ni nyes byas so //
NK085(ru)004:2369: mthun par pham pa bshad ce na /
NK085(ru)004:2370: log sred can tshul ma yin pa la zhugs nas mi bshags pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:2371: phyi rol chos la zhugs nas rgyab kyis phyogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)004:2372: de ni nges par rdo rje dmyal bar myong ba yin no //
NK085(ru)004:2374: de'i nges pa yang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du ma nas /
NK085(ru)004:2375: slob dpon smad par mi bya ste //
NK085(ru)004:2377: sangs rgyas tshul mtshungs bla ma yi //
NK085(ru)004:2378: slob dpon la ni gang smad pa //
NK085(ru)004:2379: des na sangs rgyas kun smad pas //
NK085(ru)004:2380: rtag tu sdug bsngal thob 'gyur te //
NK085(ru)004:2381: rims dang dug dang dbyig dug dang //
NK085(ru)004:2383: gdon dang log 'dren gtum po yis //
NK085(ru)004:2384: bsad nas sems can dmyal bar lhung //
NK085(ru)004:2385: de bas nan tan thams cad kyis //
NK085(ru)004:2386: rdo rje slob dpon blo gros che //
NK085(ru)004:2387: dge ba rab tu mi skyol bas //
NK085(ru)004:2388: bla ma la ni gus bcas yona //
NK085(ru)004:2389: rjes mthun khyod kyis sbyin par bya //
NK085(ru)004:2392: chos la sdang ba nyid log sred can gyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir /
NK085(ru)004:2393: log sred can gtan nas mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i las can zhes gsungs pa yin no //
NK085(ru)004:2394: bla ma'i yon tan bzung ba'i rgyud las /
NK085(ru)004:2395: bla ma la khros skad cig grangs //
NK085(ru)004:2396: bskal par bsags pa'i dge bcom nas //
NK085(ru)004:2397: de snyed bskal par dmyal sogs kyi //
NK085(ru)004:2398: sdug bsngal tshor ba drag por bskyed //
NK085(ru)004:2399: ces 'byung bas pham pa dang 'dra bar bzhag pa yin no //
NK085(ru)004:2400: gnyis pa rdo rje dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshad ni /
NK085(ru)004:2401: dmyal ba phala pa bco brgyad po de dag thamsa cad kyi sdug bsngal gcig tu bsdoms pas ni /
NK085(ru)004:2402: rdo rje dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de yi 'bum gyis
NK085(ru)004:2403: char yang mi phod de mi nus pa yin no
NK085(ru)004:2404: // gsum pa sngar sangs rgyas pa'i bstan pa la
NK085(ru)004:2405: nyams pa'i dbang gis thugs rjes phan par mi 'gyur
NK085(ru)004:2406: // ba ni / de la bskal bzang gi sangs rgyas stong gi 'od zer dang /
NK085(ru)004:2407: sa dang lam la gnas pa'i byang chub semsa dpas /
NK085(ru)004:2408: kho'i sdug bsngal bsal thabs kyi phrin las ni /
NK085(ru)004:2409: dus rgyun du mdzad kyang kho la phan thogs par
NK085(ru)004:2410: mi 'gyur te sngar sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la
NK085(ru)004:2411: log pa'i phyir don ci mdzad gnod pa ltar du
NK085(ru)004:2412: snang ngo // bzhi pa rdo rje dmyal bar gnas pa'i yun ni /
NK085(ru)004:2413: bskal pa ther 'bum la sogs grangs med du nyams
NK085(ru)004:2414: pa can de nyid sdug bsngal las thon te thar
NK085(ru)004:2416: de'ang dmyal ba'i 'jig rten de zhig nas 'jig rten gzhan gyi dmyal ba'i nang du 'pho ste /
NK085(ru)004:2417: 'pho ba'i skabs 'dir yang bde ba mi 'byung ste
NK085(ru)004:2418: yun se gol gdab pa tsam gcig gis phyin par
NK085(ru)004:2419: 'gyur ro // yang na rdo rje dmyal ba'i tshe tshad ni /
NK085(ru)004:2420: chos rje'i dam tshig rgya mtsho las /
NK085(ru)004:2421: gang dam tshig nyams pa can de rdo rje dmyal bar 'gro zhes bya ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:2422: byang chub sems dpa'i 'grel par rdo rje dmyal ba
NK085(ru)004:2423: ni 'og rlung gi dkyil 'khor nam mkha'i rlung rdo
NK085(ru)004:2424: rje'i rang bzhin gyis char gnas par bshad /
NK085(ru)004:2425: de la 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba las /
NK085(ru)004:2426: dbang bskur rdzogs thob slob dpon la //
NK085(ru)004:2427: rmongs par gyur pa'i slob ma yis //
NK085(ru)004:2428: sbyor ba dngos kyi rab rdzogs pas //
NK085(ru)004:2429: rtsa ba yan lag nyams gyur na //
NK085(ru)004:2430: blo ldan slob mas bshags par bya //
NK085(ru)004:2431: gal te ma bshags dus 'dus na //
NK085(ru)004:2432: phyi yi rgya mtsho chen po yi //
NK085(ru)004:2433: chu de skra yis gtor nus pa //
NK085(ru)004:2434: de yi tshad ni sdug bsngal myong //
NK085(ru)004:2435: rdo rje dmyal bar grags pa yin //
NK085(ru)004:2437: lnga pa de ltar nyen che bas bsrung ba la
NK085(ru)004:2438: nan tan khyad par du gdams pa ni dam tshig
NK085(ru)004:2439: nyams ni nyes pa che bas de bas bsrung bya
NK085(ru)004:2440: rnams la shin tu nan tan gyis la bsrung bar
NK085(ru)004:2441: bya'o // gnyis pa la yan lag gi dam tshig
NK085(ru)004:2442: nyams pa'i skyon la gnyis kyi dang po mdor bstan
NK085(ru)004:2443: bya'o // ni / thun mong dang thun mong ma
NK085(ru)004:2444: yin pa'i yan lag gi dam tshig nyams par gyur
NK085(ru)004:2445: bya'o // ni / na skyon ni / gnyis pa
NK085(ru)004:2446: rgyas bshad la gsum gyi dang po spyod pa ma
NK085(ru)004:2447: byas pa'i skyon ni thun mong gi yan lag nyams
NK085(ru)004:2448: su ma blangs na zas nor longsa spyod rnams mang
NK085(ru)004:2449: du 'phel ba med de kun gyis mi bkur zhing
NK085(ru)004:2450: bya'o // ni / na skyon ni / dbul ba
NK085(ru)004:2451: dang / khyad par gyi yan lag gi dam tshig
NK085(ru)004:2452: ma bsrungs pas theg pa chen po gsang sngags yin
NK085(ru)004:2453: par 'dod nas de la kun gyis dpya blos 'dogs
NK085(ru)004:2454: bya'o // ni / na skyon ni / dbul ba
NK085(ru)004:2455: dang / shing / rang don du dwang blang mi
NK085(ru)004:2456: spang shes bsgrub rnams yal bar dor bas thun mong
NK085(ru)004:2457: dang mchog gi dngos grub rnams ched du bsgrub kyang
NK085(ru)004:2459: grub thag shin tu yun ring bar 'gyur ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:2460: gzhan don du spyod pa lnga dor bas gdul bya'i
NK085(ru)004:2461: don byed lugs rang rang gi skabs rnams su bshad
NK085(ru)004:2462: pa bzhin mi 'grub pas yal bar gyur cing /
NK085(ru)004:2463: gnyis pa lta spyod mi 'tshams pa'i skyon ni /
NK085(ru)004:2464: lta ba bden pa dbyer med ma rtogs shing spyod
NK085(ru)004:2465: pa sbyor sgrol la sogs pa byas kyang ya char
NK085(ru)004:2466: gyur pa de nyid ngan song du 'gro la /
NK085(ru)004:2467: spyod pa theg pa phyi pa'i spyod pa gnas nas rtsal spug ma nus /
NK085(ru)004:2468: lta ba nang pa'i lta ba rtogs shing lta spyod ma 'dres pa'i skyon gyis /
NK085(ru)004:2469: gsang sngags gang gis bka' yi byin brlabs kyi dngos
NK085(ru)004:2470: grub rnams tshe 'dir 'grub par dka' ste bskal pa
NK085(ru)004:2472: gsum pa spyi nyams pa'i skyon ni /
NK085(ru)004:2473: spyir yan lag gi dam tshig nyams pas srung pa'i
NK085(ru)004:2474: lha chos skyong rnams gsal cing mi bsrung ba dang
NK085(ru)004:2475: / khyad par gyi yan lag nyams pas zab mo'i
NK085(ru)004:2476: chos nyid mnyam pa nyid la ring bar 'gyur zhing
NK085(ru)004:2477: / / sbyor sgrol la sogs rang khar spyad na
NK085(ru)004:2478: bskal par ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal myong la
NK085(ru)004:2479: / / / yan lag gi dam tshig ma bsrungs
NK085(ru)004:2480: pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni spyod pa'i rlan med pas
NK085(ru)004:2481: dngos skam nyid du 'gyur te 'bras bu mi thob
NK085(ru)004:2482: / / / bo // spyi don bdun pa ma
NK085(ru)004:2483: nyams pa'i yon tan la gsum gyi dang po mdor
NK085(ru)004:2485: rang bzhin ma bcos pa'i rnal ma la rang rig
NK085(ru)004:2486: pa'i blo 'byor pa'i skyes bu 'og ma las dpags
NK085(ru)004:2488: gnyis pa rgyas bshad la gnyis kyi dang po rtsa ba'i yon tan /
NK085(ru)004:2489: de la gsum gyi dang po byang chub sems dang sku'i yon tan thun mong du bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:2490: byang sems dang sku'i dam tshig ma nyamsa par gzhung nas bshad pa bzhin bsrung thub na /
NK085(ru)004:2491: lus la nad nyung la kun gyi yid la 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldan zhing /
NK085(ru)004:2492: bskal par ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:2493: bskyed rdzogs kyi don la blo gnas na thun mong
NK085(ru)004:2494: gi bsrung ba'i nyes byas thams cad ma bsrungs kyang
NK085(ru)004:2496: srid pa khams gsum du dbang ba'i 'jig rten pa'i
NK085(ru)004:2497: gtso 'khor thams cad kyis rang bskur zhing sangs rgyas
NK085(ru)004:2499: byang chub sems dpa'i spun du dgongs nas byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:2500: tshe rabs skye ba thams cad du theg pa chen
NK085(ru)004:2501: po'i gzhung gi don rnams la dbang thobs cing de'i
NK085(ru)004:2503: gnyis pa gsung gi yon tan ni /
NK085(ru)004:2504: gsung gi dam tshig ma nyams pa'i yon tan ni
NK085(ru)004:2505: ye shes kyi lha mnyes pas bar chad bral bas
NK085(ru)004:2506: rang gi rigs rgyud 'phel zhing sngags phyag rgya sgom
NK085(ru)004:2507: bzlas byed pa rang nus mthu dang ldan pa de'i
NK085(ru)004:2508: byin rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa byung nas gzhan
NK085(ru)004:2509: don gyi 'phrin las rnam pa bzhi gang yang bsgrub
NK085(ru)004:2510: pa'i dus su thogs pa med par 'grub par 'gyur
NK085(ru)004:2511: ba dang / mdor bsdu na ci bsam pa thamsa cad 'bad med du 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
NK085(ru)004:2512: gzhan yang dam tshig mthar phyin pa'i rgya rtags rnam pa bzhi ste /
NK085(ru)004:2513: mang pos bskur zhing grags pa thob pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:2515: dam can 'du zhing mthu rtsal che ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:2516: mngon shes 'byung zhing rig pa 'char ba rnams rdzogs pa'o //
NK085(ru)004:2517: gsum pa thugs kyi yon tan ni /
NK085(ru)004:2518: thugs kyi dam tshig ma nyams pa'i yon tan ni
NK085(ru)004:2519: chos kyi phyogs la mi 'dod nas skyo ba dang
NK085(ru)004:2520: ngal zhing dub pa med pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:2521: gsang thub pas bskyed rdzogs gnyis kyi man ngag gi
NK085(ru)004:2522: snod du gyur cing mchog thun mong gi dngos grub
NK085(ru)004:2523: thob pa la bar chad med cing myur bas nye
NK085(ru)004:2524: ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa zab mo
NK085(ru)004:2525: rtogs dka' ba'i don mnyam pa nyid la mkhas pa'i
NK085(ru)004:2526: gding ldan du gyur pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:2527: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha rnams kun gyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
NK085(ru)004:2529: thugs dam bsrungs pa'i yon tan ni /
NK085(ru)004:2530: don mthun skyo dub med pa dang //
NK085(ru)004:2531: man ngag snod gyur la sogs pa //
NK085(ru)004:2532: kun bzang nga dang mnyam par 'gyur //
NK085(ru)004:2534: gnyis pa yan lag gi dam tshig ni /
NK085(ru)004:2535: yan lag gi dam tshig ma nyams par bsrungs na
NK085(ru)004:2536: yon tan gong gi ma bsrungs pa'i skyon las bzlog
NK085(ru)004:2537: pa de nyid yon tan yin te /
NK085(ru)004:2539: khyad par gyi spyod pa byas pas theg pa chen
NK085(ru)004:2540: por 'gyur zhing mchog thun mong gi dngos grub 'grub
NK085(ru)004:2541: pa la nye / gdul bya'i don du 'gyur /
NK085(ru)004:2542: lta spyod 'tshams pas bka'i byin rlabs 'grub /
NK085(ru)004:2543: srung ba'i lha mi yal zab mo'i chos nyid nyams su len /
NK085(ru)004:2544: bskal par ngan song du mi 'gro /
NK085(ru)004:2545: rnal 'byor pa'i spyod pa'i rlan gyis zin pas sa lam gyi yon tan 'phel lo //
NK085(ru)004:2546: gzhan yang spyad pa lngas mnyam pa nyid kyi don
NK085(ru)004:2547: re dogs dang bral ba mngon du byas pas lha'i
NK085(ru)004:2548: bu'i bdud / mi spang ba lngas nyon mongs ye shes su shar bas nyon mongs pa'i bdud /
NK085(ru)004:2549: dang blang lngas gtsang sme gnyis 'dzin skye 'chi dang
NK085(ru)004:2550: bral ba'i don mngon du byas pas 'chi bdag gi
NK085(ru)004:2551: / shes byas lngas phung po khams skye mched sku
NK085(ru)004:2552: dang ye shes su shar bas phung po'i bduda dang
NK085(ru)004:2553: bzhi 'jomsa shing bsgrub bya lnga ni shes bya'i don
NK085(ru)004:2554: / nyid bsgom pa'o // de ltar ngan song gsum
NK085(ru)004:2555: gyi rgyu nyon mongs pa rang ye shes su shar
NK085(ru)004:2556: bas sbyangsa te mi myong ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:2557: theg chen gyi lta spyod ya ma bral ba'i gzhung bsrangs nas nyams su lon pa'i byin rlabs las /
NK085(ru)004:2558: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha rnams
NK085(ru)004:2559: bdag la 'go zhing bsam pa thams cad 'grub pa
NK085(ru)004:2560: dang / mthar thug bdag gzhan gyi don gnyis yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
NK085(ru)004:2561: gsum pa theg gsum gyi sdom pa thams cad 'dir yar ldan gyi tshul du rdzogs pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:2562: theg chen gsang sngags bla med kyi dam tshig rtsa
NK085(ru)004:2563: ba dang yan lag gi bsrung bya la gnas pa
NK085(ru)004:2565: theg pa 'og ma'i bsrung bya nyan thos 'dul ba'i tshul khrims kyis nyon mongs pa spang ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:2566: byang sems kyi sdom pas sbyang ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:2567: sngags phyi rgyud kyi dam tshig gis bsgyur ba dang
NK085(ru)004:2568: gsum po de dag ched du bsrung ba med par
NK085(ru)004:2569: bla med kyis nyon mongs pa rang ye shes su
NK085(ru)004:2570: shar bas 'og ma'i bsrung bya yar ldan gyi tshul
NK085(ru)004:2572: dper na shing gi phung po la yal ga rang
NK085(ru)004:2573: shugs kyis rdzogs pa bzhin du tshul khrims rdzogs pas
NK085(ru)004:2575: sems bskyed kyi sdom pa rdzogs pas byang chub semsa dpa' yin pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:2576: sngags phyi rgyud kyi dam tshig rdzogs pas rnal 'byor yin pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:2577: bla med kyi bsrung bya ma lus pa rdzogs pas rnal 'byor chen po yin no //
NK085(ru)004:2578: spyi don brgyad pa nyams na bskang ba'i thabs la gsum gyi dang po nyer bstan ni /
NK085(ru)004:2579: skyes bu yang rabs pa rnams kyis dam tshig nyams kyang de'i sar mi 'jog ste /
NK085(ru)004:2580: skong ba'i thabs yod pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:2582: 'di dag dam tshig nyams gyur na //
NK085(ru)004:2583: slar gso ba yi thabs ci mnga' //gsos nas skong bar mi 'gyur ram //
NK085(ru)004:2584: bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol //
NK085(ru)004:2585: de skad ces gsol ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:2586: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
NK085(ru)004:2587: 'di dag gso ba'i thabs ni mang ste /
NK085(ru)004:2589: shi shing nyams kyang gso ba'i thabs manga'o //
NK085(ru)004:2591: gong gi rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig
NK085(ru)004:2592: de rnams nyams na slar bskang ba'i thabsa rnams rgyas
NK085(ru)004:2593: par bshad cing gsal bar bstan pa ni 'di lta
NK085(ru)004:2594: ste / rgyas bshad la gnyis te /
NK085(ru)004:2595: dang po rtsa ba nyams pa'i bskang thabs /
NK085(ru)004:2596: de la bzhi'i thog mar byang chub sems kyi bskang thabs ni /
NK085(ru)004:2597: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i byang chub kyi semsa
NK085(ru)004:2598: bskyed rdzogs kyi don la mi mos shing nyams su
NK085(ru)004:2599: blang bas dam nyamsa pa dang don ma rtogs na'ang
NK085(ru)004:2600: nyams pas na / de bskang ba'i thabs ni bla ma rgyud gzhung man ngag la mkhas pa la /
NK085(ru)004:2601: dang po zas nor longs spyod kyis mnyes par byas la /
NK085(ru)004:2602: bskyed rdzogs kyi dgongs don ngo sprad rnams rang gi
NK085(ru)004:2603: nyer len gyi shes rab kyis blangsa te rtogs pa
NK085(ru)004:2604: de nyid la blo gnas par bya ba ma gtogs
NK085(ru)004:2605: pa thabs gzhan gyis mi skong ste /
NK085(ru)004:2607: sems dpa' chen po chos nyid dngos po rang bzhin med par shes na /
NK085(ru)004:2610: 'dzin pa dang chags pa med pa'o //
NK085(ru)004:2611: de bas kyang chos thams cad gnyis su med cing mnyam pa nyid du shes na /
NK085(ru)004:2612: dam la nyams pa'i dus med do //
NK085(ru)004:2614: rnam rtog gi phyogs kyi ming yang med pas nyam pa'i dus med do //
NK085(ru)004:2616: gnyis pa sku'i bskang thabs la lnga'i dang po bskang thabs dngos ni /
NK085(ru)004:2617: sa ma ya bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)004:2618: sku la bsdos dang thugs thub spyad /
NK085(ru)004:2619: ma rig ka ma li la brlabs //
NK085(ru)004:2620: lan du brjod dang log par smras //
NK085(ru)004:2621: sku la smad cing thugs la bsdos //
NK085(ru)004:2622: bka' rku lung med yongs su bslad //
NK085(ru)004:2623: ces slob dpon dang grogs la 'thabs rtsod skyes pa la gcig lan gcig gis byed pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:2624: bel sbrel g.yang du ltung ba bzhin /
NK085(ru)004:2625: gnyis ka dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro //
NK085(ru)004:2626: gang gis bsring ba de rgyal bas //
NK085(ru)004:2627: gnyis ka bsring na rgyal bar nges //
NK085(ru)004:2628: rtsod pa rgyal yang pham par 'gyur //
NK085(ru)004:2629: zhes de ltar du byas nas sku yi dam tshig nyamsa par gyur na bskang ba'i thabs ni /
NK085(ru)004:2630: slob dpon dang grogs po gang la chags nyams byas pa'i drung der song la /
NK085(ru)004:2631: zas nor rang gis 'byor ba tsam zhig phul ba'am /
NK085(ru)004:2632: bshags bya yul mnyes pa zhig phul nas /
NK085(ru)004:2633: shin tu 'gyod pa'i sems kyis gang nyes pa byas
NK085(ru)004:2634: pa de tshiga tu brjod la bshagsa par byas la
NK085(ru)004:2635: / de phyin chad dam las mi 'da' bas legsa par bca' ba'o //
NK085(ru)004:2636: de yang dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)004:2637: rnam par dag pa'i bsam pas mthol //
NK085(ru)004:2638: don gyis mi gnas tshig 'dis bshags //
NK085(ru)004:2639: rang bzhin med pas bzod par gsol //
NK085(ru)004:2641: gnyis pa yul de med na de'i slob dpon la bskang ba'i thabs ni /
NK085(ru)004:2642: gal te bshags yul slob dpon dang grogs po gang
NK085(ru)004:2643: yin de grongsa te 'das sam yul mi gcig pas
NK085(ru)004:2644: sa lam la bar chad mang nas bgrod thabs med
NK085(ru)004:2646: gang nyams pa de yi slob dpon bzhugs pa la bshags pa byed pa de'i tshe /
NK085(ru)004:2647: tshul gongsa ma bzhin du bshagsa te zas nor 'byor
NK085(ru)004:2648: pa mnyes par phul nas nyes pa gang byas tshig
NK085(ru)004:2650: phyin chad mi byed pa dam baca'o //
NK085(ru)004:2651: de yang dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)004:2652: de ltar bshags pa byed na yang //
NK085(ru)004:2653: slob dpon la sogs mched rnams kyis //
NK085(ru)004:2654: gang zhig nongs pa dran pa dang //
NK085(ru)004:2655: rjes su 'gyod pa skyes nas su //
NK085(ru)004:2656: slan chad sdom par 'tshal ba dang //
NK085(ru)004:2657: tshangs pa phral du sel bar bya //
NK085(ru)004:2659: gsum pa de yang med na mnyam pa brgya la mchod sbyin gyi sgo nas bskang ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:2660: de'i slob dpon grongs 'das su gyur nas med na
NK085(ru)004:2661: gang la nyams pa de dang dgongs pa mnyam pa
NK085(ru)004:2663: de yang dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)004:2664: de yi slob dpon mi bzhugs na //
NK085(ru)004:2665: de dang mnyam pa brgya rnams la //
NK085(ru)004:2666: de tshe gong ma bzhin du bshags //
NK085(ru)004:2668: bzhi pa de yang ma rnyed na mnyam pa gsum la sbyin sreg gis bskang ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:2669: brgya po de yang rnyed par ma gyur na /
NK085(ru)004:2670: gang la nyams pa de dang lta spyod bsgom gsum
NK085(ru)004:2671: gyi dgongs pa mnyam pa rdo rje rgyal po rgyal
NK085(ru)004:2672: thebs / las mkhan gsum bkug la /
NK085(ru)004:2673: zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi me thabs rab tu brtsigsa nasa /
NK085(ru)004:2674: dang po rtsa dkyil la mchod bstod bsnyen pa tshogs mchod yan chad tshar nas /
NK085(ru)004:2675: de nas thabs bsang ba la sogs mchod pa byin gyis brlabs par byas nas /
NK085(ru)004:2677: sbyin lha de'i lto ba'i nang du sreg lha gang
NK085(ru)004:2678: la nyams pa de dang yid kyis dkyil 'khor gyi
NK085(ru)004:2679: lha dang dbyer med du bskyed la zas nor 'byor
NK085(ru)004:2680: ba thams cad sta gon du rdzogs par byas la
NK085(ru)004:2682: de yang sngon du ye shes pa spyan drangs la gnyis su med par bstim zhing /
NK085(ru)004:2683: spyi mchod tshar nas zhi ba'i mchod rdzas phul ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:2684: lha gang yin pa'i sngags rting dang kho rang gi
NK085(ru)004:2685: gsang mtshan la sogsa ming btags la de dang dam
NK085(ru)004:2686: tshig nyams pa rnams shin+tim ku ru y+ae s+w+aa h+aa
NK085(ru)004:2687: / zhes brjod la dkyil 'khor lha tshogs rnams la
NK085(ru)004:2688: rim bzhin bsreg rdzas kyi mchod pa 'bul la bstod
NK085(ru)004:2689: pa la sogs rgyas par rgyud nas gsungs pa bzhin
NK085(ru)004:2690: lag len la bdun nam nyer gcig /yang na chags
NK085(ru)004:2691: nyams skong ba'i rtags ma byung bar du bya'o //
NK085(ru)004:2692: rtags thon pa dang gong du smos pa'i spyod pa rnams /
NK085(ru)004:2693: bshags pa'i dpang po'i slob dpon gsum la 'bul bar bya'o //
NK085(ru)004:2694: de yang dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)004:2695: de yang rnyed par ma gyur na /
NK085(ru)004:2696: sbyin sreg me thab rab brtsegs nas //
NK085(ru)004:2697: de dang mnyam pa gsum bkug la //
NK085(ru)004:2698: mchod rdzas sna tshogs bsham par bya //
NK085(ru)004:2699: gsum po de yang dpang po bzhag /bla ma la sogs mched rnams kyis //
NK085(ru)004:2700: gsang mtshan la sogs spyan drangs te //
NK085(ru)004:2701: sbyin sreg mchod pa gzhung bzhin bya //
NK085(ru)004:2702: dkyil 'khor lha la tshul bzhin bya //
NK085(ru)004:2703: gzhung la gshegs pa'i cho ga gdags //
NK085(ru)004:2704: de tshe zin pa gyur pa'i tshe //
NK085(ru)004:2705: gong du smos pa'i yon rnams kyang //
NK085(ru)004:2706: dpang po gsum la 'bul bar bya //
NK085(ru)004:2707: des kyang yongs su bshad pa btang //
NK085(ru)004:2708: de bzhin lan grangs bdun du bya //
NK085(ru)004:2709: de ltar byas na bskang bar 'gyur //
NK085(ru)004:2710: mched la sogs pa de bzhin no //
NK085(ru)004:2712: chos rje'i dam tshig rgya mtsho las /
NK085(ru)004:2713: nyams pa bshags pa'i thabs ni /
NK085(ru)004:2715: rdo rje 'dzin pa rab tu nyon //
NK085(ru)004:2716: bskang ba'i cho ga bshad par bya //
NK085(ru)004:2717: gcig la slob dpon gsum rdzogs la //
NK085(ru)004:2718: sbyor ba bdun dang ldan pa yi //
NK085(ru)004:2719: rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung gyur na //
NK085(ru)004:2720: sdug bsngal bskyed pa'i rtsa ba yin //
NK085(ru)004:2721: rang gi bsam pa rdzogs byas kyang //
NK085(ru)004:2722: slob dpon gnang bar ma gyur na //
NK085(ru)004:2723: dang po sdug bsngal dka' spyod de //
NK085(ru)004:2724: de nas bdog pa thams cad phul //
NK085(ru)004:2725: rjes su gnang ba bsgrub par 'gyur //
NK085(ru)004:2726: dbang bskur cho ga lan bdun bya //
NK085(ru)004:2727: chos kyi 'khor lo nyi shu gcig /sbyin sreg gis ni 'bum phrag bdun //
NK085(ru)004:2728: gsang sngags bye ba lnga yis so //
NK085(ru)004:2729: lnga pa zhar la bshags yul rang gis kyang bshags pa mi blang na ltung bar bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:2730: gal te bshags yul gang yin pa de la /
NK085(ru)004:2731: nyams pa can des lus ngag yid gsum gus pa'i
NK085(ru)004:2732: sgo nas bshags kyang mi len na nyes pa shin
NK085(ru)004:2733: tu che ste / gnyis ka rdo rje dmyal bar
NK085(ru)004:2734: ltung bas de bas bshags yul bshags mkhan gnyis kas
NK085(ru)004:2735: bskul te myur du nyes pa dag pas tshangs par
NK085(ru)004:2736: tu che ste / sel bar bya'o // de yang dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)004:2737: de las tshangs par ma sel na //
NK085(ru)004:2738: gnyis ka rdo rje dmyal bar skye //
NK085(ru)004:2739: de la sdug bsngal bzod blag med //
NK085(ru)004:2740: de bas tshangs par sel bar bya //
NK085(ru)004:2742: de ltar nyes pa dag par gyur kyang /
NK085(ru)004:2743: da phyin chad mi stong zer ba ni ma yin no //
NK085(ru)004:2744: de ltar tshang pa thon nas kyang //
NK085(ru)004:2745: bshags par 'dod pa gang yin pa'i //
NK085(ru)004:2746: zhabs ni spyi bos blang bar bya //
NK085(ru)004:2747: slan chad mi gnyis gcig par bya //
NK085(ru)004:2749: gsum pa gsung gi bskang thabs ni /
NK085(ru)004:2750: gsung gi dam tshig la sngags gsum phyag rgya bzhi
NK085(ru)004:2751: sgom bzlas ma byas nas nyams par gyur na bskang
NK085(ru)004:2752: thabs ni / rang gi lus ngag yid kyi sgo gsum ni /
NK085(ru)004:2757: tshig tsam ma yin par nges par lta bas shes shing sgom pas blo 'byor na /
NK085(ru)004:2758: phyag rgya nyams pa de dag skong bar 'gyur ro //
NK085(ru)004:2760: lus kyi bsgul bskyod ni phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin yin la /
NK085(ru)004:2761: ngag gi bzlas brjod ni bzlas par byed pa'i snying po yin la /
NK085(ru)004:2762: sems kyi dran rtog thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin yin no //
NK085(ru)004:2764: sngags gsum nyams pa bskang ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:2765: bzlas pa sangs rgyas 'grub pa tsam la gnyis brgya
NK085(ru)004:2766: bzlas pa lta bu log po gcig bldab pa tsam
NK085(ru)004:2767: gyis nyams pa bsal ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:2768: gzhan yang yang phur sman gsum gyi bsgrub pa chen
NK085(ru)004:2769: po gsum gyis sngags phyag rgya nyams pa thams cad
NK085(ru)004:2770: bskangsa so // bzhi pa thugs kyi bskang thabs ni /
NK085(ru)004:2771: thugsa kyi dam tshig gsang ba bcu la nyams par gyura na bskang thabs ni /
NK085(ru)004:2772: lta bas 'gro drug gi sems can ji ltar snang
NK085(ru)004:2773: dus sems nyid rang snang du gsal zhing rtogsa na
NK085(ru)004:2774: / bdag nyid kyi bdag nyid la gsung ba med
NK085(ru)004:2775: cing de lta bu snang sems tha dad du mi
NK085(ru)004:2776: rtog cing dbyer med du rtogs pa'i don la 'da'
NK085(ru)004:2777: nyams med pas ting nge 'dzin gyi klong du zhugs
NK085(ru)004:2778: te bsgoms pas ma yengs par blo la goms shing
NK085(ru)004:2781: nam mkha' la yangs dogs med pa bzhin /
NK085(ru)004:2782: blo chos nyid du gyur pa la /
NK085(ru)004:2783: 'jig rten gyi bag chags spangs pas gang zhig brjod na yang /
NK085(ru)004:2784: snod dang mi ldan pa med par shes par byas la /
NK085(ru)004:2785: bsrung du med pa'i ngo bo'i rang bzhin gyi rnal
NK085(ru)004:2786: 'byor pas chos nyid tshig dang yi ge las 'das
NK085(ru)004:2788: sems dpa' chen po 'di lta bu'i man ngag nos la /
NK085(ru)004:2789: khong du chud par gyis shig /thugs kyi dam tshig skong ba'o //
NK085(ru)004:2790: 'di lta bu la yengs pa med par gyis shig /thugs kyi dam tshig mi nyams pa'o //
NK085(ru)004:2791: 'di'i don la 'gyur ba med par gyis shig /thugs kyi dam tshig mi 'ada'o //
NK085(ru)004:2793: gnyis pa yan lag gi bskang thabs ni /
NK085(ru)004:2794: thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i yan lag
NK085(ru)004:2795: gi dam tshig nyamsa par gyur na bskang ba'i thabs
NK085(ru)004:2796: ni / rtsa ba bskang ba la yan lag shugs kyis tshang yang /
NK085(ru)004:2797: khyad par du spyad pa lnga la sogs pa'i gang
NK085(ru)004:2798: nyams pa de yi don nyams su blangs nas sor
NK085(ru)004:2799: chud la / tshogsa kyi 'khor lo chen po brgya rtsa brgyad kyis nyams pa bskangs so //
NK085(ru)004:2800: gsum pa bskangs pa'i yon tan gyi ngos nas zhabs bsdu ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:2801: rtsa ba yan lag gi dam tshig nyams pa'i bskang
NK085(ru)004:2802: thabs gong du bshad pa de ltar du nyamsa su
NK085(ru)004:2804: yon tan ni snga rtags tshe 'di la sdug bsngal rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /
NK085(ru)004:2805: des ni phyi ma la smin pa'i 'bras bu ngan song gtan nas med do //
NK085(ru)004:2806: spyi don dgu pa mtshon pa dpe la gnyis kyi dang po nyer bstan ni /
NK085(ru)004:2807: bla med ma h+aa'i bsrung bya rnams la mi 'da'
NK085(ru)004:2808: bas dam tshig yo ga man chad la dpags pas
NK085(ru)004:2809: chen po de'i legs nyes che ba'i dpe bstan pa
NK085(ru)004:2811: gnyis pa rgyas bshad la bcu gcig gi dang po
NK085(ru)004:2812: yon tan thams cad gyi gzhi dam tshig gis bzung
NK085(ru)004:2813: ba'i dpe ni / dper na sa gzhi la skyes
NK085(ru)004:2814: 'gro rtsi shing la sogs pa kun de la brten
NK085(ru)004:2815: nas 'byung ba lta bu'i dam tshig gi rang bzhin
NK085(ru)004:2816: kyang de dang 'dra bas lam lnga dang /
NK085(ru)004:2817: de las byung ba'i 'bras bu'i chos rnams kun gyi yon tan ni /
NK085(ru)004:2818: dam tshig 'di med par log shig nas mi 'gyur ro //
NK085(ru)004:2819: gnyis pa bsrung thub ma thub kyi legs nyes che ba'i dpe ni /
NK085(ru)004:2820: dper na dgra dang rang gi sa mtshams na rdzong
NK085(ru)004:2821: mkhar btsan po zhig yod na rang phyogs kyis thob
NK085(ru)004:2823: dgra la shor na nyen che bas dam tshig gi rang bzhin kyang de dang 'dra la /
NK085(ru)004:2824: dam tshig 'di nyid bsrung ba thub dang mi thub
NK085(ru)004:2825: pa las bsrungs na legsa pa'i yon tan tshe 'di
NK085(ru)004:2826: nyid la 'bras bu sangs rgyas thob la /
NK085(ru)004:2827: ma bsrungs na nyes pa'i stobsa chen po rdo rje dmyal ba la 'gro bar byed pa'o //
NK085(ru)004:2828: gsum pa bsrungs ba'i yon tan mchog thun mong gi dngos grub 'byung ba'i dpe ni /
NK085(ru)004:2829: dper na nor bu rin po che la gsol ba
NK085(ru)004:2830: btab na dgos 'dod 'byung ba lta bu'i dam tshig
NK085(ru)004:2831: gi rang bzhin kyang de dang 'dra bas /
NK085(ru)004:2832: dam tshig tshul bzhin du bsrungs na mchog dang thun
NK085(ru)004:2833: mong gi dngos grub kyi dgos 'doda thamsa cad 'byung
NK085(ru)004:2834: ngo // bzhi pa chos nyid dam tshig tu 'dus pa'i dpe ni /
NK085(ru)004:2835: dper na nam mkha' rang gi nang du 'byung bzhi
NK085(ru)004:2836: kun shong ba lta bu'i dam tshig gi rang bzhin
NK085(ru)004:2837: kyang de dang 'dra bas chos nyid mnyam pa'i dam
NK085(ru)004:2838: tshig 'di rang gi rgyud thog la 'da' nyams med
NK085(ru)004:2839: par yod na myang 'das kyi chos thams cad 'dir
NK085(ru)004:2841: lnga pa bsrungs na 'khor ba mngon du gyur pa'i sdug bsngal gyi 'ching ba gcod pa'i dpe ni /
NK085(ru)004:2842: dper na rno ngal dbal dang ldan pa'i mtshon gyis
NK085(ru)004:2843: dngos po gang gcod pas dam tshig gi rang bzhin
NK085(ru)004:2845: dam tshig bsrung bas nyon mongs 'khor ba gzung 'dzin
NK085(ru)004:2846: gyis 'brel ba'i d+r+wa ba ma lus pa gcod do
NK085(ru)004:2847: // drug pa dus gsum gyi rgyal ba yang dam tshig 'dis bskyed pa'i dpe ni /
NK085(ru)004:2848: dper na pha mas bu tsha bskyed pa lta bu'i
NK085(ru)004:2849: dam tshig gi rang bzhin kyang de dang 'dra bas
NK085(ru)004:2850: / 'das ma 'ongs da lta dus gsum gyi sangs
