NK085(ru)004:2851: rgyas mtha' gnyis dang bdud bzhi las rgyal ba ma
NK085(ru)004:2852: lus pa rnams kyang dam tshig 'dis bskyed cing nar
NK085(ru)004:2853: / son no // bdun pa bsrung ba'i byin rlabs la yon tan 'byung ba'i dpe ni /
NK085(ru)004:2854: dper na rgya mtsho'i rlabs las rin po che sna
NK085(ru)004:2855: tshogs 'byung ba lta bu'i dam tshig gi rang bzhin
NK085(ru)004:2856: kyang de dang 'dra bas dam tshig bsrungs pa'i byin
NK085(ru)004:2857: rlabs las gzhan don chen po 'phrin las rnam bzhis
NK085(ru)004:2858: gdul bya'i don byed pa'i dus su thogs pa med
NK085(ru)004:2860: brgyad pa khyad par du bsad cing bag med du
NK085(ru)004:2861: spyod na myang 'das kyi rgyu 'bras 'jig pa'i dpe
NK085(ru)004:2862: ni / dper na me 'di nyid btsa' shes na mthun pa'i grogs yin /
NK085(ru)004:2863: btsa' ma shes nas bag med du byas na /
NK085(ru)004:2864: me dpung du gyur nas rang dang gnas khang dang
NK085(ru)004:2865: bcas pa bsregs pa lta bu'i dam tshig gi rang
NK085(ru)004:2867: khyad par du yan lag gi dam tshig nyon mongs pa 'di thabs mkhas pa'i lta bas zin na /
NK085(ru)004:2869: rang khar bag med du spyod pa'i phyogs su gang
NK085(ru)004:2870: mchongsa pa thamsa cad kyi rgyud la myang 'das kyi
NK085(ru)004:2872: dgu pa bag yod du spyod na nyon mongs pa'i sa bon drungs 'byin pa'i dpe ni /
NK085(ru)004:2873: nyon mongs pa'i dam tshig la thabs mkhas pa'i lta
NK085(ru)004:2874: ba'i rtsi yis zin pa'i sgo nas bag yod du
NK085(ru)004:2875: spyod na 'bras bu sangs rgyas thob pa de bzhin
NK085(ru)004:2876: du / dpe na gcong nad can gyis rtsi dang /
NK085(ru)004:2877: sman byas pas nad ro drungs nas 'byin pa lta bu'i /
NK085(ru)004:2878: dam tshig gi rang bzhin kyang de dang 'dra bas /
NK085(ru)004:2879: 'khor ba'i gcong ro nyon mongs pa'i sa bon dang bcas pa ma lus pa drung nas 'byin no //
NK085(ru)004:2880: bcu pa rang dang 'tshams par bag yod du bsrungs
NK085(ru)004:2881: par byas pas thams cad chud mi za ba'i dpe
NK085(ru)004:2882: ni / dper na rgyal po khrims yod pa'i mnga'
NK085(ru)004:2883: 'og tu tshud pa'i mi sde des dang po rgyal
NK085(ru)004:2884: khrims dang mi 'gal bar byed cing thabs mkhas na
NK085(ru)004:2885: mthar blon por gyur pa lta bu'i dam tshig gi
NK085(ru)004:2886: rang bzhin kyang de dang 'dra bas /
NK085(ru)004:2887: tshogs lam dang por thun mong gi bsrung bya dang
NK085(ru)004:2888: rtsa ba'i dam tshig /phyogsa 'ga' tsam bsrung ba la
NK085(ru)004:2889: brten pa'i rim gyis khyad par gyi bsrung bya rnams
NK085(ru)004:2890: tshogs lam chen po dang sbyor lam la rdzogs pas
NK085(ru)004:2891: mthong lam zag med kyi chos nyid rtogs pas 'khor
NK085(ru)004:2893: yang na sangs rgyas thob pa'i 'tsho yang zer ro //
NK085(ru)004:2894: bcu gcig pa dang po byang chub mchog tu sems
NK085(ru)004:2895: bskyed pa nas mthar sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du
NK085(ru)004:2896: skad cig tsam yang bral mi rung ba'i dpe ni
NK085(ru)004:2897: / dper na rgya mtsho la nor bu len 'gro ba'i tshong dpon bzhin du /
NK085(ru)004:2898: thog ma tshogs lam nas bzung ste lam mthar ma
NK085(ru)004:2899: phyin gyi bar du tshong dpon gyis dang po 'gro
NK085(ru)004:2900: ba nas bzung ste mthar khyim 'dir ma phyin gyi
NK085(ru)004:2901: bar du legs nyes kyi spang blang la mkhas shing
NK085(ru)004:2902: bsrungs pa ltar / 'di nas bzung ste sangs ma
NK085(ru)004:2903: rgyas kyi bar du dam tshig gi bsrung bya 'di
NK085(ru)004:2904: rnams la shin tu mkhas shing nan tan du bsrung
NK085(ru)004:2905: bsrungs pa ltar / bar bya'o // de yang dang
NK085(ru)004:2906: po tshogs lam chung ngu la thun mong gi dam
NK085(ru)004:2907: tshig rnams nus bsrung byed la /
NK085(ru)004:2909: tshogs lam chen po dang sbyor lam la thun mong gzhan don du bsrung la /
NK085(ru)004:2910: khyad par gyi bsrung bya rnams nus bsrung byed la mthong lam phyin chad lhun grub yin no //
NK085(ru)004:2911: yang na rgya mtsho nor len 'di'i dpe don ni /
NK085(ru)004:2912: rgya mtsho'i gling du nor bu rin po che len
NK085(ru)004:2913: 'gro ba la mtha'i rgya mtsho la bsgral dgos te
NK085(ru)004:2914: / de yang gzing la brten nas 'gro ba yin pas de'i thabs ni /
NK085(ru)004:2916: gzing 'gro ba'i rkyen du zur bzhi ba dan bzhi /
NK085(ru)004:2917: mi mthun pa'i rkyen byung dus mal du bsdad pa'i rkyen khro chu'i pha bong bzhi /
NK085(ru)004:2918: lcags thag 'dom pa dgu pa bzhis zur bzhir btags pa dang /
NK085(ru)004:2919: chu srin gyi kha la gzings 'gro dogs pas /
NK085(ru)004:2920: brag dang chu srin brtag pa'i ched du phug ron /
NK085(ru)004:2921: de yang chu chags pa'i ched du bdun /
NK085(ru)004:2922: chu srin yin na de'i gnyen po dung /
NK085(ru)004:2923: de 'o mas 'tsho bar byed pa la ba /
NK085(ru)004:2924: de yang shi theb dang bcas pa yar drus gnyis /
NK085(ru)004:2925: skom sa thang shing dang nya nag mdung gnyis shan
NK085(ru)004:2926: phye ba la bya rog /de yang khyu chags par
NK085(ru)004:2928: de rnams kun tshogs kyang tshong dpon rgan po sngon nas lan mang du 'gro myong ba zhig dgos /
NK085(ru)004:2929: de rnams brten nas nor bu'i gling du phyin par
NK085(ru)004:2930: byed cing gzings mi bying ba'i tshad dang bstun nas
NK085(ru)004:2933: mi sde thams cad la phan par byed pa bzhin 'dir yang thar pa sgrub par byed pa la /
NK085(ru)004:2934: rgya mtsho dang 'dra ba'i khams gsum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las brgal bar bya ba la /
NK085(ru)004:2935: gzing dang 'dra ba'i gsang sngags kyi theg par 'jug cing /
NK085(ru)004:2936: ba dan dang 'dra ba'i bgrod par byed pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi /
NK085(ru)004:2937: khro chu pha bong dang 'dra ba'i tshad med pa bzhi'i stobs dang ldan dgos /
NK085(ru)004:2938: chu srin dang 'dra ba'i lam gyi bar chad nyon mongs pa'i tshogs /
NK085(ru)004:2939: de bsal ba'i thabs su dung dang 'dra ba'i gnas
NK085(ru)004:2940: lugs kyi don rtogs pa'i gding dang ldan pa zhig
NK085(ru)004:2941: dgos / ba gnyis dang 'dra ba'i thabs shes kyi bden pa gnyis la brten dgos /
NK085(ru)004:2942: bya rog dang 'dra ba'i lam mthon dman gyi tshod 'dzin cing nyams su len dgos /
NK085(ru)004:2943: phug ron dang 'dra ba'i byang chub kyi yan lag
NK085(ru)004:2944: bdun shugs la ldan pa zhig slar rang yul du
NK085(ru)004:2945: phebs nas rin po ches gzhan gyi dbul phongs bsal
NK085(ru)004:2947: rang don chos sku thob cing gzhan don gzugs sku
NK085(ru)004:2948: gnyis kyis gang la gang 'dul gyi don rgyun chad
NK085(ru)004:2950: tshong dpon lan mang du song ba dang 'dra ba'i dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyang /
NK085(ru)004:2951: dam tshig 'di la brten nas 'byung dgos pa'o //
NK085(ru)004:2952: spyi don bcu pa mdo bzhi brjod bya'i zhabs bsdu ba la gnyis te /
NK085(ru)004:2954: dang po rang bzhin gzhi'i mdo ni /
NK085(ru)004:2955: rtsa ba'i dam tshig dang yan lag gi dam tshig ces bya ba rnams ni /
NK085(ru)004:2956: gud dam logs shig na yod pa ma yin te
NK085(ru)004:2957: rnal 'byor pa rang gi sems nyid 'di dam tshig
NK085(ru)004:2958: yin te / gtan tshigs ci'i phyir yin zhe na /
NK085(ru)004:2959: kun rdzob tu shes bya ji snyed du snang ba'i
NK085(ru)004:2960: chos rnams ma lus pa kun kyang snang dus rang
NK085(ru)004:2961: rgyud du grub pa med pa de /
NK085(ru)004:2962: rang gi rig pa 'di nyid las dbyibs kha dog
NK085(ru)004:2963: la sogs ngos bzung kun dang bral bas stong pa
NK085(ru)004:2964: de nyid yul sna tshogs su shar nas snang ba
NK085(ru)004:2966: dngos po'i yul du ci ltar du snang ba dang /
NK085(ru)004:2967: shes bya ci srid thams cad rang rig pa de
NK085(ru)004:2968: nyid kyi 'char sgo yin pas na snang dus stong
NK085(ru)004:2969: la / de ltar kun rdzob dang don dam pa
NK085(ru)004:2970: byung chub kyi sems dbyer med de khams gsum gyi
NK085(ru)004:2972: la la ldog ste spyi gtsug gis 'gro ba la
NK085(ru)004:2973: sogs skye gnas gar su yang byang chub kyi sems
NK085(ru)004:2974: bder gshegs snying po'i don la skad cig tsam yang
NK085(ru)004:2975: 'da' mi srid de chu dang gsher ba bzhin no
NK085(ru)004:2976: // don de nyid rgyu las ma byung /
NK085(ru)004:2978: byed pa pos ma byas pas rang bzhin de las
NK085(ru)004:2979: mi 'da' bas dam tshig 'og ma'i spyod yul min
NK085(ru)004:2980: pas chen po'o // gnyis pa shes bya lta ba'i mdo ni /
NK085(ru)004:2981: de ltar gzhi rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dam
NK085(ru)004:2982: tshig rang la gnas pa de la brtag cing dpyad
NK085(ru)004:2983: / gzhig cing gzhal pas don de rig pa' tshe yul yul can gyi 'dzin pa dang bral zhing /
NK085(ru)004:2984: yul bral gnyis med kyi don phyin ci ma log par shar nas snang bas /
NK085(ru)004:2985: mngon sum du snang ba'i zhen brtagsa 'khrul pa'i chos
NK085(ru)004:2986: rang rgyud du med pas dag cing shes bya'i chos
NK085(ru)004:2987: ma 'dres par snang ba rang gi rig pa nyid
NK085(ru)004:2988: la yongs su rdzogs pas lta ba de las mi
NK085(ru)004:2989: 'da' ba'i dam tshig 'og ma'i spyod yul min pas
NK085(ru)004:2990: chen po yin par rgyud nas bshad do //
NK085(ru)004:2991: gsum pa goms byed ting nge 'dzin gyi mdo ni /
NK085(ru)004:2992: lta ba rtogs pa'i don rnal 'byor pa rang gi blo la 'dris shing goms par gyis la /
NK085(ru)004:2993: 'gro nyal 'dug sdod kyi spyod lam rnam bzhi kun
NK085(ru)004:2994: tu skad cig kyang ma yengs par 'da' nyams med
NK085(ru)004:2995: par ting nge 'dzin rgyun gyis sgom pa la mi
NK085(ru)004:2997: de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan na mthar phyin sangsa rgyas de nyid dang /
NK085(ru)004:2998: da lta'i rnal 'byor pa gnyis spyod yul gcig ste /
NK085(ru)004:2999: sangs rgyas kyis kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di la 'da' nyams med pa yin no //
NK085(ru)004:3000: bzhi pa blang dor med pa spyod pa'i mdo ni /
NK085(ru)004:3001: ting nge 'dzin rgyun chad med pa 'di la blo
NK085(ru)004:3002: gnas na gzhan bsrung bar bya ba gcig kyang bsrung
NK085(ru)004:3003: du med de / ma bsrungs pa'i nyes pa rdul phran tsam yang 'byung mi srid de /
NK085(ru)004:3004: gtan tshigs ci'i phyir mi 'byung na tshogs drug gi
NK085(ru)004:3005: snang ba ma bshagsa spyod pa la rang rgyud du
NK085(ru)004:3006: 'dzin pa'i blo dang bral te med pas dper nam
NK085(ru)004:3007: mkha' stong pa la rdul mi chags pa dang 'dra
NK085(ru)004:3008: bas / thams cad chos nyid kyi rba klong du
NK085(ru)004:3009: gyur pas nyams pa ni gzung 'dzin gyi dri ma
NK085(ru)004:3011: gnyis pa dam tshig thams cad mdo bzhir 'dus pa ni /
NK085(ru)004:3012: sum brgya drug cu'i nang nas lhag pa'i dam tshig
NK085(ru)004:3013: mdo rnam pa bzhir 'dus pa 'di dang ldan na
NK085(ru)004:3014: / sum brgya drug cu'i bsrung bar bya ba ma
NK085(ru)004:3015: lus pa rnams kun rdzob dang don dam byang chub
NK085(ru)004:3016: sems bskyed rdzogs kyi don la mi nyams pa'i thabs
NK085(ru)004:3017: yin pas de bas bsrung bya ma lus pa mdo
NK085(ru)004:3019: dam tshig kun gyi mdor bsdus pa zhes gsungs pa'o //
NK085(ru)004:3020: yang na lhag pa'i dam tshig rnam bzhir ldan zhes pa 'di /
NK085(ru)004:3021: 'og ma ched 'dzin can rnams las lhag pa'i rdzogs
NK085(ru)004:3022: pa chen po'i dam tshig gi mdo rnams pa bzhir
NK085(ru)004:3024: shes bya gzhi'i 'dug tshul thams cad rang bzhin gzhi'i
NK085(ru)004:3025: mdor 'dus lta ba'i bye brag thams cad shes bya
NK085(ru)004:3026: lta ba'i mdor 'dus sgom pa ting nge 'dzin gyi
NK085(ru)004:3027: bye brag thams cad goms byed ting nge 'dzin gyi
NK085(ru)004:3028: mdor 'dus / spyod pa'i bye brag thams cad blang
NK085(ru)004:3029: dor med par spyod pa'i mdor 'dus pa dang rnam
NK085(ru)004:3030: mdor 'dus / bzhir ldan pas / theg pa thams
NK085(ru)004:3031: cad kyis bsrung bar bya ba'i dam tshig ma lus
NK085(ru)004:3032: pa kun rdzogs pa chen po 'dir 'dus pa'i phyir
NK085(ru)004:3033: rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig kun gyi
NK085(ru)004:3034: mdor 'dus / bzhir ldan pas / mdo / lta ba ched 'dzin dang bral bas med pa //
NK085(ru)004:3035: spyod pa ched byas dang bral bas phyal ba //
NK085(ru)004:3036: sgom pa yul 'dzin dang bral bas gcig pu //
NK085(ru)004:3037: 'bras bu re dogs dang bral bas lhun grub dang bzhir 'dus pa'o //
NK085(ru)004:3038: zhes dam tshig bye brag thams cad mdo bzhir brjod byar 'dus pas /
NK085(ru)004:3039: rdzogs pa chen po'i don no //
NK085(ru)004:3040: de rnams kun gyis gzhung gi don de song nas //
NK085(ru)004:3041: gsum pa zhabs dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba ni /
NK085(ru)004:3042: sgyu 'phrul gsang snying gis gzhung bsrangs /
NK085(ru)004:3043: dam tshig rnam par bkod pa'i rgyas par bshad /
NK085(ru)004:3044: gter rgyud kyis khog dbub pa'i de la sogsa pa
NK085(ru)004:3045: gsang sngags bla med kyi theg pa zab la rgya
NK085(ru)004:3046: che ba rgya mtsho dang 'dra ba'i rgyud sde chen
NK085(ru)004:3047: po rnams las / lam de las byung ba 'i
NK085(ru)004:3048: 'bras bu thams cad kyi snying po dpe me long
NK085(ru)004:3050: rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig rnams gcig
NK085(ru)004:3051: thog na gcig 'ong bas 'khor lo dang 'dra ba'i
NK085(ru)004:3052: gzhung 'di nyid / dper na bya ngang pa'i mchu
NK085(ru)004:3053: la skyu rtsi yod pa yis rgya mtsho'i nang nas
NK085(ru)004:3054: 'o ma thim gcig yod na blang ba'i tshul gyis
NK085(ru)004:3055: gzhung 'di nyid / / slob dpon sgeg pa'i rdo
NK085(ru)004:3056: rje'i blo yi nyer len gyi shes rab skyur rtsi
NK085(ru)004:3057: gzhung 'di nyid / / dang 'dra bas / rgyud sde rgya mtsho dang 'dra ba'i nang nas /
NK085(ru)004:3058: 'o ma dang 'dra ba'i gzhung 'di bsdus pas /
NK085(ru)004:3059: dge rtsa des kun kyang dam tshig la gnas nas
NK085(ru)004:3060: 'gro kun byang chub thob par shog /des zhabs dge
NK085(ru)004:3064: de gsum gyi bshad bya gzhung don /
NK085(ru)004:3065: de'i gong du don ma nor ba'i bshad thabs /
NK085(ru)004:3066: de'i gong du 'jug ngo shes pa'i chos ngos bzung /
NK085(ru)004:3067: de gsum gyi gong 'chad nyan byed pa dam chos kyi rnam bzhag de song nas /
NK085(ru)004:3068: gsum pa 'chad nyan mthar phyin pa'i rgyu mtshan ni /
NK085(ru)004:3069: dam tshig rdo rje'i gsal bkra zhes bya ba bla
NK085(ru)004:3070: med spyi'i bsrung ba'i dam tshig rgyud nas 'thor ba'i
NK085(ru)004:3072: rdo rje bzhad pa ni sgeg mo la me tog phog pa'i gsang mtshan yin pas /
NK085(ru)004:3073: slob dpon chen po sgeg pa'i rdo rje gsungs so //
NK085(ru)004:3074: rdzogs so ni tshig don lhag ma ma lus pa'i tha tshig gam /
NK085(ru)004:3075: gnas skabs re zhig rdzogs nas bshad du ma mchis pa'i don du gada'o //
NK085(ru)004:3076: tshul 'di ni sngar 'grel pa thabs cad la gzhi blangs nas /
NK085(ru)004:3077: gzhung lugs ma nor ba'i dgongs pa dag ldan gsal
NK085(ru)004:3078: ba'i me long zhes bya ba 'di gsang sngags rdo
NK085(ru)004:3079: rje 'dzin pa ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis smras so
NK085(ru)004:3080: // ye nas gnas pa'i chos nyid lhun grub de //
NK085(ru)004:3081: shes rab spyan gyis ma lus dbyings su gzigs //
NK085(ru)004:3082: rgyal ba kun dang dgongs pa dbyer med bzhugs //
NK085(ru)004:3083: mtshan mchog don ldan de yi zhabs la 'dud //
NK085(ru)004:3084: gsungs rab rgyud sde chu gter chen po las //
NK085(ru)004:3085: ded dpon chen po sgeg pa'i rdo rje yis //
NK085(ru)004:3086: shes bya 'byed pa'i shes rab gru gzings thog /bsrung ba'i don mchog rin chen rgyal po len //
NK085(ru)004:3087: lnga skyes dbang po dz+ny+aa na'i mtshan can gyis //
NK085(ru)004:3088: lung rigs du mas phyi dor byas nas kyang //
NK085(ru)004:3089: gangs chen khrod 'dir rgyal mtshan rtse la phyar //
NK085(ru)004:3090: dad ldan nor 'dod gsang sngags rigs can des //
NK085(ru)004:3091: thos bsam sgom pas yengs med gsol ba thob //
NK085(ru)004:3092: sku lnga lhun grub nor gyis phyug go snyam //
NK085(ru)004:3093: 'di bris dri med gang g+aa'i chu rgyun des //
NK085(ru)004:3094: 'gro mang gzung 'dzin dri ma kun bkru bas //
NK085(ru)004:3095: ci bzhin ma nor 'di nyid don rtogs nas //
NK085(ru)004:3096: don gnyis lhun grub chu gter 'jug par shog /bdag ni tshe rabs skye ba thams cad du //
NK085(ru)004:3097: lung bstan thob pa 'phags pa'i zhabs drung du //
NK085(ru)004:3098: gnas lugs rtogs pa'i don dang rab ldan nas //
NK085(ru)004:3099: byang chub ming can byang chung thob par shog /bla
NK085(ru)004:3100: ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bos len cing 'bangs thams cad
NK085(ru)004:3101: kyi tha mar gyur pa byang chub bzang gis /
NK085(ru)004:3102: bdag dang mtshungs pa'i grogs mched 'ga' 'ag'i don du zhu ba yang yang phul bas /
NK085(ru)004:3103: bla ma'i thugs rje gdul bya la nye bar dgongs nas /
NK085(ru)004:3104: bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mdzod brdol nas /
NK085(ru)004:3105: man ngag snying khu yang zhun gyi thigs pa dag
NK085(ru)004:3106: ldan gsal ba'i me long zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i
NK085(ru)004:3107: ris su bris pa 'di re zhig rdzogs so ////bkra
NK085(ru)004:3108: shis par gyur cig /mang+ga lam b+ha ba tu /
